" But [we]3991-we should not have gone out sight - seeing this morning — [we]3991-we were not at all in a junketing mood — if it had not been for [Mr. Byng]251-byng ; [he]251-byng came in and took [us]3991-we both by storm . It is difficult , "[193-elizabeth] [her]193-elizabeth face dimpling and brightening with a much more confirmed smile than the tiny hovering one which is all that [Jim]181-jim has been able to call forth—"it is difficult to resist [a person who brings so much sunshine]3995-a person who brings so much sunshine with [him]251-byng — do not [you]3996-you find it so ? [He]251-byng is so very sunshiny , [your]3996-you [Mr. Byng]251-byng . [We]3991-we like sunshine ; [we]3991-we — [we]3991-we have not had a great deal of it . "[181-jim] It is on the very edge of [his]1280-he lip to tell [her]193-elizabeth that when [he]1280-he had known [her]193-elizabeth [she]193-elizabeth had had and been nothing but sunshine . But [he]1280-he recollects in time [her]193-elizabeth prohibition as to the past , and restrains [himself]1280-he . " When [you]1280-he look so kind and interested , "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth cries impulsively , sitting up in [her]193-elizabeth chair , with a transparent little hand on each arm of it , " [I]193-elizabeth feel a fraud . "[193-elizabeth] [She]193-elizabeth stops . " [I]1280-he look interested because [I]1280-he feel interested , "[1280-he] returns [he]1280-he doggedly ; " fraud or not — but "[1280-he] ( in a distressed voice ) " do not , even in joke , call [yourself]1280-he ugly names — fraud or not , [you]1280-he can not hinder [me]1280-he . "[1280-he] " Do not be interested in [me]193-elizabeth , "[193-elizabeth] says [she]193-elizabeth , in [her]193-elizabeth plaintive cooing voice ; " [we]3997-we are very bad people to get interested in , [we]3997-we are not repaying [people]3155-people to be interested in . [I]193-elizabeth think — that perhaps "[193-elizabeth] ( slowly and dreamily ) " under other circumstances [we]3997-we might have been pleasant enough . [Mammy]285-mammy has naturally excellent spirits , and so have [I]193-elizabeth ; it does not take much to make [us]3997-we happy , and even now [I]193-elizabeth often feel like poor [little Prince Arthur]286-little prince arthur — But then , "[193-elizabeth] sighing profoundly , " the moment that [we]3997-we begin to feel a little cheerful , something comes and knocks [us]3997-we down again . "[193-elizabeth] There is such a blank hopelessness in the tone with which [she]193-elizabeth pronounces the last words , and , in [his]1280-he almost total ignorance of the origin of [her]193-elizabeth despair , it is so impossible to put [his]1280-he compassion into fit words , that [he]1280-he can think of nothing better than to pull [his]1280-he chair two inches nearer [her]193-elizabeth , to assure [her]193-elizabeth by this dumb protest of how little inclined [he]1280-he is to accept [her]193-elizabeth warning . " Are [you]1280-he sure that [he]1280-he is really gone — going , [I]193-elizabeth mean , "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth asks , in an excited low voice , " going to - morrow morning , as [you]1280-he say ? Oh , [I]193-elizabeth wish it were to - morrow morning ! But perhaps when to - morrow morning comes , [he]1280-he will have changed [his]1280-he mind . Was [he]1280-he quite , quite sure about it ? "[193-elizabeth] " [He]1280-he said [he]1280-he was going to - morrow morning , "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim , repeating [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's quotation from [[her]222-cecilia new friend]1282-her new friend 's conversation with conscientious exactness ; " that it was not worth while to change [[his]1280-he hotel]760-his hotel , as [he]1280-he was leaving [Florence]20-florence to - morrow morning . "[181-jim] " [He]1280-he will not go , "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth says , shaking [her]193-elizabeth head with restless dejection ; " [nobody but would be loth]4000-nobody but would be loth to leave this heavenly place"—glancing[193-elizabeth] out affectionately through the open window , even at the commonplace and now almost night - shaded [Piazza garden—"we]241-piazza shall find that [he]1280-he is not gone after all . "[193-elizabeth] " Nothing will be easier to ascertain than that fact , "[181-jim] says [Burgoyne]181-jim , eagerly catching at so easy an opportunity for help and service ; " now that [I]181-jim know which is [[his]1280-he hotel]760-his hotel , [I]181-jim can inquire there to - morrow morning , and bring [you]181-jim word at once . "[181-jim] " Could [you]181-jim , would [you]181-jim ? "[193-elizabeth] cries [she]193-elizabeth , life and light springing back into [her]193-elizabeth dejected eyes at [his]181-jim proposal ; " but no , "[193-elizabeth] with an accent of remorse , " why should [you]181-jim ? Why should [we]4002-we keep [you]181-jim running upon [our]4002-we errands ? What right have [we]4002-we to take up [your]181-jim time ? "[193-elizabeth] " [My]181-jim time , "[181-jim] repeats [he]181-jim ironically . " [I]181-jim am like [the German Prince mentioned by Heine , who spent [his]181-jim leisure hours — hours of which [he]181-jim had twenty - four every day — in —]287-the german prince mentioned by heine , who spent his leisure hours — hours of which he had twenty - four every day — in — — "[181-jim] " But if [we]4002-we do not rob [you]181-jim , "[193-elizabeth] interrupts [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , looking at [him]181-jim in some surprise , " [we]4002-we rob [Miss — Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson . What will [she]193-elizabeth say to [us]4002-we ? "[193-elizabeth] " [She]193-elizabeth will be only too glad , "[181-jim] replies [he]181-jim stiffly , a douche of cold water thrown on [his]181-jim foolish heart by the little hesitation which had preceded [her]193-elizabeth pronunciation of [Amelia]271-amelia 's name , showing that [her]193-elizabeth interest in [him]181-jim had not had keenness enough even to induce [her]193-elizabeth to master [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed 's appellation . " Will [she]193-elizabeth ? "[193-elizabeth] rejoins [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , quite ignorant of having given offence , and with [her]193-elizabeth eyes fixed rather wistfully upon [his]181-jim . " How good of [her]193-elizabeth ! and how unlike [most very happy people]4003-most very happy people ! [Happy people]4004-happy people are generally rather exacting ; but [she]193-elizabeth looks good . [She]193-elizabeth has a dear face ! "[193-elizabeth] [He]181-jim is silent . To hear [the one woman]1284-the one woman 's innocent and unconscious encomiums of the other fills [him]181-jim with an emotion that ties [his]181-jim never ready tongue . [She]193-elizabeth mistakes the cause of [his]181-jim muteness . " [I]193-elizabeth am afraid [I]193-elizabeth have vexed [you]181-jim , "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth says , sweetly and humbly . " [I]193-elizabeth had no business to praise [her]193-elizabeth to [you]181-jim ; it was like praising [a person]1281-a person to [himself]1281-a person ; but do not be angry with [me]193-elizabeth — [I]193-elizabeth did not mean to be impertinent ! "[193-elizabeth] One small fragile hand is hanging over the arm of [[her]193-elizabeth hard lodging - house arm - chair]1285-her hard lodging - house arm - chair , and before [he]181-jim has an idea of what [his]181-jim own intentions are , it is lying , without any asking of its consent , in [his]181-jim . " [I]181-jim will not — [I]181-jim will not let [you]193-elizabeth say such things , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , trembling . " [She]193-elizabeth is good : [she]193-elizabeth has a dear face : and [I]181-jim love to hear [you]193-elizabeth say so ! May [I]181-jim — may [I]181-jim bring [her]193-elizabeth to see [you]193-elizabeth ? "[181-jim] As [he]181-jim makes this request , [he]181-jim feels the little fingers that are lying in [his]181-jim palm give a nervous start ; and at once , quietly but determinedly , the captive hand is withdrawn . [It]1286-it and its fellow fly up to [her]1287-her face , and together quite cover it from [his]181-jim view . Though , as [I]0-i have said , they are small , yet , it being small too to match them , they conceal it entirely . " [You]193-elizabeth will not say no ? "[181-jim] [he]181-jim cries anxiously . " [I]181-jim am sure [you]193-elizabeth will not say no . [I]181-jim shall feel very much snubbed if [you]193-elizabeth do . "[181-jim] Still no answer . Still that shielded face , and the ominous silence behind it . [He]181-jim rises , a dark red spreading over [his]181-jim features . " [I]181-jim must apologize for having made the suggestion . [I]181-jim can only beg [you]193-elizabeth to forget that it was ever made . Good - bye ! "[181-jim] [He]181-jim has nearly reached the door , when [he]181-jim hears the frou - frou of [her]1287-her gown , and turning , sees that [her]1287-her unsteady feet have carried [her]1287-her after [him]181-jim , and that [her]1287-her face is changing from crimson to white and back again with startling rapidity . " [I]1287-her thought [you]181-jim would have understood , "[1287-her] [she]1287-her says faintly . " [I]1287-her thought that [you]181-jim were [the one person who would not have misunderstood]4006-the one person who would not have misunderstood . "[1287-her] [His]181-jim conscience pricks [him]181-jim , but [he]181-jim is never very quick to be able to own [himself]181-jim in the wrong , and before [he]181-jim can bring [himself]181-jim to frame any sentence that smacks of apology and regret , [she]1287-her resumes , with a little more composure and in a conventional voice : " [You]181-jim know — [we]4007-we told [you]181-jim — even at [Genoa]23-genoa — that — that [we]4007-we are not going out , that [we]4007-we do not wish to make [any new acquaintances]4008-any new acquaintances ! "[1287-her] " [I]181-jim know , "[181-jim] replies [he]181-jim , with some indignation , " that that is the hollow formal bulletin [you]1287-her issue to [the world]3184-the world in general , but [I]181-jim thought — [I]181-jim hoped — — "[181-jim] " Do not bring [her]1287-her to see [me]1287-her , "[1287-her] [she]1287-her interrupts , abandoning [her]1287-her effort for composure , and speaking in a broken voice , while [her]1287-her eyes swim in tears . " [She]1287-her — [she]1287-her might be sorry — [she]1287-her — [she]1287-her might not like it — afterwards ! "[1287-her] [He]181-jim looks back at [her]1287-her with an almost terrified air . Is the answer to [her]1287-her sad riddle coming to [him]181-jim thus ? Has [he]181-jim had the brutality to force [her]1287-her into giving it ? " [You]1287-her have been so kind in not asking [me]181-jim any questions , [you]1287-her have even given up alluding to old times since [you]1287-her saw that it hurt [me]181-jim ; but [you]1287-her must see — of course [you]1287-her do — that — that there is something — in [me]181-jim — not like [other people]4010-other people ; something that — that prevents — [my]181-jim — having [any friends]4011-any friends ! [I]181-jim have not [a friend in [the world]3184-the world]4012-a friend in the world "[181-jim] ( with a low sob ) " except [[my]181-jim mother]1063-my mother — except [mammy]1029-mammy ! Do [you]1287-her think "[181-jim] ( breaking into a watery smile ) " that it is very silly of [me]181-jim , at [my]181-jim age , to call [her]1063-my mother ' mammy ' still ? "[181-jim] " [I]1288-i think , "[1288-i] [he]1288-i says , " that [I]1288-i am one of the greatest brutes out , and that [I]1288-i should be thankful if [someone]529-someone would kick [me]1288-i downstairs . "[1288-i] And with this robust expression of self - depreciation , [he]1288-i takes [his]1288-i hat and departs . It was to German flowers that the above hest was addressed . If [they]1289-they obey it , with how much more alacrity do [the Italian ones]1290-the italian ones comply with its glad command . It is a week later , and now [no one]819-no one can say that " the spring comes slowly up this way . "[819-no one] Vines , figs , and mulberries , all are emulously racing out , and the corn has added two emerald inches to its juicy blades . The young plane - trees in [the Piazza d'Azeglio]3491-the piazza d'azeglio , so skimpily robed when first [Jim]181-jim had rung the entresol bell of [No . 12]1293-no . 12 , are exchanging [their]1289-they " unhandsome thrift "[1294-a wonderful paulownia] for an apparel of plenteous green , and [a wonderful Paulownia]1294-a wonderful paulownia is beginning to hold up [her]1294-a wonderful paulownia clusters of gloccinia bells . [Jim]181-jim has watched the daily progress of the plane - leaves from the low window of [No . 12 's entresol]1295-no . 12 's entresol . The daily progress ? Is it possible that [he]181-jim has been [there]455-there every day during the past week ? [He]181-jim asks [himself]181-jim this , with a species of shock ; and it is with a sense of relief that [he]181-jim finds that one whole day has intervened , during which [he]181-jim had not heard the sound of the electric bell thrilling through [the apartment]1297-the apartment under the touch of [his]181-jim own fingers . What can have taken [him]181-jim [there]455-there , every day but one ? [He]181-jim runs over , in [his]181-jim mind , with a misgiving as to their insufficiency , the reasons of [his]181-jim visit . For the first [he]181-jim had had an excellent excuse . Surely it would have been barbarous not to have imparted to [the anxiously - watching pair]1299-the anxiously - watching pair the good news that the object of [their]1299-the anxiously - watching pair mysterious terror had really and authentically gone ! On the second day it seemed quite worth while to take the walk , in order to tell [them]1299-the anxiously - watching pair that [he]181-jim had accidentally learned [the clergyman]3644-the clergyman 's destination to be [Venice]77-venice , and [his]181-jim intention to return viâ [Milan]78-milan and [the St. Gothard]79-the st. gothard . On the third day , being as near to [them]1299-the anxiously - watching pair as [San Annunziata]80-san annunziata , it had seemed unfriendly not to inquire after [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant 's neuralgia . On the fourth —— [He]181-jim is pulled up short in [his]181-jim reminiscences . Why had [he]181-jim gone on the fourth day ? [He]181-jim can give no answer to the question , and slides off from it to another . Which was the fourth day ? Was it — yes , it was the one on which the wind blew as coldly east as it might have done across [[Salisbury Plain]81-salisbury plain 's naked expanse]1301-salisbury plain 's naked expanse , and [he]181-jim had found [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth sitting on a milking - stool shivering over a poor little fire of green wood , and blowing it with a pair of bellows . [He]181-jim had helped [her]193-elizabeth to blow , and between [them]1302-them [they]1302-them had blown the fire entirely away , as often happens in the case of [unskilled handlers of bellows]1303-unskilled handlers of bellows , and [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth had laughed till [she]193-elizabeth cried . And meanwhile , how many times has [he]181-jim been within the portals of [the Anglo - Américain]82-the anglo - américain ? With all [his]181-jim arithmetic [he]181-jim can not make it more than twice . This neglect of [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed , however , is not of quite so monstrous a cast as at the first blush it may appear . It is [she]193-elizabeth [herself]193-elizabeth who , true to [her]193-elizabeth life - long principle of shielding [him]181-jim from all disagreeable experiences , has forbidden [him]181-jim [her]193-elizabeth door . [He]181-jim can aid [her]193-elizabeth neither to bandage [[her]193-elizabeth father]3214-her father 's swollen foot in the severe gout - fit under which [he]181-jim is groaning , nor to allay [Sybilla]221-sybilla 's mysterious sufferings , which always display a marked increase in acuteness whenever [any other member of [the family]728-the family]1306-any other member of the family shows a disposition to set up claims as [an invalid]3326-an invalid . [Cecilia]222-cecilia , indeed , is ready enough to give [her]222-cecilia help in nursing [[her]222-cecilia father]3214-her father , but [she]222-cecilia has on former occasions shown such an unhappy aptitude for tumbling over [his]181-jim swathed and extended leg , and upsetting [his]181-jim physic all over [him]181-jim , that [she]222-cecilia is received with such objurgations as [his]181-jim cloth will permit , so often as [she]222-cecilia shows [her]222-cecilia short nose within [[his]181-jim sick - room]1310-his sick - room . Only twice in a whole week . Can [Amelia]271-amelia have wished to be taken quite so literally when [she]271-amelia had bidden [him]181-jim stay away ? There is only one answer possible to this question , and [he]181-jim shows [his]181-jim consciousness of it by at once raising [himself]181-jim out of the chair in which [he]181-jim is sunk , and turning [his]181-jim steps hastily towards [her]271-amelia . It is morning . The east wind is clean gone , and [the streets]1311-the streets are full of the scent of the innumerable lilies of [the valley]1312-the valley , of which [everybody]3181-everybody 's hands are full . [He]181-jim stops a minute and buys a great sheaf for a miraculously small sum , from one of [the unnumbered sellers]1314-the unnumbered sellers . It shall make [his]181-jim peace for [him]181-jim , if indeed it needs making , which it has never done yet . [He]181-jim almost smiles at the absurdity of the suggestion . [He]181-jim finds [Cecilia]222-cecilia alone in [the sitting - room]1315-the sitting - room , [Cecilia]222-cecilia sitting by the window reading [the Queen]1316-the queen . Upon [her]222-cecilia large pink face there is a puzzled expression , which is perhaps to be accounted for by the fact that the portion of the journal which [she]222-cecilia is perusing is that entitled " Etiquette , "[222-cecilia] and under it are the answers to last week 's questions , upon nice points of social law , which , if [you]1317-she do not happen to have read the questions , have undoubtedly an enigmatical air , as in the following instances : " [[Your]1317-she husband]4017-your husband takes [[the Baronet]4018-the baronet 's daughter]4019-the baronet 's daughter , and [you]1317-she follow with [the Prince]4020-the prince . ["—"We]4021-"—"we[222-cecilia] do not understand [your]1317-she question — [babies]1318-babies never dine out , " etc . Upon [Jim]181-jim 's entrance [Cecilia]222-cecilia lays down [her]222-cecilia paper , and at once offers to go in search of [[her]222-cecilia sister]720-her sister , with whom [she]222-cecilia shortly returns . [He]181-jim had been quite right . There is no peace to make . [Amelia]271-amelia greets [him]181-jim with [her]271-amelia usual patient and perfectly unrancorous smile , but [his]181-jim second glance at [her]271-amelia tells [him]181-jim that [she]271-amelia is looking old and fagged . It is only in very early youth that vigils and worries and self - denials do not write [their]4023-their names upon the skin . "[222-cecilia] How — how pale [you]1317-she are ! " [he]181-jim says . If [he]181-jim had given utterance to the word that hovered on [his]181-jim lips , [he]181-jim would have cried , "[222-cecilia] how yellow ! " "[1317-she] It would be very odd if [she]1317-she did not , " says [Cecilia]222-cecilia with a shrug , looking up from [her]222-cecilia "[1317-she] Etiquette , " to which [she]222-cecilia has returned ; "[1317-she] [she]1317-she has sat up three nights with [father]3390-father , and last evening [Sybilla]221-sybilla bid [us]1320-us all good - bye . [You]1321-you know [she]1317-she never can bear [anybody else]1322-anybody else to be ill , and when [father]3390-father has the gout [she]1317-she bids [us]1320-us all good - bye — and [Amelia]271-amelia is always taken in and sheds torrents of tears — do not [you]1321-you , [Amelia]271-amelia ? " [Amelia]271-amelia has subsided rather wearily into a chair . "[1321-you] [She]1317-she really thinks that [she]1317-she is dying , " says [she]271-amelia apologetically—"and[1317-she] who knows ? some day perhaps it may come true . " "[1317-she] Not it , " rejoins [[her]271-amelia sister]720-her sister , with an exasperated sniff "[1317-she] [she]1317-she will see [us]1320-us all out — will not [she]1317-she , [Jim]181-jim ? " "[1317-she] [I]0-i have not the remotest doubt of it , " replies [he]181-jim heartily ; and then [his]181-jim conscience - struck eyes revert to [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed 's wan face , all the plainer for its wanness . "[1317-she] No sleep , no fresh air , " in an injured tone , checking off the items on [his]181-jim fingers . "[203-byng] But [I]0-i have had fresh air , " smiling at [him]181-jim with pale affection ; "[0-i] one day [Mrs. Byng]203-byng took [me]0-i out for a drive . [Mrs. Byng]203-byng has been very kind to [me]0-i . " [She]0-i does not lay the faintest invidious accent on the name , as if contrasting it with [another whose owner had been so far less kind]4026-another whose owner had been so far less kind ; it is [his]181-jim own guilty heart that supplies the emphasis . [His]181-jim only resource is an anger which — so curiously perverse is human nature — is not even feigned . "[203-byng] [You]0-i can go out driving with [Mrs. Byng]203-byng then , though [you]0-i could not spare time to come out with [me]0-i , " [he]181-jim says in a surly voice . [She]0-i does not defend [herself]0-i but [her]0-i lower lip trembles . "[203-byng] Come out with [me]0-i now , " [he]181-jim cries , remorse giving a harshness even to the tone of the sincerely - meant invitation . "[0-i] [You]0-i look like a geranium in [a cellar]1324-a cellar ; it is a divine day , a day to make [the old feel young]1325-the old feel young , and [the young immortal]1326-the young immortal ; come out and stay out with [me]0-i all day . [I]0-i will take [you]0-i wherever [you]0-i like . [I]0-i will — — " The genuine eagerness of [his]181-jim proposal has tinged [her]0-i sickly - coloured cheek with a healthier hue for the moment , but [she]0-i shakes [her]0-i head . "[0-i] [I]0-i could not leave [father]3390-father this morning ; [he]3390-father will not take [his]3390-father medicine from [anyone else]1328-anyone else , and [he]3390-father likes [me]0-i to sit with [him]3390-father while [he]3390-father eats [his]3390-father arrowroot . " The only sign of approval of this instance of filial piety given by [Jim]181-jim is that [he]181-jim rises and begins to stamp irritably about [the room]442-the room . "[3390-father] [He]3390-father is really not at all exacting , " continues [Amelia]271-amelia in anxious deprecation ; "[3390-father] [he]3390-father was quite pleased just now when [I]0-i told [him]3390-father that [Mrs. Byng]203-byng was going to take [me]0-i to a party at [the Villa Schiavone]1329-the villa schiavone this afternoon . [He]3390-father said — — " "[3390-father] [Mrs. Byng]203-byng ! [Mrs. Byng]203-byng again ! " This is not what [Mr. Wilson]202-mr. wilson said , but is the expression of the unjust wrath which [Burgoyne]181-jim , feeling it much pleasanter to be angry with [someone else]4028-someone else than [himself]181-jim is artificially and not unsuccessfully fostering . Again [Amelia]271-amelia 's lip quivers . "[0-i] [I]0-i thought , " [she]0-i says gently , "[0-i] if — if [you]3390-father have no other engagement this afternoon ; if — if [you]3390-father are free — — " Nothing can be milder than the form which this suggestion takes , and yet there is something in its shape that provokes [him]3390-father . "[0-i] Free ! " [he]3390-father interrupts tartly , "[0-i] of course [I]0-i am free ! Have [I]0-i [a gouty father]1330-a gouty father and [a hysteric sister]1331-a hysteric sister ? Why should not [I]0-i be free ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i am very glad to hear it , " rejoins [she]0-i — the light that [his]3390-father first proposal to take [her]0-i out had brought into [her]0-i face growing brighter and more established—"because[0-i] in that case there is nothing to prevent [your]3390-father meeting [us]1332-us at [the villa]3598-the villa , and — — " "[271-amelia] And seeing [you]3390-father and [Mrs. Byng]203-byng walking about with [your]3390-father arms round each other 's necks , like [a couple of schoolgirls]1334-a couple of schoolgirls , " cries [he]3390-father , with a sort of spurious grumpiness . "[0-i] [I]0-i ca n't think why [you]3390-father should object to [Amelia]271-amelia walking about with [her]271-amelia arm round [Mrs. Byng]203-byng 's neck , " says [Cecilia]222-cecilia , whose attention to [her]271-amelia "[271-amelia] Etiquette " is apparently not so absorbing but that [she]222-cecilia has some to spare for the conversation going on in [[her]222-cecilia neighbourhood]4029-her neighbourhood . [They]1332-us all laugh a little ; and harmony being restored , and [Jim]181-jim graciously vouchsafing to forgive [Amelia]271-amelia for having ignored [her]271-amelia for a sennight , [she]271-amelia returns to [[her]271-amelia patient]4030-her patient , and [he]3390-father to [[his]3390-father hotel]760-his hotel , where [he]3390-father is at once , contrary to [his]3390-father wish , pounced upon by [Byng]203-byng . For some reason , which [he]3390-father would be puzzled to explain to [himself]3390-father , [he]3390-father has for the last week rather avoided [[his]3390-father friend]393-his friend 's company — a task rendered easier by the disposition manifested by [[the young man]643-the young man 's mother]4034-the young man 's mother to monopolize [him]3390-father , a disposition to which [Burgoyne]181-jim has felt no inclination to run counter . It is without enthusiasm that [he]3390-father receives [Byng]203-byng 's expressions of pleasure in [their]4035-their accidental meeting . "[0-i] [I]0-i have been searching for [you]0-i , high and low . " "[0-i] Have [you]0-i ? " "[0-i] Where have [you]0-i been ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i have been to [the Anglo - Américain"—with]4036-the anglo - américain"—with a flash of inward self - congratulation at this query having been put to - day , instead of yesterday , or the day before . [The other]396-the other looks disappointed . "[0-i] To [the Anglo - Américain]82-the anglo - américain ? [I]0-i thought — [I]0-i hoped ; have [you]0-i — seen [them]82-the anglo - américain lately ? " [Burgoyne]181-jim has ceased to feign lack of understanding to whom the personal pronoun refers , and [he]181-jim answers with as much carelessness as at a moment 's notice [he]181-jim can put on : "[0-i] Why , yes , [I]0-i have , once or twice . " "[82-the anglo - américain] Do [they]82-the anglo - américain — do not [they]82-the anglo - américain think it strange of [me]0-i not to have been near [them]82-the anglo - américain all this time ? " "[82-the anglo - américain] [They]82-the anglo - américain may do"—dryly . "[82-the anglo - américain] [They]82-the anglo - américain did not say so ? " "[82-the anglo - américain] [They]82-the anglo - américain did not ; perhaps"—sarcastically—"the subject was too acutely painful for [them]82-the anglo - américain to allude to . "[82-the anglo - américain] Frequently as [he]1335-his has exposed [himself]1335-his to [them]82-the anglo - américain , [[his]1335-his Mentor]1336-his mentor 's sneers never fail to send the crimson racing into [Byng]203-byng 's face , and it finds its way there now . It does not , however , prevent [his]1335-his proceeding , after a confused moment or two , with [his]1335-his anxious catechism . " [She]4038-she — [she]4038-she has not referred to the subject ? "[1335-his] " What subject ? "[1335-his] " To — to [me]1335-his ? "[1335-his] " [She]4038-she has never mentioned [your]1335-his name . Stay"—his[1335-his] veracity winning a reluctant victory over [his]1335-his ill - nature—"one day [she]4038-she said that [you]1335-his were sunshiny , and that [she]4038-she liked sunshine . "[1335-his] As [he]1335-his speaks [he]1335-his looks down at [his]1335-his boots , too unaffectedly annoyed at the justification of [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's epithet which [its]1337-its retailing has worked on [Byng]203-byng 's countenance to be able to contemplate [him]1335-his with any decent patience . But there is enough evidence in [the boy]3714-the boy 's voice of the effect wrought upon [him]1335-his by [Miss Le Marchant]240-miss le marchant 's adjective to make [[his]1335-his comrade]1339-his comrade repent very heartily of having repeated it . " [I]203-byng should have been over , "[203-byng] says [Byng]203-byng in a low eager way , " every day , every hour , as often as [they]4039-they would have received [me]203-byng , only that [I]203-byng could not leave [[my]203-byng mother]1063-my mother ; and [she]1063-my mother — [she]1063-my mother has taken them en grippe ! "[203-byng] " En grippe ? [[Your]181-jim mother]1065-your mother ? "[181-jim] repeats [Jim]181-jim , too honestly and disagreeably startled by this piece of news to be able any longer to maintain [his]181-jim ironical manner ; " why ? "[396-the other] [The other]396-the other shrugs [his]396-the other shoulders dispiritedly . " [I]396-the other have not an idea ; it can not be because [they]4039-they did not seem to wish to be introduced to [her]1063-my mother at the Accademia the other day ; [she]1063-my mother is quite incapable of such pettiness , and [she]1063-my mother admired [HER]1063-my mother so tremendously at first , did not [she]1063-my mother ? [You]4042-you heard [her]1063-my mother ; but since then [she]1063-my mother has taken it into [her]1063-my mother head that there is something — [I]396-the other can not bear even to say it"—dashing[396-the other] [his]396-the other hat and gloves vehemently upon the table—"something louche , as [she]1063-my mother calls it , about [her]1063-my mother . [Mother]256-mother thinks that [she]1063-my mother — [she]1063-my mother — she"—sinking[396-the other] [his]396-the other voice to an indistinct half - whisper—"has — has gone off the rails some time or other . Can [you]4042-you conceive?"—raising[396-the other] [his]396-the other tone again to one of the acutest pain and indignation—"that [anyone]3161-anyone — [any human being]4044-any human being could look in [her]1063-my mother face and harbour such a notion for a single instant ? "[396-the other] [He]396-the other stares with eyes ablaze with wrathful pity at [[his]396-the other friend]393-his friend 's face , expecting an answering outbreak to [his]396-the other own ; but none such comes . [Burgoyne]181-jim only says , in a not much more assured key than that which [the young man]643-the young man had employed : " How — how can such an idea have got into [[your]643-the young man mother]1065-your mother 's head ? "[181-jim] " [I]181-jim do not know , but it is there ; and what [I]181-jim wanted [you]4042-you , what [I]181-jim have been searching everywhere for [you]4042-you for , is to ask [you]4042-you to — to set [her]1065-your mother right , at once , without any delay . It is unbearable that [she]1065-your mother should go on thinking such things , and nothing could be easier for [you]4042-you , who know them so well , who know all about [them]4046-them ! "[181-jim] [Burgoyne]181-jim is at first too much stupefied by this appeal , and by the impossibility of answering it in a satisfactory manner , to make any response at all ; but at length : " Know all about [them]4046-them ? "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , in a voice whose surface impatience hides a much profounder feeling . " Who dares ever say that [he]181-jim knows all about [any other living soul]4047-any other living soul ? How many times must [I]181-jim tell [you]4042-you that , until [we]4048-we met at [Genoa]23-genoa , [I]181-jim had not set eyes on [Miss Le Marchant]240-miss le marchant for ten good years ? "[181-jim] At the tone of this speech , so widely different from the eager acceptance of the suggested task which [he]181-jim had expected , [Byng]203-byng 's face takes on a crestfallen , almost frightened look . " But when [you]4042-you knew [them]4046-them , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , " in [Devonshire]5-devonshire , [they]4046-them — [they]4046-them were all right then , were not [they]4046-them ? [they]4046-them were well thought of?—there was nothing against [them]4046-them ? "[181-jim] " Good Heavens — no ! "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim heartily , thankful that the appeal is now so worded as to enable [him]181-jim to give a warm testimony in favour of [[his]181-jim poor friends]1343-his poor friends . " There was not [a family]4049-a family in all [the neighbourhood]1039-the neighbourhood that stood so high . [Everybody]3181-everybody loved [them]4046-them ; [everybody]3181-everybody had a good word for [them]4046-them . "[203-byng] [Byng]203-byng 's countenance clears a little . " And there is no reason — [you]181-jim have no reason for supposing anything different now ? "[203-byng] [Jim]181-jim stirs uneasily in [his]181-jim chair . Can [he]181-jim truthfully give the same convinced affirmative to this question as to the last ? It is a second or two before [he]181-jim answers it at all . " The facts of life are enough for [me]181-jim ; [I]181-jim do not trouble [myself]181-jim with its suppositions . "[181-jim] [He]181-jim gets up and walks towards the door as [he]181-jim speaks , resolved to bring to an end this to [him]181-jim intolerable catechism . " But [you]181-jim must have an opinion — [you]181-jim must think , "[181-jim] cries the other 's voice , persistently pursuing [him]181-jim . [He]181-jim turns at bay , with the door - handle in [his]181-jim hand , [his]181-jim eyes lightening . " [I]181-jim asked [her]4053-her permission to bring [Amelia]271-amelia to see [her]4053-her , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , in a low moved voice ; " if [I]181-jim had thought as ill of [her]271-amelia as [[your]271-amelia mother]1065-your mother does , do [you]271-amelia think [I]181-jim should have done that ? "[181-jim] Camille.—"Que [me]181-jim conseilleriez - vous de faire le jour où je verrais que vous ne m'aimez plus ? "[181-jim] There is no greater fiction than that for time to go quickly implies that it must needs go pleasantly . [Jim]181-jim has seldom spent a more disagreeable period than the hours which follow [his]181-jim conversation with [Byng]203-byng , and which [he]181-jim passes in [[his]181-jim own bedroom]1344-his own bedroom , with [his]181-jim elbows on the window - ledge , looking blankly out at [the Piazza]3537-the piazza , and at [the great " Bride "[290-arnolpho] of [Arnolpho]290-arnolpho 's planning]1346-the great " bride " of arnolpho 's planning , [the church of [Santa Maria Novella]83-santa maria novella]1347-the church of santa maria novella . And yet , when the city clocks , which have chimed unnoticed by [him]181-jim several times , at length convey to [his]181-jim inattentive ear what the hour is , [he]181-jim starts up , shocked and confused at its lateness . [He]181-jim had meant to have reached [the Villa Schiavone]84-the villa schiavone in time to receive [Amelia]271-amelia , and now [she]271-amelia must have long preceded [him]181-jim , and be attributing [his]181-jim tardiness to some fresh neglect and indifference . In five minutes [he]181-jim has rearranged [his]181-jim dress , and jumped into a fiacre . Through [the Porta Romana]1348-the porta romana , and up between the straight row of still and inky cypresses , up and up to where [the villa]3598-the villa door , promising so little and performing so much , opens as so many do , straight upon [the road]3320-the road . The day has changed its ravishing blue gaiety for a pensive cloudy gloom , and [the guests at [the villa]3598-the villa]1351-the guests at the villa are walking about without any sunshades . They are numerous , though few indeed in comparison of the Banksia roses on the laden wall , over which , too , a great wistaria — put in , as [the host with a just pride relates , only last year]1353-the host with a just pride relates , only last year — is hanging and flinging its lilac abundance . And seen above [its]3598-the villa clusters , and above the wall , what a view from [this raised terrace]1354-this raised terrace ! [Jim]181-jim is really in a hurry to find [Amelia]271-amelia , and yet [he]181-jim can not choose but stop to look at [it]1355-it — from [[Galileo]291-galileo 's tower]1356-galileo 's tower on the right , to where , far down [the plain of [the Arno]45-arno]1357-the plain of the arno , [Carrara]68-carrara loses itself in mist . [It]1358-it is all dark at first , sullen , purple - gray , without variation or stir — [city]1359-city , [Duomo]36-the duomo , [Arno]45-arno , [Fiesole]71-fiesole , and all [[her]271-amelia chain of sister - hills]1360-her chain of sister - hills — one universal frown over [every slope]1361-every slope and jag , over [street and spire]1362-street and spire , over [Campanile]48-the lily campanile with [its]48-the lily campanile marbles , and [Santa Croce]49-santa croce with its dead . But now , as it draws on towards sun - setting , in the western sky there comes a beginning of light , a faint pale tint at first , but quickly broadening across the firmament , while the whole huge cloud canopy is drawn aside like a curtain , and , as a great bright eye from under bent brows , the lowering sun sends arrows of radiance over plain , and [river]1363-river , and [city]1359-city . All of a sudden there is a vertical rain of dazzling white rays on [the plain]1365-the plain , and the olive shadows , merged all the afternoon in the universal gray , fall long and soft upon the blinding green of the young corn . [He]1366-you has forgotten [Amelia]271-amelia . Oh , that [that other , that creature herself made out of sun - rays and sweet rain - drops]1367-that other , that creature herself made out of sun - rays and sweet rain - drops , were beside [him]1366-you , [her]271-amelia pulses beating , as they so surely would , to [his]1366-you tune , [her]271-amelia whole tender being quivering with delicate joy at this heavenly spectacle . [Someone]529-someone touches [him]1366-you on the shoulder , and [he]1366-you starts violently . Has the intensity of [his]1366-you invocation called [her]271-amelia spirit out of [her]271-amelia light body , and is [she]271-amelia indeed beside [him]1366-you ? " What a bad conscience [you]1366-you must have ! Did [you]1366-you think that [I]203-byng was [a bailiff]4055-a bailiff ? "[203-byng] cries [Mrs. Byng]203-byng , laughing . " Where is [Amelia]271-amelia ? "[1366-you] [he]1366-you asks , rather curtly , the memory of [Byng]203-byng 's communication about [[his]1366-you mother]3511-his mother being too fresh in [his]1366-you mind to make it possible for [him]1366-you to answer [her]3511-his mother in [her]3511-his mother own rallying key . " What have [you]3511-his mother done with [Amelia]271-amelia ? "[3511-his mother] " What a ' Stand - and - deliver ' tone ! "[271-amelia] says [she]271-amelia , laughing still , but looking not unnaturally surprised . " Well , where is [she]271-amelia ? "[271-amelia] glancing round . " [She]271-amelia was here five minutes ago with [Willy]271-amelia . [Poor Amelia]201-amelia ! "[271-amelia] lowering [her]271-amelia voice to a more confidential key . " [I]271-amelia am so glad [you]1366-you have come at last ; [she]271-amelia is patience personified . [I]271-amelia must congratulate [you]1366-you upon the excellent training into which [you]1366-you have got [her]271-amelia , but [I]271-amelia think that [she]271-amelia was beginning to look a little anxious . "[271-amelia] " And [I]1370-he think that [you]1366-you have been giving the reins to [your]1366-you imagination , as usual , "[1370-he] replies [he]1370-he , walking off in a huff . There is [another delightful garden at the back of [the villa]3598-the villa]1371-another delightful garden at the back of the villa , and there , having failed to find [her]271-amelia in the first , [he]1370-he now with growing irritation at [her]271-amelia for not being more immediately conspicuous , seeks [Amelia]201-amelia . It is [a sheltered leisurely paradise]1373-a sheltered leisurely paradise , where white rose - trees , with millions of bursting buds , are careering over the walls in leafy luxuriance , where double wallflowers — [bloody warriors]1374-bloody warriors , [one]501-one should call [them]1374-bloody warriors , if one could connect any warlike idea with this Eden of scented peace — stocks in fragrant row are flowering as [we]1376-we [Britons]292-britons never see [them]1374-bloody warriors flower in [[our]1376-we chary isle]1377-our chary isle , save in the plates of [[a Gardeners]1378-a gardeners ' Chronicle]1379-a gardeners ' chronicle . But among [them]1374-bloody warriors [he]1370-he finds no trace of [his]1370-he homely English blossom . [He]1370-he finds , indeed , [him]1380-him who had been named as [[her]271-amelia late companion]1381-her late companion , [Byng]203-byng ; but it is not with [Amelia]201-amelia , but with [one of [the pretty young daughters of [the house]986-the house]1383-the pretty young daughters of the house]1382-one of the pretty young daughters of the house that [he]1370-he is pacing the straight walk in lively dialogue . [Jim]181-jim accosts [him]1370-he formally : " [I]181-jim understood that [Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson was with [you]1370-he ? Do [you]1370-he happen to know where [she]201-amelia is ? "[181-jim] [Byng]203-byng stops short in [his]1370-he leisurely pacing . " Why , where is [she]201-amelia ? "[1370-he] [he]1370-he says , looking round , as [[his]1370-he mother]3511-his mother had done , but with a more guilty air . " [She]201-amelia was here five minutes ago . Where can [she]201-amelia have disappeared to ? "[1370-he] It is but too obvious that in greeting and being greeted by [[their]1386-their numerous acquaintances]1387-their numerous acquaintances , both [poor [Amelia]201-amelia 's chaperon]1388-poor amelia 's chaperon and that [[chaperon]1389-chaperon 's son]1390-chaperon 's son have completely forgotten [her]201-amelia existence . Always nervously afraid of being burdensome , [Jim]181-jim feels convinced from what [he]181-jim knows of [her]201-amelia character that [she]201-amelia is going about in unobtrusive forlornness , the extreme smallness of [[her]201-amelia Florentine acquaintances]1391-her florentine acquaintances making it unlikely that [she]201-amelia has found [anyone]3161-anyone to supply the place of [the friends who have become so entirely oblivious of [her]201-amelia]1393-the friends who have become so entirely oblivious of her . The conviction , pricking [his]181-jim conscience as [he]181-jim hastens contritely away from [the vainly - repentant Byng]1394-the vainly - repentant byng , lends speed and keenness to [his]181-jim search . But thorough and earnest as it is , it is for some time quite unsuccessful . [She]201-amelia makes one of [no group]1395-no group , [she]201-amelia loiters under [no Banksia rose - bower]1396-no banksia rose - bower , [she]201-amelia is [no gazer from [the terrace]908-the terrace at [gold - misted valley]1399-gold - misted valley or [aureoled town]1400-aureoled town]1397-no gazer from the terrace at gold - misted valley or aureoled town , [she]201-amelia is to be found neither in [hidden nook]1401-hidden nook , nor [evident path]1402-evident path . [She]201-amelia is not beneath [the loggia]3601-the loggia , [she]201-amelia is nowhere out - of - doors . [She]201-amelia must then , in [her]201-amelia loneliness , have taken refuge in [the house]986-the house . [He]181-jim finds [himself]181-jim in [a long , noble room]1405-a long , noble room , with a frescoed ceiling , [a room full of signs of recent habitation and recent tea]1406-a room full of signs of recent habitation and recent tea , but which has apparently been deserted for the sunset splendours on [the terrace]908-the terrace . [He]181-jim can see [no single occupant]1408-no single occupant . [He]181-jim walks slowly down [it]1405-a long , noble room to assure [himself]181-jim of the fact of [its]1405-a long , noble room entire emptiness . By a singular and unaccountable freak of [the builders]1409-the builders , the windows are set so high in the wall that each has had to have a little raised daïs erected before it to enable [the inmates]1410-the inmates to look comfortably out . Upon each small platform stands a chair or two , and low over them the curtains sweep . As [he]181-jim passes one recess , [he]181-jim notices that the drapery is stirring a little , and examining more closely , sees the tail of a well - known gown — of that gown which has met with [his]181-jim nearest approach to approval among [Amelia]201-amelia 's rather scanty stock — peeping from beneath the stiff rich folds of the old Italian brocade . It is the work of a second to sweep [the latter]423-the latter aside , and discover [[his]181-jim poor fiancée]1412-his poor fiancée all alone , and crouching desolately in a low arm - chair . There is something so unlike [her]201-amelia in the attitude , something so different from [her]201-amelia usual uncomplaining , unpretending fortitude , something so disproportioned to the cause — [his]181-jim own careless but not criminal delay , as [he]181-jim supposes — in the despair evidenced by [her]201-amelia whole pose , that [he]181-jim feels at once terrified and angry . In a second [he]181-jim , too , has stepped up on to the little platform beside [her]201-amelia . " [Amelia]201-amelia ! "[181-jim] [he]181-jim cries . " [Amelia]201-amelia ! What are [you]201-amelia doing up here ? With whom are [you]201-amelia playing hide - and - seek ? "[181-jim] [Her]201-amelia words and [her]201-amelia smiles are apt to be prompt enough , Heaven knows , to spring out , answering [his]181-jim least hint ; but now [she]201-amelia neither speaks nor moves a muscle of [her]201-amelia face . [She]201-amelia scarcely starts at all at [his]181-jim sudden apparition and address , and no light comes across [her]201-amelia features — those features which , now that [he]181-jim looks at them more closely , [he]181-jim sees to be set in a much more pinched pallor than even three watching nights and a week of airless worry can account for . " Are [you]181-jim ill ? "[201-amelia] " No ; [I]201-amelia am not ill . "[201-amelia] The sting of irritation which , mixed with genuine alarm , had besieged [Jim]181-jim 's mind on [his]181-jim first realizing [her]201-amelia crouched and unnatural attitude , now entirely supersedes any other feeling . Is the accidental delay of half an hour , an hour , say even an hour and a half , enough to justify such a parade of anguish as this ? " Is it possible , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim inquires , in a tone of cold displeasure , " that [I]181-jim am to attribute this — this state of things — to [my]181-jim being accidentally late ? It was a mere accident : it is not like [you]201-amelia to make a scene . [I]181-jim do not recognise [you]201-amelia ; [I]181-jim am very sorry that [I]181-jim was late , and that [I]181-jim have made [you]201-amelia angry . "[181-jim] The chill reproach of [his]181-jim words seems to rouse [her]201-amelia to a state more akin to [her]201-amelia natural one , to the humble and unexacting one which is habitual to [her]201-amelia . " Angry ! "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia repeats : " angry with [you]181-jim for being late ? Oh , [you]181-jim are quite mistaken ! In all these years how often have [I]201-amelia been angry with [you]201-amelia ? "[201-amelia] There is such a meek upbraiding in [her]201-amelia tone that [his]181-jim ill - humour gives way to a vague apprehension . " Then what is it ? "[181-jim] [he]181-jim cries brusquely ; " what is it all about ? [I]201-amelia think [I]201-amelia have a right to ask [you]201-amelia that ; since [I]201-amelia saw [you]201-amelia last something must have happened to [you]201-amelia to produce this extraordinary change . "[201-amelia] [She]201-amelia heaves a long dragging sigh . " Something has happened to [me]201-amelia ; yes , something has happened ! "[201-amelia] " But what — what kind of a something ? [I]181-jim have a right to know — [I]181-jim insist upon knowing ; tell [me]181-jim ! "[181-jim] [He]181-jim has grasped both [her]201-amelia hands , whose unnatural coldness [he]181-jim feels even through [her]201-amelia rather ill - fitting gloves . So strange and mean a thing is human nature that even at this moment it flashes across [him]181-jim , with a sense of annoyance , what bad gloves [Amelia]201-amelia always wears . However , [he]181-jim is not troubled with them long , for [she]201-amelia takes them and [her]201-amelia cold hands quietly back . " [I]201-amelia will tell [you]181-jim , there is no question of insisting . [I]201-amelia should have told [you]181-jim anyhow ; but not here"—glancing[201-amelia] nervously round the dropped curtains—"not now ! "[201-amelia] " Why not here ? Why not now ? "[201-amelia] [Her]201-amelia face quivers . " [I]201-amelia could not , "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia says piteously . " [I]201-amelia do not quite know how [I]201-amelia shall get through telling it ; it must be somewhere — somewhere where it will not matter if [I]201-amelia do break down ! "[201-amelia] [He]181-jim stares at [her]201-amelia in an unfeigned bewilderment , again slightly streaked with wrath . " Have [you]181-jim gone mad , [Amelia]201-amelia ? or are [you]181-jim taking a leaf out of [Sybilla]221-sybilla 's book ? If [you]181-jim do not clear up this extraordinary mystification at once , [I]181-jim shall be compelled to believe either the one or the other . "[181-jim] Again [her]201-amelia face contracts with pain . " Oh , if it were only a mystification ! "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia says , with a low cry . " [I]201-amelia can not tell [you]181-jim here ; it is physically impossible to [me]201-amelia . But do not be afraid"—with[201-amelia] an accent of bitterness , which [he]181-jim is quite at a loss to account for—"you shall not have long to wait ; [I]1413-i will tell [you]181-jim , without fail , to - morrow ; to - morrow morning , if [you]181-jim like . Come as early as [you]181-jim please , [I]1413-i shall be ready to tell [you]181-jim ; and now would [you]181-jim mind leaving [me]1413-i ? [I]1413-i want to have a few moments to [myself]1413-i before [I]1413-i see [anybody]3681-anybody — before [I]1413-i see [Mrs. Byng]203-byng ; will [you]181-jim please leave [me]1413-i ? "[1413-i] It is so apparent that [she]1413-i is in deadly earnest , and resolute to have [her]1413-i request complied with , that [he]181-jim can do nothing but step dizzily down off the little daïs , feeling as if [the world]3184-the world were turning round with [him]181-jim . A quarter of an hour later [he]181-jim sees [her]1413-i leaving [the party]3587-the party with [Mrs. Byng]203-byng , looking as simple , as collected , and not very perceptibly paler than usual . There is always something in the nature of [a mountain]1416-a mountain in a night that is interposed between [us]1417-us and either any promised pleasure or any threatened pain . In the case of pleasure , [we]1417-us are naturally in a hurry to scale it , in order to see how full of sunshine and flowers is [the happy valley on the other side]1418-the happy valley on the other side ; and in the case of pain , [we]1417-us are all scarcely less eager to ascertain how deep is [the abyss]1419-the abyss , how choking [the swamp]1420-the swamp , how angry the waves that wait [us]1417-us beyond [the dusty hill]1421-the dusty hill . [Burgoyne]181-jim has no expectation of finding anything agreeable on the further slope of [[his]181-jim mountain]1422-his mountain , and yet the time seems long to [him]181-jim , till [he]181-jim has climbed [its]1422-his mountain crest , and slidden down [its]1422-his mountain other side . Early and splendid as is the new light that takes possession of [him]181-jim and [[his]181-jim shutterless bedroom]1423-his shutterless bedroom , [he]181-jim upbraids it as a laggard ; and the hours that pace by till [the one appointed for the explanation of yesterday]1424-the one appointed for the explanation of yesterday 's mystery seem to [him]181-jim to hobble on crutches . What can [Amelia]201-amelia have to say to [him]181-jim that needs such a pomp of preparation ? What can have turned [Amelia]201-amelia into [a Tragedy Queen]1425-a tragedy queen ? What miracle can have made [her]201-amelia take the imperative mood ? For it was the imperative mood unquestionably which , contrary to all precedent , [she]201-amelia had made use of when [she]201-amelia had commanded [him]181-jim , most gently it is true , since , being by [her]201-amelia nature gentle , [she]201-amelia can do nothing ungently , to leave [her]201-amelia . [He]181-jim absolutely laughs at the topsy - turviness of the idea . What can [she]201-amelia have to say that requires so carefully selected a spot to say it in?—a spot where " it does not matter if [she]201-amelia does break down . "[201-amelia] What , in [Heaven]197-heaven 's name , can [she]201-amelia be going to say that inspires [her]201-amelia with such a cold - blooded intention beforehand of breaking down ? [Jim]181-jim 's state of mind is something that of [the Baron]1426-the baron 's in " On ne badine pas avec l'amour , "[1426-the baron] on hearing that [[his]181-jim daughter 's governess]1427-his daughter 's governess had been turning somersaults in [a field of luzerne]1428-a field of luzerne . " Non , en vérité , non , mon ami , je n'y comprends absolûment rien . Tout cela [me]181-jim paraît une conduite désordonnée , il est vrai , mais sans motif comme sans excuse . "[181-jim] If [she]201-amelia were [any other woman]1429-any other woman , [he]181-jim should ascribe [her]201-amelia behaviour to some tiresome but passing tantrum , evoked by [his]181-jim delay in appearing ? But in the past eight years how many hundred times has [he]181-jim kept [her]201-amelia waiting ? and has [she]201-amelia ever failed to meet [him]181-jim with the same meek good - humour that has not had even a tinge of reproachful forgiveness in it . As [she]201-amelia [herself]201-amelia had said , " In all these years how often have [I]201-amelia been angry with [you]181-jim ? "[201-amelia] [He]181-jim has been angry with [her]201-amelia times out of mind , angry with [her]201-amelia on a thousand unjust and unkind counts ; angry with [her]201-amelia for [her]201-amelia slowness , [her]201-amelia bad complexion , [her]201-amelia want of a sense of humour ; for a hundred things that [she]201-amelia can not help , that [she]201-amelia would have altered — oh , how gladly!—if [she]201-amelia could ! But how often has [she]201-amelia been angry with [him]181-jim ? In vain [he]181-jim searches [his]181-jim memory , hoping to overtake some instance of ill - humour , or even pettishness , that may make the balance between [them]1430-they hang a little more equal . But in vain . [She]201-amelia has never been angry with [him]181-jim . And even now neither [her]201-amelia face nor [her]201-amelia manner — whatever else of strange and unparalleled [they]1430-they may have conveyed — have conveyed the idea of anger . But if not anger , what then can be the cause that has produced a change so startling in one so little given to impulsive action or eccentricities of emotion ? Can [she]201-amelia have heard anything about [him]181-jim ? anything to [his]181-jim discredit ? [He]181-jim searches [his]181-jim conscience , but whether it be that that organ is not a particularly sensitive one , or that it really has no damaging facts to give up , it is silent , or almost so . [He]181-jim has perhaps been rather slack in [his]181-jim attendance upon [her]201-amelia of late , but at [her]201-amelia own bidding . At [his]181-jim visits to the [Le Marchants]261-the le marchants ' [no one]819-no one could take exception , dictated as [they]1430-they so obviously have been by philanthropy , and [his]181-jim conversations with [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth — how few and scant ! [his]181-jim heart heaves a rebellious sigh at their paucity — might be proclaimed without excision at the market cross . [Our]1432-our thoughts are [our]1432-our own , and are , moreover , so safely padlocked in [our]1432-our minds that [he]181-jim does not think it worth while to inquire whether , if [[his]181-jim future wife]776-his future wife could have looked in and seen the restive fancies capering , saddleless and bridleless , there , [she]201-amelia might have been justified in assuming a crouching attitude and a sorrowfully commanding manner . [He]181-jim is as far as ever from solving the problem , when — for once in [his]181-jim life before [his]181-jim time at [the rendezvous]1434-the rendezvous — [he]181-jim presents [himself]181-jim at the familiar door . It is opened to [him]181-jim by [Amelia]201-amelia [herself]201-amelia . [She]201-amelia has often done it before , seeming to know by instinct [his]181-jim ring from that of [any other person]1435-any other person , but to - day the familiar action disconcerts [him]181-jim . [He]181-jim had expected to be received with a formality and pomp of woe such as yesterday had seemed to threaten ; and here is [Amelia]201-amelia looking exactly like [her]201-amelia ordinary self , except that [she]201-amelia is perhaps rather more carefully dressed than usual ; but that may be due to the fact of [her]201-amelia having , for the first time , assumed the fresh calico gown , which the high summer of the Italian April morning seems to justify . Whether it be due to the calico gown or not , there is an indisputable air of gala about [her]201-amelia , and [she]201-amelia is smiling . A revulsion of feeling comes over [the man]1436-the man , to whom [her]201-amelia tragic semi - swooning airs had given a wakeful night . It was a tantrum after all , then ; a storm in a teacup . And now [her]201-amelia common sense has come to the rescue , and [she]201-amelia has seen the folly of quarrelling with [her]201-amelia bread and butter . These reflections naturally do not translate themselves into responsive smiles on [his]181-jim face , but [she]201-amelia does not seem to notice [his]181-jim dour looks . " [I]201-amelia have a proposal to make to [you]181-jim , "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia says , still smiling . " [Father]225-father is so well this morning , quite easy , and [he]225-father has been wheeled into [the sitting - room]1315-the sitting - room to see [Sybilla]221-sybilla . [She]221-sybilla has been very good about [him]225-father this time , and quite believes that [he]225-father has been really bad . "[201-amelia] " How good of [her]221-sybilla ! "[181-jim] comments [Jim]181-jim grimly ; " it would be so easy and so amusing to play at having a swollen toe , would not it ? "[181-jim] " And so , "[200-miss wilson] continues [Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson , wisely ignoring [his]181-jim fleer at [[her]201-amelia sister]720-her sister , " [I]200-miss wilson am perfectly free , and [I]200-miss wilson want [you]720-her sister to take [me]200-miss wilson somewhere , some little drive or expedition ; [you]720-her sister see , "[200-miss wilson] with a conciliatory glance at [her]201-amelia own modest finery , " [I]200-miss wilson counted upon [your]720-her sister saying ' yes ' ; [I]200-miss wilson dressed so as not to keep [you]720-her sister waiting . "[200-miss wilson] Every word of this sentence confirms [Burgoyne]181-jim in the idea implanted by [her]201-amelia first address . This is [her]201-amelia amende , and [she]201-amelia is quite right to make it . But [she]201-amelia would have been more right still if [her]201-amelia conduct had not rendered it necessary . [Amelia]201-amelia is not the type of woman who through life will gain much by pouts . Perhaps , by - and - by , very kindly and delicately , [he]181-jim may obliquely hint this to [her]201-amelia . But all that [he]181-jim says aloud is the rather stiff acquiescence conveyed in the words : " By all means . [I]181-jim am quite at [your]720-her sister service . "[181-jim] " And now where shall [we]4058-we go ? "[201-amelia] Into [Burgoyne]181-jim 's mind comes the odious thought that [he]181-jim would not put it past [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed to say stupid things even about [the Tuscan landscape]1440-the tuscan landscape , but [he]181-jim only awaits [her]605-his betrothed decision in a respectful silence while helping [her]605-his betrothed into [a fiacre]3420-a fiacre . " It would be a sin to be under any roof to - day but this one , "[605-his betrothed] [she]605-his betrothed says , looking up to the immeasurable azure bridge above [her]605-his betrothed head ; " would [you]181-jim mind — could [you]181-jim spare time to go to [Fiesole]71-fiesole ? "[605-his betrothed] [His]181-jim only answer is to repeat the word [Fiesole]71-fiesole to [the driver]1442-the driver , who , with the inevitable tiny poodle - shaven dog beside [him]1442-the driver , is awaiting the order as to [his]1442-the driver destination . It is but a little way to [Fiesole]71-fiesole , as [we]1443-we all know , but yet , as [the slow hired vehicle]1444-the slow hired vehicle crawls up [the steep ascent]1445-the steep ascent , with [the driver]1442-the driver walking alongside , or even lagging behind , there would be time and opportunity to say a good deal . But [Amelia]201-amelia says next to nothing . Perhaps the heat makes [her]201-amelia sleepy , for it is so hot , so hot between the garden walls , where the rose hedges are beginning to show a pale flush of plenteous pink among their multitude of green buds . Young , indeed , just born as the roses are , the highway dust has already powdered them with its ash - toned white . [He]181-jim does not know it at the time , but those dust - filmed rosebuds have found a home in [his]181-jim memory from which no after - sights , however numerous , will dislodge [them]1447-their . [They]1447-their have reached [the village]1448-the village , and left [[their]1447-their carriage]1449-their carriage , and begun , silently still , to ascend the steep lane up which the feet of [most of [Europe]87-europe and [America]28-america]1450-most of europe and america have in turn climbed to see the famous view that rewards the little effort . Past [the cottages]1451-the cottages , whose inmates , tranquilly sitting in [their]1447-their doorways , or leaning idly against [their]1447-their door - posts , have probably seen all that is illustrious , notorious , history - making of the day , pass pantingly . Is there [a prime minister]1452-a prime minister , [a princess]1453-a princess , [a poet]1454-a poet , [a prima donna , of the time]1455-a prima donna , of the time , that has not toiled up the steep path to the welcome rest of the bench on [the high plateau]1456-the high plateau , on [the hillside]1457-the hillside ? [Jim]181-jim and [Amelia]201-amelia are certainly not likely to figure in the annals of [their]1447-their time , but [the peasants]1458-the peasants look at [them]1447-their with as much or as little interest as if [they]1458-the peasants were . [An immortal]1459-an immortal , unless [his]1459-an immortal immortality is printed on [his]1459-an immortal back in letters as large as those that announce [Colman]294-colman 's mustard to [the world]3184-the world , has , to the vulgar , very much the air of [one of [themselves]1458-the peasants]1461-one of themselves . [[Our]1462-our friends]3256-our friends have reached the haven of the stone seat , and , thanks to the earliness of the hour , have it all to [themselves]3256-our friends , save for [a trio of sunburnt women of [the people]1465-the people]1464-a trio of sunburnt women of the people , with handkerchiefs tied over [their]1464-a trio of sunburnt women of the people tanned heads , who tease [them]1464-a trio of sunburnt women of the people to buy straw hand - screens . And when [they]3256-our friends have bought [a couple]1466-a couple , and made it kindly but distinctly evident that no amount of worrying will induce [them]3256-our friends to buy any more , even these leave [them]3256-our friends in peace and descend [the hill]1467-the hill again , in search of [newer victims]1468-newer victims . [They]3256-our friends are alone under the sky 's warm azure . Beneath [their]3256-our friends eyes spreads one of those nobly lovely spectacles that Italy and spring , hand in hand , alone can offer . To some , indeed , it may seem that the prospect from [the [Bellosguardo]61-bellosguardo side of [the valley]1312-the valley]1469-the bellosguardo side of the valley is even more beautiful , since [Fiesole]71-fiesole , sitting so high as [she]1471-she does , dwarfs [the opposite hills]1472-the opposite hills , and makes [the looker]3611-the looker lose [their]3611-the looker wavy line . They seem flat in comparison , [the plain]1365-the plain appears wider , [the beloved city]1475-the beloved city more distant , and does not show the same exquisite distinctness of [separate tower]1476-separate tower and spire and [palace]3239-palace . But yet such comparison is mere carping . Who can wish for a sight more divinely suave and fair than this from the bench above [Fiesole]71-fiesole ? Not a breath of smoke dares to hang about [the glorious old town]1478-the glorious old town , dimming its lustre , and between [them]3256-our friends and it what a spread of manifold colour , of more " mingled hue "[3256-our friends] than the rainbow 's " purfled scarf doth show ! "[3256-our friends] The moon - tinted olives , twilight and ghostly , even in the dazzling radiance of this superb morning hour , with the blinding green of the young corn about [their]3256-our friends gray feet , the cypress taper - flames , the gay white houses , terrace gardened , and , above all , the vast smile of [the Tuscan heaven]1479-the tuscan heaven . At first [Amelia]201-amelia 's muteness seems natural and grateful to [Jim]181-jim , as the outcome of the awe and hush that exceeding beauty breathes on the human heart , but by - and - by , as it is prolonged beyond the limits that seem to [him]181-jim fit or agreeable , it begins to get on [his]181-jim nerves . After having so genuinely and wantonly alarmed [him]181-jim , has [she]201-amelia brought [him]181-jim here , without any expressions of regret or remorse , simply to steep [herself]201-amelia in a silent luxury of selfish enjoyment ? After brooding resentfully on this idea for a considerable time , [he]181-jim translates it into speech . " [I]181-jim thought that [you]201-amelia had something to say to [me]181-jim ? "[181-jim] It seems as if [her]201-amelia soul had gone out into the sun and April - painted [champaign country]1480-champaign country , and that it is only with an effort and a sigh that [she]201-amelia fetches it [home]401-home again : " So [I]201-amelia have . "[201-amelia] " And how much longer am [I]201-amelia to wait for it ? "[201-amelia] There is no indication of any capacity for patience in [his]181-jim tone . [She]201-amelia brings [her]201-amelia look back from [the shining morning city]1482-the shining morning city , and fixes it wistfully upon [him]181-jim . " Are [you]181-jim in such a hurry to hear ? "[201-amelia] The pathetic streak in [her]201-amelia voice , instead of conciliating , chafes [him]181-jim . What is the sense of this paraphernalia of preliminaries ? Why not come to the point at once ? if indeed there is a point — a fact of which [he]181-jim begins to entertain grave doubts . " [I]181-jim do not know what [you]201-amelia call hurry , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim replies drily ; " [I]181-jim have been awaiting this mystic utterance for sixteen or seventeen hours . "[181-jim] [Her]201-amelia sallow cheek takes on a pinky tinge of mortification at [his]181-jim accent . " [You]181-jim are quite right , "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia answers quickly ; " [I]201-amelia have no business to keep [you]181-jim waiting . [I]201-amelia meant to tell [you]181-jim as soon as [we]4063-we got [here]637-here ; [I]201-amelia asked [you]181-jim to bring [me]201-amelia [here]637-here on purpose , only — — "[201-amelia] " [You]201-amelia told [me]181-jim that [you]201-amelia must make the communication at some place where it would not matter if [you]201-amelia did break down , "[181-jim] says [he]181-jim , rather harshly helping [her]201-amelia memory ; " [you]201-amelia must allow that that was not an encouraging exordium . "[201-amelia] Again that pain - evidencing wave of colour flows into [her]201-amelia face . There is such an unloving mockery in [his]181-jim displeased voice . " [I]201-amelia shall not break down , "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia replies , forcing [herself]201-amelia to speak with quiet composure ; " [you]181-jim need not be afraid that [I]201-amelia shall . "[201-amelia] " It ? What IT ? Is this a new riddle ? For Heaven 's sake let [us]4066-us hear the answer to the first before [we]4066-us embark on any fresh one ! "[201-amelia] [His]181-jim angry cheek blanches as [his]181-jim thought flies arrow - quick to the one subject of [his]181-jim perennial apprehension . [Someone]529-someone has been poisoning [her]201-amelia ear with cowardly libels , or yet more dreadful truths about [Elizabeth Le Marchant]193-elizabeth . " It is astonishing , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , in a strangled voice , " how ready [even the best women]4068-even the best women are to believe evil ; what — what evidence have [you]201-amelia of the truth of — of these precious stories ? [His]181-jim ideas are precipitated into such a state of confusion by this blessed possibility that [he]181-jim can only echo in a stupefied tone : " Have known what all along ? "[181-jim] [She]201-amelia has turned round on the stone bench upon which [they]1484-they have hitherto been sitting side by side , and , as [he]181-jim in the eagerness of [his]181-jim listening has done the same thing , [they]1484-they are now opposite to [one another]1485-one another , and [he]181-jim feels as well as sees [her]201-amelia hungry eyes devouring [his]181-jim face . "[201-amelia] It is impossible to deny that [Burgoyne]181-jim 's first impulse is one of relief . [He]181-jim has been mistaken , then . " What who said ? "[181-jim] " [Mrs. Byng]203-byng . "[181-jim] [His]181-jim stupefaction deepens . " [You]181-jim know [she]193-elizabeth took [me]193-elizabeth to the party , but when [we]4069-we reached [the villa]3598-the villa , [I]193-elizabeth found that [she]193-elizabeth knew [so many people]4071-so many people , and [I]193-elizabeth so few , that [I]193-elizabeth should only be a burden to [her]193-elizabeth if [I]193-elizabeth kept continually by [her]193-elizabeth side , and as [I]193-elizabeth was rather tired — [you]181-jim know that [I]193-elizabeth had not been in bed for two or three nights — [I]193-elizabeth thought [I]193-elizabeth would go into [the house]986-the house and rest , so as to be quite fresh by the time [you]181-jim came .
