"[181-jim] [He]181-jim is out of [the room]442-the room and out of [the hotel]1144-the hotel before [[his]181-jim companions]3675-his companions can take exception to [his]181-jim disappearance . For some time [he]181-jim walks along aimlessly , [his]181-jim mind a jumble of misery , and dull , remorseful anxiety about [Amelia]201-amelia ; intolerable comparisons between [his]181-jim own lot and [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend 's ; sharp knives of jealousy as often as — which is almost unintermittently — [his]181-jim imagination wings its cruel way to [the Piazza d'Azeglio]3491-the piazza d'azeglio — through one opulent week , [[his]181-jim Piazza]1858-his piazza . At this moment — this moment , while [his]181-jim own leaden feet are treading goalless the hot flags that for [him]181-jim lead nowhere — [Byng]251-byng is enthroned with [her]201-amelia in [the heaven of [the mean little salon]1860-the mean little salon]1859-the heaven of the mean little salon . [He]251-byng unconsciously shows [his]251-byng teeth in a stern smile to [the surprised passers - by]1861-the surprised passers - by . [He]251-byng had jeered [Byng]251-byng for [his]251-byng hyperboles , and now [he]251-byng is out - hyperboling [him]251-byng . What a detestable verb [he]181-jim has invented ! [He]251-byng laughs out loud . Are [they]1862-they sitting at the window , looking out at the judas tree and [the Paulownia]100-the paulownia ? Not [they]1862-they ! The window is commanded to a certain extent by [the roadway]1863-the roadway . The window is for [acquaintances]822-acquaintances , [banal acquaintances]1865-banal acquaintances , like [himself]251-byng — no place for the permitted freedoms of exquisite new love . Are [they]1862-they then on the sofa , the vulgar walnut sofa , over which [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth has thrown [her]193-elizabeth blue Neapolitan tablecloth ? It is a little sofa , scarcely room for two upon [it]1866-it , but , oh ! plenty of room for [them]1862-they ! Or are [they]1862-they at the piano ? Is [she]193-elizabeth singing [him]251-byng some sugared ditty " lovely well "[193-elizabeth] until [he]251-byng breaks into [her]193-elizabeth song with the storm of [his]251-byng kisses , and [her]193-elizabeth little white hands drop from the keys , and [they]1862-they lie sobbing with ecstasy in [each other]607-each other 's arms ? It is quite certain that [Byng]251-byng will sob . [He]251-byng is always delighted at having an opportunity for turning on the water - works . Is there a bare possibility that [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant may carry [her]189-mrs. le marchant disapprobation to the pitch of impeding by [her]189-mrs. le marchant presence [their]1868-their tête - à - tête ? The idea gives [him]251-byng a momentary alleviation . Why should not [he]251-byng go and see for [himself]251-byng whether it is so ? It will be a method of passing the tedious interval before [he]251-byng can hear [the doctor]1869-the doctor 's verdict on [Amelia]201-amelia . [He]251-byng must at some time or other comply with [Byng]251-byng 's pressing prayer to [him]251-byng to offer [his]251-byng congratulations to [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , and [he]251-byng may as well have a day of complete and perfect pain — pain of various flavours and essences mixed into one consummate draught — a day of which not one hour shall be without its ache . Having come to this conclusion , [his]251-byng aimless walk quickens , and changes into a purposeful striding through [streets]1870-streets and [Piazzas]101-piazzas , till [he]251-byng finds [himself]251-byng standing at the door of 12a . [He]251-byng looks up at the entresol windows — they are all open , but [no one]819-no one is either sitting in or looking out at them . It is as [he]251-byng had thought . The window is too public for [them]1872-them ; neither can [they]1872-them be at the piano , for not a sound of either voice or instrument is wafted down to [him]251-byng . [He]251-byng runs up the stone stairs , and rings the electric bell . The standing before the unopened portal , and the trembling jar of the bell , bring back to [him]251-byng , with a vividness [he]251-byng could do without , those other long - ago days — they seem to [him]251-byng long ago — when [he]251-byng stood there last , with no easy heart even then , but yet with how different anticipations . [He]251-byng has found it hard enough to bear the brunt of [Byng]251-byng 's furious inhuman joy when alone with [him]251-byng . How will [he]251-byng stand it when [he]251-byng sees [them]1873-them together ? [He]251-byng is recalled from these reflections by the opening of the door , and the appearance in it of [the ministering angel who has usually admitted [him]251-byng into [his]251-byng Eden]1874-the ministering angel who has usually admitted him into his eden — [Annunziata]264-annunziata . It strikes [him]251-byng that [Annunziata]264-annunziata looks older and more dishevelled than ever , and is without that benevolent smile of welcoming radiance which [her]264-annunziata hard - featured face generally wears . Nor does [she]264-annunziata , as has been [her]264-annunziata wo nt , stand back to let [him]251-byng pass in almost before [he]251-byng has put [his]251-byng question , as if [she]264-annunziata could not admit [him]251-byng quickly enough . But to - day [she]264-annunziata stands , on the contrary , in the doorway without a smile . In a second the idea flashes across [Jim]181-jim 's mind that [Byng]251-byng has forbidden [anyone]3161-anyone to be let in . It turns [him]251-byng half sick for the moment , and it is with an unsteady voice that [he]251-byng stammers : " The Signora ? [The Signorina]1252-the signorina ? "[251-byng] [Annunziata]264-annunziata lifts [her]264-annunziata shoulders in a dismal shrug , and stretches out [her]264-annunziata hands : " Gone ! "[264-annunziata] " Gone ? [You]264-annunziata mean gone out driving ? "[264-annunziata] Then remembering that [her]264-annunziata English is as minus a quantity as [his]251-byng Italian , [he]251-byng adds in eager explanation , " En fiacre ? "[251-byng] [She]264-annunziata shakes [her]264-annunziata head , and then nods vaguely in the direction of the whole of [the rest of [the world]3184-the world]1876-the rest of the world — the whole , that is , that is not 12 bis . " No , gone ! "[264-annunziata] " But where ? [Dove]309-dove ? "[251-byng] cries [he]251-byng , frantic with irritation at [his]251-byng own powerlessness either to understand or be understood . Again [she]264-annunziata shakes [her]264-annunziata head . " [I]264-annunziata do not know ; [they]4401-they did not say . "[264-annunziata] [He]251-byng gathers this to be [her]264-annunziata meaning , and hurriedly puts another query . " When ? Quando ? "[264-annunziata] But [her]264-annunziata answer being longer and more voluble , [he]251-byng ca n't take in its drift , seeing which [she]264-annunziata retreats a step , and , motioning [him]251-byng with [her]264-annunziata hand to enter , points down [the passage]1878-the passage . [He]251-byng does not require to have the dumb - show of invitation twice repeated , but , rushing past [her]264-annunziata , hurries down [the well - known little corridor]1879-the well - known little corridor to the salon door . [It]1880-it is open , and [he]251-byng stands within . At the first glance it seems to [him]251-byng to wear much [its]1880-it usual air . There is even a score of music standing on the piano , the copper pots are full of rose - branches , and the scaldini brimming with [Firenze]235-firenze 's own lilies , the bit of red Venetian brocade , with the little old tinsel fringe , still hangs over the arm - chair by the fireplace , and the blue Neapolitan table - cover still disguises the vulgarity of the sofa . [He]251-byng has misunderstood [Annunziata]264-annunziata — it is really monstrous to be so helplessly ignorant of the language of [the country [you]1882-you are living in]1881-the country you are living in — or [she]264-annunziata has lost [her]264-annunziata wits , or —— [He]251-byng had thought [the room]442-the room empty , but as [he]251-byng advances a step further into [it]442-the room , [he]251-byng discovers that [he]251-byng is not [the sole occupant]1884-the sole occupant : that lying stretched upon the floor , with [his]251-byng fair head buried in a little pillow , against which [both men]3628-both men have often seen [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's small white cheek resting , is [Byng!—the Byng]251-byng whose riotous , insolent happiness [he]251-byng had doubted [his]251-byng own powers of witnessing without murdering [[him!—the]251-byng splendid felicity of whose lot [he]251-byng has been so bitterly laying beside [his]251-byng own destiny]1886-him!—the splendid felicity of whose lot he has been so bitterly laying beside his own destiny — [the Byng whom [he]251-byng had been gnashing [his]251-byng teeth at the thought of]1887-the byng whom he had been gnashing his teeth at the thought of — at the thought of [him]251-byng lying in [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's arms ! " What does this mean ? "[4374-the person to whom it is addressed] The question has to be twice repeated before [the person to whom it is addressed]4374-the person to whom it is addressed gives any sign of having heard it . [His]251-byng ears must be so deeply embedded in the pillow that the passage to [his]251-byng hearing is blocked . It is not till the interrogation is put a second time , in a louder key , and accompanied by a not very gentle shake of the shoulder , that [he]251-byng at length looks up , and reveals what [Jim]181-jim knows to be , and yet has some difficulty in recognising , as the features of [Byng]251-byng — features so altered , so distorted , so swollen by excessive weeping , that [no one less intimately acquainted with [them]1890-them than [the person who has been already contemplating them , under the influence of a variety of circumstances for a couple of months]1891-the person who has been already contemplating them , under the influence of a variety of circumstances for a couple of months]1889-no one less intimately acquainted with them than the person who has been already contemplating them , under the influence of a variety of circumstances for a couple of months , could possibly put [the owner]1892-the owner 's name to them . [Jim]181-jim has expected that [[his]181-jim young friend]763-his young friend would spend some portion of this day in crying , knowing well both [his]251-byng powers of , and [his]251-byng taste for , " turning on the water - works , "[251-byng] as [he]251-byng but lately cruelly and uncivilly phrased it to [his]251-byng own mind . But the warm tears of emotion , few and undisfiguring , with which [he]251-byng had credited [him]763-his young friend , have not much kinship with the scalding torrents that have made [his]251-byng handsome young eyes mere red blurs on [his]251-byng ashen face , that have furrowed [his]251-byng cheeks , and damped [his]251-byng disordered curls , and taken all the starch out of [his]251-byng immaculate " masher "[251-byng] collar . [They]1894-they have wetted , too , into a state of almost pulp , a crumpled sheet of note - paper , which [his]251-byng head seems to have been burrowing in , upon the pillow . " What does it mean ? "[181-jim] repeats [Burgoyne]181-jim , for the third time , a hideous fear assailing [him]181-jim , at the sight of [the young man]643-the young man 's anguish , that [he]181-jim [himself]181-jim may have mistaken [Annunziata]264-annunziata 's meaning ; that [her]264-annunziata " gone "[181-jim] may have stood for the final one ; that some instant stroke may have snatched [lovely Elizabeth]193-elizabeth away , out of [the world]3184-the world . Surely no catastrophe less than death can account for such a metamorphosis as that wrought in [Byng]251-byng . " Why do [you]393-his friend look like that ? "[181-jim] [he]181-jim goes on , [his]181-jim voice taking that accent of rage which extreme fear sometimes gives . " Why do not [you]393-his friend speak ? "[181-jim] [The other , thus adjured]1897-the other , thus adjured , plainly makes a violent effort for articulation ; but [his]1897-the other , thus adjured dry throat will let pass nothing but a senseless sob . " What does that paper mean ? "[181-jim] goes on [Burgoyne]181-jim , realizing the impotence of [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend to obey [his]181-jim behest , and rendered doubly terrified by it ; " what is it ? what does it say ? Does it — does it — explain anything ? "[181-jim] [He]181-jim points as [he]181-jim speaks to the blurred and rumpled billet , and [Byng]251-byng catches it up convulsively , and thrusts it into [his]181-jim hand . " It is the first letter [I]181-jim ever had from [her]393-his friend , "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , the words rushing out broken and scarcely intelligible upon a storm of sobs , and so flings [his]181-jim head violently down upon the floor again in a new access of furious weeping . [Burgoyne]181-jim holds the paper in [his]181-jim fingers , but for a moment or two [he]181-jim is unable to read it . There is an ugly swimming before [his]181-jim eyes for one thing ; for another , [Byng]251-byng 's treatment has not improved it as a specimen of caligraphy ; but it never in its best days could have been a very legible document . And yet it is not long . Its few words , when at length [he]181-jim makes them out , ran thus : " Good - bye , [I]181-jim was mad yesterday . [I]181-jim shall never marry [you]4402-you ; [I]181-jim have no right to marry [anyone]3161-anyone . For [God]214-god 's sake do not ask [me]181-jim what [I]181-jim mean ; and oh ! do n't , do n't , DON'T come after [me]181-jim ! "[181-jim] There is neither date nor signature . As [Jim]181-jim stands staring at the five crooked , straggling sentences , a great swelling compassion fills [his]181-jim heart . Did ever poor little scribble make it so easy to construct the small shaking hand , and the tender breaking heart that penned it ? An immense pity fills [his]181-jim soul ; yet does it quite fill it ? Is there room besides , in one corner , for a small pinch of devilish joy ? [His]181-jim own words of ill - natured croaking , uttered not an hour ago , to [Cecilia Wilson]222-cecilia , recur to [his]181-jim mind . How little [he]181-jim thought that that prophecy would so soon be fulfilled ! [He]181-jim remains so long motionless and silent , [his]181-jim fingers still holding the paper , whose contents [he]181-jim has long ago mastered , that [Byng]251-byng — the violence of [his]251-byng paroxysm of grief at length exhausted — struggles to [his]251-byng feet and speaks — speaks as well as the catch in [his]251-byng sobbing breath and [his]251-byng quivering lips will let [him]251-byng . " It is not [her]222-cecilia doing ! [You]487-its owner may think it is [her]222-cecilia doing , but [I]1899-the other sadly know it is not ! [I]1899-the other sadly know [her]222-cecilia better than [you]487-its owner do . "[1899-the other sadly] " [I]1899-the other sadly never made any pretensions to knowing [her]222-cecilia well , "[1899-the other sadly] replies [the other sadly]1899-the other sadly , and relinquishing as [he]251-byng speaks the note to [its owner]487-its owner . " Is it likely , [I]251-byng ask [you]487-its owner ? "[251-byng] cries [Byng]251-byng excitedly . " [I]251-byng put it to [you]487-its owner fairly : is it likely that [she]222-cecilia , with [her]222-cecilia seraph nature , all love and burning , [she]222-cecilia that is tender over drowning flies , would have put [me]251-byng to this horrible pain?—O God , [you]487-its owner do not know what pain it is "[251-byng] [ " Do not [I]251-byng ? "[251-byng] aside]—"of [her]222-cecilia own free will ? "[251-byng] " [I]251-byng do not know ; as [you]251-byng say , [I]251-byng do not know [her]222-cecilia well . "[251-byng] says [Byng]251-byng , beginning to walk up and down [the room]442-the room with the tears still rolling down [his]251-byng cheeks , but in [his]251-byng spouting voice — a voice which at once assures [Jim]181-jim of an amelioration in [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend 's condition , and hardens [his]181-jim heart against [him]181-jim . As a broad rule , indeed , it may be laid down that that sorrow which courses through one of the numberless channels cut by [the poets]1903-the poets for it will not bring [its owner]487-its owner to [Waterloo Bridge]102-waterloo bridge . " But what am [I]251-byng saying ? "[251-byng] lapsing out of [his]251-byng quotation into broken - hearted prose again . " It was not [she]222-cecilia ! If [I]181-jim thought it were [she]222-cecilia , could [I]181-jim live a moment ? It is [[her]222-cecilia mother]3300-her mother ; [no sane person]4405-no sane person can doubt that it is [[her]222-cecilia mother]3300-her mother 's doing ! [She]222-cecilia was always so sweetly docile , and [[her]222-cecilia mother]3300-her mother has conceived some prejudice against [me]181-jim . Did not [I]181-jim tell [you]4408-you how barbarously [she]222-cecilia shut the door upon [me]181-jim last night?—shut the door of [[my]181-jim heaven]4409-my heaven in [my]181-jim face just as [I]181-jim thought [I]181-jim had won the right to enter [it]4409-my heaven . Who would not have thought that it was won who had seen [us]4410-us together in [the wood]1745-the wood ? "[181-jim] [Jim]181-jim writhes . " Oh , never mind [the wood]1745-the wood now ! "[181-jim] " [Someone]529-someone has prejudiced [her]222-cecilia against [me]181-jim , but who ? [I]181-jim did not know that [I]181-jim had [an enemy in [the world]3184-the world]4414-an enemy in the world . [Someone]529-someone has told [her]222-cecilia about — about [Oxford]2-oxford — about [my]181-jim being sent down . "[181-jim] [Jim]181-jim is silent . " If it is only that — — "[181-jim] a tearful buoyancy beginning to pierce through [his]181-jim despair . " It is not that . "[181-jim] " [Someone]529-someone has put a spoke in [my]181-jim wheel ; but who ? [You]181-jim are the only person who could , and [you]181-jim , [dear old chap]4418-dear old chap , are [the last person who would , though [you]181-jim were not very encouraging to [me]181-jim last night]4419-the last person who would , though you were not very encouraging to me last night ! [You]181-jim did not ? "[181-jim] There is so direct an interrogation in the last words , accompanied by so confiding a look of affection , that yet has an uneasy touch of doubt in it , that [Jim]181-jim is obliged to answer . " No , [I]181-jim did not put a spoke in [your]181-jim wheel ; but"—his[4420-the admission—"i] honesty forcing [the admission—"I]4420-the admission—"i am not at all so sure that [I]251-byng am [the last person who would have done so]4421-the last person who would have done so , if [I]251-byng could . "[251-byng] [Byng]251-byng has wiped [his]251-byng eyes to clear [his]251-byng vision of the blinding tears , and has again directed them to the note , which [he]251-byng has all this while been alternately pressing against [his]251-byng heart , laying upon [his]251-byng forehead , and crushing against [his]251-byng mouth . " It seems blasphemy to say so of anything that came from [her]4422-her hand , "[251-byng] [he]251-byng says , poring for the hundredth time over each obscure word , " but it reads like nonsense , does it not ? ' [I]251-byng shall never marry [you]181-jim ! [I]251-byng have no right to marry [anyone]3161-anyone ! ' No right ? what does [she]4422-her mean ? "[251-byng] [Jim]181-jim shakes [his]181-jim head sadly . " How can [I]251-byng tell ? "[251-byng] " Do [you]251-byng think it is possible"—lifting[251-byng] [his]251-byng disfigured eyes in horrified appeal to [his]251-byng friend—"it is a dreadful hypothesis , but [I]251-byng can think of no other — that that bright intelligence was clouded — that — that [her]4422-her dear little wits were touched when [she]4422-her wrote this ? "[251-byng] " No , [I]251-byng do not think so . "[251-byng] " [You]251-byng — [you]251-byng are not keeping anything from [me?"—coming]4424-me?"—coming[251-byng] a step nearer , and convulsively clutching [[his]251-byng friend]393-his friend 's arm—"you — [you]251-byng do not know anything — anything that could throw light upon — upon this ? [I]251-byng do not know whether [you]251-byng are conscious of it , but there is something in [your]251-byng manner that might lead [me]251-byng to that conclusion . Do [you]251-byng know — have [you]251-byng heard anything ? "[251-byng] " [I]181-jim know nothing , "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim slowly , and looking uncomfortably away from [the questioner]1254-the questioner , " but [I]181-jim conjecture , [I]181-jim fear , [I]181-jim believe that — that — — "[181-jim] " That what ? "[181-jim] [Byng]251-byng falls back a pace or two , and puts up [his]251-byng hand to [his]251-byng head . " What — what do [you]251-byng mean ? What are [you]251-byng talking about ? [Her]393-his friend past ? What"—soaring[251-byng] into extravagance again—"what can there be written on that white page?—so white that it bedazzles the eyes of even [the angels who read it]4425-the angels who read it . "[251-byng] " [I]181-jim do not know what there is , "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim miserably , irritated almost beyond endurance by this poetic flight , and rendered even more wretched than [he]181-jim was before by the rôle that seems to be forced upon [him]181-jim , of conjecturally blackening [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's character . " How many times must [I]251-byng tell [you]181-jim that [I]251-byng know no more than [you]181-jim , only from — from various indications [I]251-byng have been led to believe that [she]393-his friend has something — some great sorrow behind [her]393-his friend ? "[251-byng] There is a silence , and when it is broken it is infringed by what is not much more than a whisper . " What — what do [you]251-byng mean ; what — what sort of a sorrow ? "[181-jim] " [I]251-byng tell [you]181-jim , [I]251-byng do not know . "[251-byng] [Byng]251-byng 's tears have stopped flowing , and [he]251-byng now lifts [his]251-byng eyes , full of a madness of exaltation , to the ceiling . " [I]251-byng will go to [her]393-his friend , "[251-byng] [he]251-byng cries ; " if sorrow has the audacity to approach [her]393-his friend again , it will have to reckon with [me]251-byng . There is no sorrow , none , in the whole long gamut of woe , for which love such as [mine]251-byng is not a balm . [Reciprocal]311-reciprocal love!"—trailing[251-byng] the words in a sort of slow rapture—"no one that had seen [her]393-his friend in the wood could have doubted that it was reciprocal . "[251-byng] " No doubt , no doubt . "[251-byng] " [I]251-byng will go to her!"—clasping[251-byng] [his]251-byng hands high in the air—"I will pour the oil and spikenard of [my]251-byng adoration into [her]393-his friend gaping wounds ! [I]251-byng will kiss the rifts together , though they yawn as wide as hell — yes , [I]251-byng will . "[251-byng] " For heaven 's sake , do not talk such dreadful gibberish , "[181-jim] breaks in [Jim]181-jim , at length at the end of [his]181-jim patience , which had run quite to the extreme of its tether indeed at the last mention of that ever - recurring wood . " It is a knockdown blow for [you]251-byng , [I]251-byng own , and [I]251-byng would do what [I]251-byng could to help [you]251-byng ; but if [you]251-byng will keep on spouting and talking such terrible bosh — — "[251-byng] " [I]251-byng suppose [I]251-byng am making an ass of [myself]251-byng , "[251-byng] replies [Byng]251-byng , thus brought down with a run from [his]251-byng heroics . " [I]251-byng beg [your]251-byng pardon , [I]251-byng am sure , [old man]3162-old man . [I]251-byng have no right to victimize [you]251-byng , "[251-byng] [his]251-byng sweet nature asserting itself even at this bitter moment ; " but [you]251-byng see it is so horribly sudden . If [you]251-byng had seen [her]4427-her when [I]1907-i parted from [her]4427-her last night at the door ! [She]4427-her lingered a moment behind [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant — just a moment , just time enough to give [me]1907-i one look , one wordless look . [She]4427-her did not speak ; [she]4427-her was so divinely dutiful and submissive that nothing would have persuaded [her]4427-her by the lightest word to imply any censure of [[her]4427-her mother]3300-her mother ; but [she]4427-her gave [me]1907-i just a look , which said plainly , ' It is not [my]1907-i fault that [you]251-byng are turned away ! [I]1907-i would have welcomed [you]251-byng in ! ' Upon that look [I]1907-i banqueted in [heaven]1092-heaven all night . "[1907-i] [He]1907-i stops , choked . " Well ? "[1907-i] " And then this morning , when [I]1908-i got [here]637-here — [I]1908-i think [I]1908-i ran all the way ; [I]1908-i am sure [I]1908-i did , for [I]1908-i saw [people]3155-people staring at [me]1908-i as [I]1908-i passed — to be met by [Annunziata]264-annunziata with the news that [they]3155-people were gone ! [I]1908-i did not believe [her]264-annunziata ; [I]1908-i laughed in [her]264-annunziata face , and then [she]264-annunziata grew angry , and bid [me]1908-i come in and see for [myself]1908-i ! And [I]1908-i rushed past [her]264-annunziata , in here , with [my]1908-i arms stretched out , confident that in one short moment more [she]264-annunziata would be filling them , and instead of her"—dropping[1908-i] upon [his]1908-i knees by the table with a groan—"I find this!"—dashing[1907-i] the note upon the floor—"all that [she]264-annunziata leaves [me]1908-i to fill [my]1908-i embrace instead of [her]264-annunziata is this poor little pillow , that still seems to keep a faint trace of the perfume of [her]264-annunziata delicate head ! "[1908-i] [He]1908-i buries [his]1908-i own in it again as [he]1908-i speaks , beginning afresh to sob loudly . [Jim]181-jim stands beside [him]1908-i , [his]1908-i mind half full of compassion and half of a burning exasperation , and [his]1908-i body wholly rigid . " When did [they]4432-they go ? at what hour ? last night or this morning ? "[181-jim] " This morning early , quite early . "[181-jim] " [They]4432-they have left all [their]4432-they things behind them"—looking[181-jim] round at [the room]442-the room , strewn with the traces of recent and refined occupation . " Yes"—lifting[181-jim] [his]1908-i wet face out of [his]1908-i cushion—"and at first , seeing everything just as usual , even to [her]264-annunziata very workbasket — [she]264-annunziata has left [her]264-annunziata very workbasket behind — [I]181-jim was quite reassured . "[181-jim] " [I]251-byng do not think [they]4432-they had any plans , "[251-byng] says [Byng]251-byng , speaking in a voice which is thick with much weeping ; " [they]4432-they never seemed to [me]251-byng to have any . [She]193-elizabeth was so happy [here]637-here , so gay , there never was anything more lovely than [her]193-elizabeth gaiety , except — except — [her]193-elizabeth tenderness . "[251-byng] " Yes , yes , no doubt . Then [you]1908-i are absolutely without a clue ? "[181-jim] " Absolutely . "[181-jim] " Never , never . On the contrary , in the — — "[1908-i] ( [he]1908-i is going to say " the wood , "[1908-i] but thinks better of it ) , " [we]4436-we were planning many more such expeditions as yesterday 's . At least , [I]1908-i was planning them . "[1908-i] " And [she]193-elizabeth assented ? "[181-jim] " [She]193-elizabeth did not dissent . [She]193-elizabeth met [me]181-jim with a look of divine acquiescence . "[181-jim] [Jim]181-jim turns away [his]181-jim head . [He]181-jim is involuntarily picturing to [himself]181-jim what that look was like , and with what sweet dumb - show it was accompanied . " What powers of hell"—banging[1908-i] [his]1908-i head down upon the table again—"could have wrought such a hideous change in so few hours ? Only ten ! for it was eight in the evening before [I]181-jim left [them]4437-they , and [they]4437-they were off at six this morning . [They]4437-they could have seen [no one]819-no one ; [they]4437-they had received no letters , no telegrams , for [I]181-jim inquired of [Annunziata]264-annunziata , and [she]264-annunziata assured [me]181-jim that [they]4437-they had not . Oh no!"—lifting[181-jim] [his]1908-i face with a gleam of moist hope upon it—"there is only one tenable hypothesis about it — it is not [her]264-annunziata doing at all . [She]264-annunziata wrote this under pressure . It is [her]264-annunziata handwriting , is it not?—though [I]181-jim would not swear even to that . [I]181-jim — [I]181-jim have played the mischief with [my]181-jim eyes"—pulling[181-jim] out [his]1908-i drenched pocket - handkerchief , and hastily wiping them—"so that [I]181-jim can not see properly ; but it is [hers]264-annunziata , is not it ? "[181-jim] " [I]251-byng do not know ; [I]251-byng never saw [her]264-annunziata handwriting ; [she]264-annunziata never wrote to [me]251-byng . "[251-byng] " It was evidently dictated to [her]264-annunziata , "[251-byng] cries [Byng]251-byng , [his]251-byng sanguine nature taking an upward spring again ; " there are clear traces , even in the very way the letters are formed , of its being written to order reluctantly . [She]264-annunziata did it under protest . See how [her]264-annunziata poor little hand was shaking , and [she]264-annunziata was crying all the while , bless [her]264-annunziata ! There , do not [you]4439-you see a blister on the paper — here on this side ? "[251-byng] [Burgoyne]181-jim does not see any blister , but as [he]181-jim thinks it extremely probable that there was one , [he]181-jim does not think [himself]181-jim called upon to wound [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend by saying so . " [I]251-byng declare [I]251-byng think [we]1911-we have got hold of the right clue at last , "[251-byng] cries [Byng]251-byng , [his]251-byng dimmed eyes emitting such a flash as would have seemed impossible to [them]1911-we five minutes ago . " Read in this light , it is not nearly so incomprehensible : ' [I]181-jim shall never marry [you]393-his friend , [I]181-jim have no right to marry [anyone]3161-anyone . ' Of course , [I]181-jim see now ! What an ass [I]181-jim was not to see it at once ! What [she]393-his friend means is that [she]393-his friend has no right to leave [[her]393-his friend mother]3300-her mother ! To anyone who knew [her]393-his friend lofty sense of duty as well as [I]181-jim ought to have done it is quite obvious that that is what [she]393-his friend means . Is not it quite obvious ? is not it as clear as the sun in heaven ? "[181-jim] [Jim]181-jim shakes [his]181-jim head . " [I]181-jim am afraid that it is rather a forced interpretation . "[181-jim] " [I]396-the other do not agree with [you]393-his friend , "[396-the other] rejoins [the other]396-the other hotly ; " [I]396-the other see nothing forced about it . [You]393-his friend do not know as well as [I]396-the other do — how should [you?—her]4442-you?—her power of delicate , self - sacrificing devotion . It is overstrained , [I]396-the other grant [you]393-his friend ; but there it is — [she]393-his friend thinks [she]393-his friend has no right to leave [[her]393-his friend mother]3300-her mother now that [she]393-his friend is all alone . "[396-the other] " [She]393-his friend is not alone ; [she]393-his friend has [[her]393-his friend husband]474-her husband . "[181-jim] " [I]181-jim mean now that [all [her]393-his friend other children]4445-all her other children are married and scattered . There are plenty more — are not there?—though [I]181-jim never could get [her]393-his friend to talk about [them]4445-all her other children . "[181-jim] " There are [two sisters]4446-two sisters and [two brothers]4447-two brothers . "[396-the other] " But [they]4445-all her other children are no longer any good to [[their]4445-all her other children mother]4448-their mother , "[251-byng] persists [Byng]251-byng , clinging to [his]251-byng theory with all the greater tenacity as [he]251-byng sees that it meets with no very great acceptance in [[his]251-byng friend]393-his friend 's eyes ; " as far as [she]393-his friend is concerned they are non - existent . "[251-byng] " [I]396-the other do not know what right [you]181-jim have to say that . "[396-the other] " And so [she]393-his friend , with [her]393-his friend lofty idea of self - sacrifice , immolates [her]393-his friend own happiness on the altar of [her]393-his friend filial affection . It is just like [her!"—going]4449-her!"—going[251-byng] off into a sort of rapture—"blind mole that [I]251-byng was not to divine the motive , which [her]393-his friend ineffable delicacy forbade [her]393-his friend to put into words . [She]393-his friend thought [she]393-his friend had a right to think that [I]251-byng should have comprehended [her]393-his friend without words ! "[251-byng] [He]251-byng has talked [himself]251-byng into a condition of such exalted confidence before [he]251-byng reaches the end of this sentence that [Jim]181-jim is conscious of a certain brutality in applying to [him]251-byng the douche contained in [his]251-byng next words . " [I]181-jim do not know why [you]251-byng should credit [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant with such colossal selfishness ; [she]393-his friend never used to be [a selfish woman]4450-a selfish woman . "[181-jim] But [Burgoyne]181-jim 's cold shower - bath does not appear even to damp the shoulders for which it is intended . murmurs [Byng]251-byng , beginning again to tramp up and down [the little room]1914-the little room , with head thrown back and clasped hands high lifted ; and in [his]181-jim rapt poet voice : [I]0-i must follow [you]1915-you , [sweet]1916-sweet ! Despite [your]1915-you prohibition , [I]0-i must follow [you]1915-you . Then , coming abruptly down to [prose—"Though]4451-prose—"though [they]4452-they left no address , it will of course be possible , easy , to trace [them]4452-they . [I]181-jim will go to [the station]661-the station and make inquiries . [They]4452-they will have been seen . It is out of the question that [she]393-his friend can have passed unnoticed ! No eye that has once been enriched by the sight of [her]393-his friend can have forgotten that heavenly vision . [I]181-jim will telegraph to [Bologna]104-bologna , to [Milan]78-milan , to [Venice]77-venice . Before night [I]181-jim shall have learnt [her]393-his friend whereabouts . [I]181-jim shall be in [the train]675-the train , following [her]393-his friend track . [I]181-jim shall be less than a day behind [her]393-his friend . [I]181-jim shall fall at [her]393-his friend feet , [I]181-jim shall — — "[181-jim] " [You]181-jim are talking nonsense , "[181-jim] answers [Burgoyne]181-jim impatiently ; and yet with a distinct shade of pity in [his]181-jim voice ; " [you]181-jim can not do anything of the kind . When [the poor woman]553-the poor woman has given so very unequivocal a proof of [her]553-the poor woman wish to avoid [you]181-jim , as is implied in leaving [the place]1740-the place at a moment 's notice , without giving [herself]553-the poor woman even time to pack [her]553-the poor woman clothes , it is impossible that [you]181-jim can force [your]181-jim company again upon [her]393-his friend — it would be persecution . "[181-jim] " And do [you]181-jim mean to tell [me]251-byng , "[251-byng] asks [Byng]251-byng slowly , and breathing hard , while the fanatical light dies out of [his]251-byng face , and leaves it chalk white ; " do [you]181-jim mean to say that [I]181-jim am to acquiesce , to sit down with [my]181-jim hands before [me]181-jim , and submit without a struggle to the loss of —— O [my]181-jim God"—breaking[181-jim] out into an exceeding bitter cry—"why did [you]181-jim make [me]181-jim if it were only to rob [me]181-jim of [her]393-his friend ? "[181-jim] " [I]181-jim do not see what other course is open to [you]181-jim , "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim , answering only the first part of [the young sufferer]1917-the young sufferer 's appeal , and ignoring the rhetoric , terribly genuine as is the feeling of which it is the florid expression . " It is evident that [she]393-his friend has some cogent reasons — or at least that appear cogent to [her]393-his friend — for breaking off [her]393-his friend relations with [you]181-jim . "[251-byng] " What cogent reasons can [she]393-his friend have that [she]393-his friend had not yesterday ? "[251-byng] says [Byng]251-byng violently—"yesterday , when [she]393-his friend lay in [my]251-byng arms , and [her]393-his friend lips spoke their acquiescence in [my]251-byng worship — if not in words , yet oh , far , far more — — "[251-byng] " Why do [you]181-jim reiterate these assertions ? "[181-jim] cries [Burgoyne]181-jim sternly , since to [him]181-jim there seems a certain indecency in — even in the insanity of loss — dragging to the eye of day the record of such sacred endearments . " [I]251-byng neither express nor feel any doubt as to the terms [you]181-jim were on yesterday ; what [I]251-byng maintain is that to - day — [I]251-byng do not pretend to explain the why — [she]393-his friend has changed [her]393-his friend mind ; it is not"—with[251-byng] a sarcasm , which [he]181-jim [himself]181-jim at the very moment of uttering it feels to be cheap and unworthy—"it is not the first time in [the world]3184-the world 's history that such a thing has happened . [She]393-his friend has changed [her]393-his friend mind . "[181-jim] " [I]251-byng do not believe it , "[251-byng] cries [Byng]251-byng , [his]251-byng voice rising almost to a shout in the energy of [his]251-byng negation ; " till [her]393-his friend own mouth tell [me]251-byng so [I]251-byng will never believe it . If [I]251-byng thought for a moment that it was true [I]251-byng should rush to death to deliver [me]251-byng from the intolerable agony of such a thought . [You]181-jim do not believe it yourself"—lifting[251-byng] [his]181-jim spoilt sunk eyes in an appeal that is full of pathos to [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend 's harsh face . " Think what condemnation it implies of [her]393-his friend — [her]393-his friend whom [you]181-jim always affected to like , who thought so greatly of [you]181-jim — [[her]393-his friend whose old friend [you]181-jim were — [[her]393-his friend whom [you]181-jim knew in [her]393-his friend lovely childhood]4459-her whom you knew in her lovely childhood]4458-her whose old friend you were — her whom you knew in her lovely childhood ! "[251-byng] " [You]181-jim are right , "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim , looking down , moved and ashamed ; " [I]181-jim do not believe that [she]393-his friend has changed [her]393-his friend mind . What [I]181-jim do believe is that yesterday [she]393-his friend let [herself]393-his friend go ; [she]393-his friend gave way for one day , only for one day , after all , poor soul , to that famine for happiness which , [I]181-jim suppose"—with[181-jim] a sigh and a shrug—"gnaws [us]4460-us all now and then — gave way to it even to the pitch of forgetting that — that something in [her]393-his friend past of whose nature [I]1919-he am as ignorant as [you]181-jim are , which seems to cast a blight over all [her]393-his friend life . "[1919-he] [He]1919-he pauses ; but as [[his]1919-he listener]1920-his listener only hangs silently on [his]1919-he utterance [he]1919-he goes on : " After [you]181-jim left [her]393-his friend , recollection came back to [her]393-his friend ; and because [she]393-his friend could not trust [herself]393-his friend again with [you]181-jim , probably for the very reason that [she]393-his friend cared exceedingly about you"—steeling[1919-he] [himself]1919-he to make the admission—"she felt that there was nothing for it but to go . "[1919-he] Either the increased kindness of [[his]1919-he friend]393-his friend 's tone , or the conviction that there is , at least , something of truth in [his]1919-he explanations , lets loose again the fountain of [Byng]251-byng 's tears , and once more [he]1919-he throws [his]1919-he head down upon [his]1919-he hands and cries extravagantly . " It is an awful facer for [you]1919-he , [I]181-jim know , "[181-jim] says [Burgoyne]181-jim , standing over [him]1919-he , and , though perfectly dry - eyed , yet probably not very much less miserable than the young mourner , whose loud weeping fills [him]1919-he with an almost unbearable and yet compunctious exasperation . " What is [he]1919-he made of ? how can [he]1919-he do it ? "[251-byng] are the questions that [he]1919-he keeps irefully putting to [himself]1919-he ; and for fear lest in an access of uncontrollable irritation [he]1919-he shall ask them out loud , [he]1919-he moves to the door . At the slight noise [he]1919-he makes in opening it [Byng]251-byng lifts [his]251-byng head . " Are [you]1919-he going ? "[251-byng] " Yes ; if it is any consolation to [you]1919-he , [you]1919-he have not a monopoly of wretchedness to - day . Things are not looking very bright for [me]396-the other either . [Amelia]201-amelia is ill . "[396-the other] " [Amelia]201-amelia , "[396-the other] repeats [the other]396-the other , with a hazy look , as if not at first able to call to mind who [Amelia]201-amelia is ; then , with a return of consciousness , " Is [Amelia]201-amelia ill ? Oh poor [Amelia]201-amelia ! [Amelia]201-amelia was very good to [her]201-amelia . [Amelia]201-amelia tried to draw [her]201-amelia out . [She]201-amelia liked [Amelia]201-amelia ! "[251-byng] " Well"—with[251-byng] an impatient sigh—"unfortunately that did not hinder [Amelia]201-amelia from falling ill . "[251-byng] " [She]201-amelia is not ill really?"—his[251-byng] inborn kind - heartedness struggling for a moment to make head against the selfishness of [his]251-byng absorption . " [I]251-byng do not know"—uneasily—"I[251-byng] am going back to [the hotel]1144-the hotel to hear [the doctor]1869-the doctor 's verdict . Will [you]1925-you walk as far as to [the Anglo - Américain]3323-the anglo - américain with [me]0-i ? There is no use in [your]1925-you staying [here]637-here . " But at this proposition [the lover]4461-the lover 's sobs break out louder and more infuriating than ever . "[0-i] [I]0-i will stay [here]637-here till [I]0-i die — till [I]0-i am carried over the threshold that [her]1929-her cruel feet have crossed . Against a resolution at once so fixed and so rational , [Jim]181-jim sees that it is useless to contend . The sun rides high , as [Burgoyne]181-jim issues into the open air , and beats , blinding hot , upon the great stone flags that pave [the Florentine streets]1930-the florentine streets , and seem to have a peculiar power of absorbing and retaining light and heat . [He]181-jim must have been longer in the Piazza d'Azeglio than [he]181-jim had thought , and the reflection quickens [his]181-jim steps as [he]181-jim hurries , regardless of the midsummer blaze — for , indeed , it is more than equivalent to that of [our]1931-our midsummer — back to [the Anglo - Américain]3323-the anglo - américain . As [he]181-jim reaches [it]637-here , [he]181-jim hears , with annoyance , [the hotel]1144-the hotel clocks striking one . [He]181-jim is annoyed , both because the length of [his]181-jim absence seems to argue an indifference to the tidings [he]181-jim is expecting , and also because [he]181-jim knows that it is [the Wilsons]1934-the wilsons ' luncheon hour , and that [he]181-jim will probably find that [they]1934-the wilsons have migrated to [the salle - à - manger]4348-the salle - à - manger . In this case [he]181-jim will have to choose between the two equally disagreeable alternatives of following and watching [them]1934-the wilsons at [their]1934-the wilsons food , or that of undergoing a tête - à - tête with [Sybilla]221-sybilla , who , it is needless to say , does not accompany [[her]221-sybilla family]645-her family to [the public dining - room]1937-the public dining - room ; a tête - à - tête with [Sybilla]221-sybilla , which is , of all forms of social intercourse , that for which [he]181-jim has the least relish . But as [he]181-jim apprehensively opens the salon door , [he]181-jim sees that [his]181-jim fears are unfounded . [They]1934-the wilsons have not yet gone to luncheon ; [they]1934-the wilsons are all sitting in much the same attitudes as [he]181-jim had left [them]1934-the wilsons , except that [Sybilla]221-sybilla is eating or drinking something of a soupy nature out of a cup . There are very few hours of the day or night in which [Sybilla]221-sybilla is not eating something out of a cup . There is that about the entire idleness of [the other couple]863-the other couple which gives [him]181-jim a fright . Are [they]1934-the wilsons too unhappy ? Have [they]1934-the wilsons heard too bad news to be able to settle to any occupation ? Urged by this alarm , [his]181-jim question shoots out , almost before [he]181-jim is inside the door : " Has not [he]181-jim come yet ? Has not [the doctor]1869-the doctor come yet ? "[222-cecilia] " [He]181-jim has been and gone ; [you]181-jim see , [you]181-jim have been such a very long time away , "[222-cecilia] replies [Cecilia]222-cecilia . [She]222-cecilia has no intention of conveying reproach , either by [her]222-cecilia words or tone ; but to [his]181-jim sore conscience it seems as if both carried it . " And what did [he]181-jim say ? "[222-cecilia] " [He]181-jim did not say much . "[222-cecilia] " Does [he]181-jim — does [he]181-jim think that it is anything — anything serious ? "[222-cecilia] " [He]181-jim did not say . "[222-cecilia] " Do [you]222-cecilia mean to tell me"—indignantly—"that[222-cecilia] [you]222-cecilia did not ask [him]181-jim ? " "[222-cecilia] If [you]222-cecilia had been [here]637-here , " replies [Cecilia]222-cecilia , with a not inexcusable resentment , "[222-cecilia] [you]222-cecilia might have asked [him]181-jim [yourself]222-cecilia . " "[222-cecilia] But did not [you]222-cecilia ask [him]181-jim ? " in too real anxiety to be offended at , or even aware of , [her]222-cecilia fleer . "[222-cecilia] Did not [he]181-jim say ? " "[181-jim] [I]0-i do not think [he]181-jim knew [himself]181-jim . " "[181-jim] But [he]181-jim must have thought — [he]181-jim must have had an opinion ! " growing the more uneasy as there seems no tangible object for [his]181-jim fears to lay hold of . "[181-jim] [He]181-jim says it is impossible to judge at so early a stage ; it may be a chill — [I]0-i told [him]181-jim about that detestable excursion yesterday , and [he]181-jim considered it quite enough to account for anything — it may be measles — [they]1940-they seem to be a good deal about ; it may be malaria — there is a good deal of that too . " "[181-jim] And how soon will [he]181-jim know ? How soon will it declare itself ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know . " "[0-i] But has [he]181-jim prescribed ? Is there nothing to be done — to be done at once ? " asks [Jim]181-jim feverishly , chafing at the idea of this inaction , which seems inevitable , with that helpless feeling which [his]181-jim own entire ignorance of sickness produces . "[181-jim] Do not [you]222-cecilia suppose that if there was [we]1941-we should have done it ? " cries [Cecilia]222-cecilia , rendered even more uncomfortable than [she]222-cecilia was before , by the contagion of [his]181-jim anxiety . "[222-cecilia] [We]1941-we are to keep [her]1942-she in bed — there is no great difficulty about that , [poor soul]4077-poor soul ; [she]1942-she has not the least desire to get up ; [she]1942-she seems so odd and heavy ! " "[1942-she] So odd and heavy ? " "[1942-she] Yes ; [I]0-i went in to see [her]1942-she just now , and [she]1942-she scarcely took any notice of [me]0-i ; only when [I]0-i told [her]1942-she that [you]222-cecilia had been to inquire after [her]1942-she , [she]1942-she lit up a little . [I]0-i believe"—with a rather grudging smile—"that[0-i] if [she]1942-she were dead , and [someone]529-someone mentioned [your]222-cecilia name , [she]1942-she would light up . " A sudden mountain rises in [Jim]181-jim 's throat . "[1942-she] If [she]1942-she is not better to - morrow , [Dr. Coldstream]297-dr. coldstream will send [a nurse]1945-a nurse . " "[297-dr. coldstream] But does [he]297-dr. coldstream think it will be necessary ? " "[297-dr. coldstream] [He]297-dr. coldstream does not know . " [Jim]181-jim writhes . It seems to [him]181-jim as if [he]181-jim were being blind - folded , and having [his]181-jim arms tied to [his]181-jim sides by a hundred strong yet invisible threads . "[297-dr. coldstream] Does [no one]819-no one know anything ? " [he]181-jim cries miserably . "[819-no one] [I]0-i have told [you]222-cecilia exactly what [the doctor]1869-the doctor said , " says [Cecilia]222-cecilia , with the venial crossness bred of real anxiety . "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose [you]222-cecilia do not wish [me]0-i to invent something that [he]1869-the doctor did not say ? " "[222-cecilia] Of course not ; but [I]0-i wish [I]0-i had been [here]637-here — [I]0-i wish [I]0-i had been here!"—restlessly . "[0-i] Why were not [you]222-cecilia ? " No immediate answer . "[222-cecilia] Why were not [you]222-cecilia ? " repeats [she]0-i , curiosity , for the moment , superseding [her]0-i disquiet . "[222-cecilia] What prevented [you]222-cecilia ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i could not ; [I]0-i was with [Byng]251-byng . " "[251-byng] With [Byng]251-byng ? " "[222-cecilia] Were not [you]222-cecilia rather de trop ? " chimes in [Sybilla]221-sybilla 's languid voice from the sofa . "[222-cecilia] Rather a bad third ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i was not [a third]1950-a third at all . " "[0-i] Do [you]222-cecilia mean to say , " cries [Cecilia]222-cecilia , [her]222-cecilia countenance tinged with the pink of a generous indignation , "[222-cecilia] that [you]222-cecilia were four — that [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant stayed in [the room]442-the room the whole time ? [I]0-i must say that now that [they]1952-they are really and [bonâ fide]312-bonâ fide engaged , [I]0-i think [she]189-mrs. le marchant might leave [them]1952-they alone together . " "[189-mrs. le marchant] [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant was not there at all . " Then , seeing the open - mouthed astonishment depicted on the faces of [[his]4463-his audience]4464-his audience , [he]4463-his braces [his]4463-his mind to make the inevitable yet dreaded announcement . "[189-mrs. le marchant] [I]0-i had better explain at once that neither [Mrs.]1953-mrs. nor [Miss Le Marchant]240-miss le marchant was there ; [they]1952-they are gone . " "[1952-they] Gone ! " "[1952-they] Yes ; [they]1952-they left [Florence]20-florence at seven o'clock this morning . " There is a moment of silent stupefaction . "[1952-they] [I]0-i suppose , " says [Cecilia]222-cecilia , at last slowly recovering the power of speech , "[0-i] that [they]1952-they were telegraphed for ? [one of [the brothers]4154-the brothers]4153-one of the brothers ? " Never in [his]4463-his life has [Jim]181-jim laboured under so severe a temptation to tell a lie , were it only the modified falsehood of allowing [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's hypothesis to pass uncontradicted ; but even if [he]4463-his were able for once to conquer [his]4463-his constitutional incapacity , [he]4463-his knows that in this case it would be useless . The truth must transpire to - morrow . "[0-i] [I]0-i believe not . " "[0-i] Gone ! " repeats [Cecilia]222-cecilia , in a still more thunderstruck key than before—"and[1952-they] where are [they]1952-they gone ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know . " "[0-i] Why did [they]1952-they go ? " [Jim]181-jim makes an impatient movement , fidgeting on [his]181-jim chair . "[1952-they] [I]0-i can only tell [you]1958-you [their]1952-they actions ; [they]1952-they told [me]0-i [their]1952-they motives as little as [they]1952-they did [you]1958-you . " "[1952-they] Gone ! Why , [they]1952-they never said a word about it yesterday . " This being of the nature of an assertion — not an interrogation — [Jim]181-jim feels with relief that it does not demand an answer . "[1952-they] Gone , at seven o'clock in the morning ! Why , [they]1952-they could not have had time to pack [their]1952-they things ! " "[1952-they] [They]1952-they left [them]1952-they behind . " The moment that this admission is out of [Burgoyne]181-jim 's mouth , [he]181-jim repents having made it ; nor does [his]181-jim regret at all diminish under the shower of ejaculations from [both sisters that it calls forth]4465-both sisters that it calls forth . "[1952-they] Why , it was a regular flit ! [they]1952-they must have taken French leave . " There is something so horribly jarring in the semi - jocosity of the last phrase that [Jim]181-jim jumps up from [his]181-jim chair and walks towards the window , where [Mr. Wilson]202-mr. wilson is sitting in dismal idleness . [Mr. Wilson]202-mr. wilson has never cared much about [the Le Marchants]261-the le marchants , and is now far too deeply absorbed in [his]202-mr. wilson own trouble to have anything but the most inattentive indifference to bestow upon the topic which to [[his]202-mr. wilson daughters]4466-his daughters appears so riveting . [Jim]181-jim blesses [him]202-mr. wilson for [his]202-mr. wilson callousness . But the window of [a small room]4467-a small room is not so distant from any other part of [it]4467-a small room that sounds can not , with perfect ease , penetrate thither , as [Jim]181-jim finds when [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's next eager question pursues [him]181-jim . "[1952-they] Did [Mr. Byng]251-byng know that [they]1952-they were going ? " "[251-byng] No . " There is a pause . "[251-byng] It is absolutely incomprehensible ! " says [Cecilia]222-cecilia , with almost a gasp . "[0-i] [I]0-i never saw [any one human being]1959-any one human being so much in love with [another]1960-another as [she]1961-she was yesterday — there was so little disguise about it , that one was really quite sorry for [her]1961-she — and this morning at cockcrow [she]1961-she decamps and leaves [him]251-byng without a word . " "[1961-she] [You]1962-you are mistaken — [she]1961-she left a note for [him]251-byng . " "[1961-she] [Poor dear boy]1963-poor dear boy ! " sighs [Sybilla]221-sybilla , "[1961-she] is not [he]251-byng quite prostrated by the blow ? [I]0-i am not apt to pity [men]512-men generally — [they]512-men are so coarse - grained — but [he]251-byng is much more delicately strung than the general run . " "[0-i] [I]0-i suppose [he]251-byng is frightfully cut up , " says [Cecilia]222-cecilia , with that inquisitiveness as to the details of a great affliction which [we]4468-we are all apt to experience . For some perverse reason , inexplicable even to [himself]251-byng , [Jim]181-jim would like to be able to answer that [[his]251-byng friend]393-his friend is not cut up at all ; but truth again asserting [its]393-his friend empire , [he]251-byng assents laconically , "[0-i] Frightfully ! " "[0-i] How did [he]251-byng take it ? " "[251-byng] How do [people]3155-people generally take such things ? " The impatience of the key in which this is uttered , coupled with the implied side - allusion to an acquaintance with sorrows of a somewhat similar nature on [her]0-i own part , silences the younger and sounder [Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson for a moment , but only for a moment — a moment long enough to be filled by another sighing "[1963-poor dear boy] [Poor dear boy]1963-poor dear boy ! " from [Sybilla]221-sybilla . "[1967-you] [You]1967-you say that [she]1968-she left a note for [him?"—with]4470-him?"—with a renewed light of curiosity in [her]1968-she eyes—"have[1968-she] [you]1967-you any idea what was in it ? " [Jim]181-jim hesitates ; then , "[1968-she] Yes , " [he]181-jim replies ; "[1968-she] but as it was not addressed to [me]0-i , [I]0-i do not think that [I]0-i have any right to repeat it . " "[1968-she] Of course not!"—reluctantly ; "[1968-she] but did it throw no light — absolutely no light at all — upon this extraordinary stampede ? " "[1968-she] No . " "[1968-she] Did not [she]1968-she even tell [him]251-byng where [they]1969-they were going ? " "[1968-she] No . " "[1968-she] Nor whether [they]1969-they were coming back ? " "[1968-she] No . " "[1968-she] Nor ask [him]251-byng to follow [her]1968-she ? " "[1968-she] If [she]1968-she did not tell [him]251-byng where [she]1968-she was going , is it likely that [she]1968-she would ask [him]251-byng to follow [her]1968-she ? " cries [Jim]181-jim irritably , deeply annoyed to find that [he]181-jim is , by the series of negatives that is being forced from [him]181-jim , doing the very thing which [he]181-jim had just denied [his]181-jim own right to do . "[1968-she] It is the most incomprehensible thing [I]0-i ever heard in [my]0-i life . [I]0-i wonder"—with an air of even alerter interest than before—"what[0-i] [Mr. Greenock]259-mr. greenock will say ? Perhaps [he]251-byng will now tell what [he]251-byng knows about [them]1969-they ; if [they]1969-they are gone , there will no longer be any need to conceal it . [I]0-i am afraid this looks rather as if there were something ! " For the second time in one day the mention of [an amiable flâneur]4471-an amiable flâneur 's name makes [Jim]181-jim vault to [his]181-jim feet . "[0-i] Well , [I]0-i will not keep [you]1970-you any longer from [your]1970-you luncheon , " [he]181-jim cries hastily . "[0-i] [I]0-i will call in again later . " "[0-i] Are [you]1970-you going ? " asks [Mr. Wilson]202-mr. wilson dully , lifting [his]202-mr. wilson head from [his]202-mr. wilson chest , upon which it is sunk . "[1970-you] Well , [you]1970-you are about right ; [we]1971-we are not much good to [anyone]3161-anyone when [our]1971-we mainspring is gone . " The phrase strikes cold on [Jim]181-jim 's heart . "[1970-you] Are [you]1970-you going back to [the poor dear boy]1973-the poor dear boy ? " inquires [Sybilla]221-sybilla as [he]1970-you passes [her]221-sybilla . "[1970-you] By - the - bye , if it is not too much trouble , would [you]1970-you mind tucking the Austrian blanket a little closer in on the left side ? " and as [he]1970-you stoops to perform the asked - for service , [she]0-i adds : "[1970-you] Let [him]1970-you know how sincerely [I]0-i sympathize with [him]1970-you ; and if [he]1970-you wants anything quieting for [his]1970-you nerves , tell [him]1970-you that there is nothing that [I]0-i can more conscientiously recommend than — — " But what [Sybilla]221-sybilla can conscientiously recommend is shut into the closing door . Outside that door [Jim]181-jim finds that [Cecilia]222-cecilia has joined [him]1970-you . [Anxiety]313-anxiety has quite banished the not altogether disagreeable curiosity of five minutes ago , from the troubled face [she]222-cecilia lifts to [his]1970-you . "[1970-you] [You]1970-you will come back , will not [you]1970-you ? " [she]222-cecilia asks . "[1970-you] [You]1970-you are not of much use , [I]0-i suppose ; but still , [one]501-one feels that [you]1970-you are there , and [we]1975-we are all so much at [sea]1976-sea . [You]1970-you have not an idea how much [we]1975-we are at [sea]1976-sea — without [her]1978-her . " "[0-i] [I]0-i think that [I]0-i have a very good idea , " [he]1970-you answers mournfully . "[0-i] Tell [me]0-i , [Cis]222-cecilia ; do [you]222-cecilia think [she]1978-her is really very ill ? " As [he]1970-you puts the question , [he]1970-you feels its irrationality . [He]1970-you knows that [the person to whom [he]1970-you is making [his]1970-you futile appeal]4472-the person to whom he is making his futile appeal has already given [him]1970-you all the scanty tidings [she]4472-the person to whom he is making his futile appeal has to give ; yet [he]1970-you can not help indulging a faint hope that [her]4472-the person to whom he is making his futile appeal response to this last query of [his]1970-you may perhaps set [Amelia]201-amelia 's condition in a slightly more favourable light . A look of helpless distress clouds [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's already cloudy face . "[0-i] [I]0-i tell [you]222-cecilia [I]0-i do not know ; [I]0-i am [no judge]1979-no judge ; [I]0-i have seen so little real illness . [Sybilla]221-sybilla would kill [me]0-i if [she]221-sybilla heard [me]0-i say so , would not she"—with a slight parenthetical smile—"but[221-sybilla] [I]0-i have seen so little real illness , that [I]0-i do not know what things mean ; [I]0-i do not know what it means that [she]221-sybilla should be so heavy and stupid . As [I]0-i told [you]222-cecilia before , the only time that [she]221-sybilla roused up at all was when [I]0-i mentioned [your]222-cecilia — " [He]4473-he stops [her]221-sybilla , breaking rudely into [her]221-sybilla sentence . [He]4473-he can not bear to hear that it is only at the magic of [his]4473-he name that [[his]4473-he poor faithful love]4474-his poor faithful love lifts [her]4474-his poor faithful love sick head . "[0-i] Yes , yes ; [I]0-i remember . " "[0-i] [Some one]1980-some one ought to sit up with [her]221-sybilla , [I]0-i am sure , " pursues [Cecilia]222-cecilia , still with that same helpless air of disquiet ; "[1980-some one] [she]221-sybilla ought not to be left alone all night ; but who ? [I]0-i should be more than willing to do it , but [I]0-i know that [I]0-i should fall asleep in five minutes , and [I]0-i am such a heavy sleeper that , when once [I]0-i am off , there is no possibility of waking [me]0-i . [I]0-i am [a dreadfully bad sick - nurse]1981-a dreadfully bad sick - nurse ; [father]3390-father can never bear to have [me]0-i near [him]3390-father when [he]3390-father has the gout . " [Burgoyne]181-jim is too well aware of the perfect truth of this last statement to attempt any contradiction of it . "[201-amelia] [Amelia]201-amelia has always been [the one to sit up when any one was ill]1983-the one to sit up when any one was ill , " continues [she]0-i woefully ; "[201-amelia] and even now , by a stupid confusion of ideas , [I]0-i catch [myself]0-i thinking , ' Oh , [Amelia]201-amelia will sit up with [her]201-amelia ! ' before [I]0-i can realize that [her]201-amelia is [Amelia]201-amelia [herself]201-amelia . " [Jim]181-jim can well sympathize with this same confusion , when , several times during [his]181-jim walk back to [the Piazza d'Azeglio]3491-the piazza d'azeglio , a muddled thought of comfort , in the idea that [he]181-jim will go and tell [Amelia]201-amelia what a terrible day of anxiety about some one [he]181-jim has been having , taps at the door of [his]181-jim brain . The portals of [No . 12]1293-no . 12 are once again opened to [him]181-jim by [Annunziata]264-annunziata , who indicates to [him]181-jim , by a series of compassionate gestures and liquid Tuscan sentences , that the povero is still within , and [the Padrona , who this time also appears on the scene]4477-the padrona , who this time also appears on the scene , and who is possessed of somewhat more English than [[her]4477-the padrona , who this time also appears on the scene handmaid]4478-her handmaid , intimates , albeit with a good deal of sympathy for [his]181-jim sufferings , yet with still more of determination , that it would be no bad thing were [he]181-jim to be removed , since , whether the sun shines or the rain falls , [people]3155-people must live , and [the apartment]1297-the apartment has to be prepared for [new occupants]4481-new occupants . Anything that speaks less intention of removing than [Byng]251-byng 's pose , when [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend rejoins [him]181-jim , it would be difficult to imagine . [He]181-jim is stretched upon the parquet floor , with [his]181-jim head lying on the small footstool that has been wo nt to support [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's feet ; [her]193-elizabeth rifled workbasket stands on the floor beside [him]181-jim , while [her]193-elizabeth bit of embroidery half shrouds [his]181-jim distorted face . The needle , still sticking in it , may prick [his]181-jim eyes out for all [he]181-jim cares ; the book [she]193-elizabeth last read is open at the page where [she]193-elizabeth has put [her]193-elizabeth mark of a skein of pale silk ; and the yellow anemones , that [he]181-jim must have plucked for [her]193-elizabeth yesterday in [drenched Vallombrosa]95-vallombrosa , are crushed under [his]181-jim hot cheek . But outwardly [he]181-jim is quite quiet . [Jim]181-jim puts [his]181-jim hand on [his]181-jim shoulder . "[201-amelia] Come away , there is no use in [your]1984-your staying [here]637-here any longer . " As [he]181-jim receives no answer , [he]181-jim repeats the exhortation more imperatively , "[201-amelia] Come . " "[201-amelia] Why should [I]0-i come ? Where should [I]0-i come to ? " says [the young man]643-the young man , lifting [his]643-the young man head , "[201-amelia] where can [I]0-i find such plain traces of [her]1986-her as here ? [I]0-i will stay . " [He]643-the young man says this with an air of resolution , and once more lays down [his]643-the young man face upon the footstool , which , being entirely worked in beads , has impressed the cheek thrust against it with a design in small hollows , a fact of which [the sufferer]4359-the sufferer is quite unaware . "[0-i] [You]0-i can not stay ! " cries [Burgoyne]181-jim , the more impatiently that [his]181-jim own share of anxiety is fretting [his]181-jim temper almost past endurance ; "[0-i] [you]0-i can not stay , it is out of the question ; [they]1987-they want to come into [the rooms]1988-the rooms , to prepare [them]1988-the rooms for [new occupants]4481-new occupants . " "[1987-they] [New occupants]4481-new occupants ! " repeats [Byng]251-byng , turning over almost on [his]251-byng face , and flattening [his]251-byng nose and lips against the beaded surface of [his]251-byng stool , "[1987-they] [other occupants than [her]1986-her]1991-other occupants than her . Never ! never ! " It is to be placed to the credit side of [Mr. Burgoyne]198-burgoyne 's account that [he]251-byng does not , upon this declaration , withdraw the resting - place from [[his]251-byng young friend]763-his young friend 's countenance and break it over [his]251-byng head . It is certainly not the temptation to do so that is lacking . Instead , [he]251-byng sits down at some distance off , and says quietly : "[0-i] [I]0-i see , [you]0-i will force [them]1987-they to call in [the police]1992-the police . [You]0-i will make a discreditable esclandre . How good for [her]1986-her ; how conducive to [her]1986-her good name . [I]0-i congratulate [you]0-i ! " [The other]396-the other has lifted [his]396-the other head in a moment . "[0-i] What do [you]0-i mean ? " "[0-i] Do [you]0-i think , " asks [Jim]181-jim indignantly , "[0-i] that it is ever very advantageous to [a woman]536-a woman to have [her]536-a woman name mixed up in a vulgar row ? And do [you]0-i suppose that [hers]536-a woman will be kept out of it ? Come"—seeing a look of shocked consternation breaking over [the young man]643-the young man 's face , and determined to strike while the iron is hot—"I[0-i] will call a fiacre , and [we]1994-we will go [home]401-home to [the hotel]1144-the hotel . Put back [her]1986-her things into [her]1986-her basket . What right have [you]0-i to meddle with [them]1997-them ? [You]0-i have no business to take advantage of [her]1986-her absence to do what [you]0-i would not do if [she]1986-her were [here]637-here . " [Byng]251-byng obeys with a scared docility ; [his]251-byng eyes are so dim , and [his]251-byng fingers tremble so much , that [Jim]181-jim has to help [him]251-byng in replacing [[Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's small properties]4488-elizabeth 's small properties . [His]251-byng own heart is pricked with a cruel smart that has no reference to [Amelia]201-amelia 's illness , as [he]251-byng handles [the departed girl]4489-the departed girl 's spools and skeins , and awkwardly folds [her]1986-her scrap of broidery . [Byng]251-byng offers no further resistance , and , equally indifferent to [his]251-byng own bunged - up eyes , bead - marked cheeks , and dishevelled locks , follows [[his]251-byng companion]603-his companion dully , down the stone stairs , compassionately watched from the top by [Annunziata]264-annunziata , whose heart is [an inconveniently tender one to be matched with so tough a face]4491-an inconveniently tender one to be matched with so tough a face . [They]4492-they get into [the fiacre]3657-the fiacre , and drive in dead silence to [the Minerva]37-the minerva . [Arrived]314-arrived [there]455-there , [Jim]181-jim persuades [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend , who now seems prepared to acquiesce meekly in whatever [he]251-byng is told to do , to lie down on [his]251-byng bed , since the few words that [he]251-byng utters convey the fact of [his]251-byng being suffering from a burning headache , a phenomenon not very surprising , considering [his]251-byng late briny exercises , since , even at the superb age of twenty - two , it is difficult to spend six hours in banging [your]4496-your forehead against a parquet floor , in moaning , bellowing , and weeping , without leaving some traces of these gymnastics on [your]4496-your physique . [Burgoyne]181-jim stands or sits patiently beside [him]251-byng , bathing [his]181-jim fiery temples with eau - de - Cologne , not teasing [him]251-byng with any questions , having , indeed , on [his]181-jim own part , the least possible desire for conversation ; and so the heavy hours go by . The day has declined to evening before [Burgoyne]181-jim quits [[his]181-jim protégé]4497-his protégé 's side to dine , shortly and solitarily , previous making a third visit to [the Anglo - Américain]3323-the anglo - américain , to learn the latest news of [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed . [He]181-jim had left [Byng]251-byng still stretched upon [his]251-byng bed , apparently asleep , and is therefore the more surprised , on returning to take a final look at [him]251-byng before setting out on [his]251-byng own errand , to find [him]251-byng up , with hat and stick in hand , evidently prepared for a walk . "[1999-you] [You]1999-you are going out ? " "[1999-you] Yes . " "[1999-you] Where are [you]1999-you going ? " [The other]396-the other hesitates . "[0-i] [I]0-i am going back [there]455-there . " "[0-i] Impossible ! " "[0-i] But [I]0-i am , " replies [Byng]251-byng doggedly ; "[0-i] it will not do [her]2001-her any injury , for [I]0-i shall not attempt to go in , [I]0-i shall only ask at the door whether any telegram has yet been received from — from [them]2002-they ; [they]2002-they must telegraph to direct where [their]2002-they things are to be sent to , and it is most probable that [they]2002-they have done so already . " "[2003-you] It is most improbable . " "[2003-you] Well , at all events , it is possible , it is worth trying , and [I]0-i mean to try it . " There is such a fixed resolution in [his]251-byng voice , which is no longer quavering with sobs , and in [his]251-byng ashy face , that [Jim]181-jim offers no further resistance . The only concession [he]181-jim can obtain from [him]251-byng is that of permitting [him]251-byng to accompany [him]251-byng . "[2003-you] [You]2003-you will not mind coming with [me]0-i to [the Anglo - Américain]3323-the anglo - américain first , will [you]2003-you ? " inquires [Jim]181-jim , as [they]2005-us set off walking across [the Piazza]3537-the piazza . "[2003-you] It will delay [us]2005-us quite half - an - hour , " answers [the other]396-the other restlessly . "[2003-you] But stay " ( a hazy look of reminiscence dawning over [his]396-the other preoccupied haggard face ) , "[2003-you] did [you]2003-you tell [me]0-i that [Amelia]201-amelia was ill — or did [I]0-i dream it ? " "[2003-you] No , [you]2003-you did not dream it , " replies [the other sadly]1899-the other sadly . "[2003-you] [She]201-amelia is ill . " Perhaps the wretchedness that pierces through [[his]396-the other friend]393-his friend 's quiet tones recalls [the young dreamer]4314-the young dreamer to the fact that [the world]3184-the world holds other miseries than [his]4314-the young dreamer own . There is at all events something of [his]396-the other old quick sympathy in [his]396-the other next words , and in the way in which they are uttered : "[201-amelia] Oh , poor [Amelia]201-amelia , [I]0-i am sorry ! By all means let [us]2005-us go at once and ask after [her]201-amelia . Is there nothing that [we]2005-us can get?—nothing that [we]2005-us can do for [her]201-amelia ? " It is the question that [Jim]181-jim , in baffled anxiety , puts when [he]181-jim is admitted inside [the dull salon]4507-the dull salon , where no love - glorified , homely face to - night lights up the tender candles of its glad eyes , from over its stitching , at [his]181-jim entry . [Sybilla]221-sybilla is lying less comfortably than usual on [her]221-sybilla sofa , [her]221-sybilla cushions not plumped up , and [her]221-sybilla bottle of smelling - salts rolled out of [her]221-sybilla reach . [Mr. Wilson]202-mr. wilson is walking uneasily up and down [the room]442-the room , instead of sitting placidly in [his]202-mr. wilson chair , with the soothing voice — which [he]202-mr. wilson had always thought as much to be counted on , and as little to be particularly thankful for , as the air that fills [his]202-mr. wilson lungs — lullingly reading [him]202-mr. wilson to sleep . "[222-cecilia] [Cecilia]222-cecilia is with [her]222-cecilia just now , " [he]202-mr. wilson says , in a voice of forlorn irritation . "[222-cecilia] [I]0-i wish [she]222-cecilia would come down again ; [I]0-i have no great opinion of [Cecilia]222-cecilia as [a sick - nurse]2006-a sick - nurse , and [she]222-cecilia must know how anxious [we]2007-we are . " A moment later , still pursuing [his]202-mr. wilson fidgety ramble from wall to wall , and exclaiming peevishly , as [he]202-mr. wilson stumbles over a footstool : "[222-cecilia] If it would only declare itself ! There seems to be nothing to lay hold of , [we]2007-we are so completely in the dark — if it would only declare itself ! " A not very subdued sob from the sofa is the only answer [he]202-mr. wilson gets , an answer which evidently irritates still further [his]202-mr. wilson fretted nerves . "[0-i] [I]0-i can not think what [Cecilia]222-cecilia is doing ! " [he]202-mr. wilson cries , hastening to the door , opening it noisily , and then listening . "[222-cecilia] Let [me]0-i run up and see , " says [Jim]181-jim , [his]181-jim heart going out to [the fractious old man]4509-the fractious old man in a sympathy of suffering . "[0-i] Yes , [I]0-i know where [[her]222-cecilia room]2008-her room is — au troisième , is not it ? " ( a flash of recollection lighting up the fact that [[Amelia]201-amelia 's]4510-amelia 's is distinctly [the worst room of the suite occupied by [the Wilson family]686-the wilson family]4511-the worst room of the suite occupied by the wilson family ; [the room with most stairs to climb]4513-the room with most stairs to climb to , and least accommodation when [you]2009-you reach [it]2008-her room ) . "[0-i] [I]0-i will knock quite gently . Do not be afraid , [I]0-i will not disturb [her]222-cecilia , and [I]0-i will come down immediately to tell [you]2009-you . " Without waiting for permission , [he]202-mr. wilson springs up the stairs , and , standing on the landing , taps cautiously on the closed door , whose number ( by one of those quirks of memory that furnish all [our]4514-our minds with insignificant facts ) [he]202-mr. wilson has recollected . [His]202-mr. wilson first knock is so superfluously soft that it is evidently inaudible within , since no result follows upon it . [His]202-mr. wilson second , a shade louder , though still muffled by the fear of breaking into some little fitful yet salutary sleep , brings [Cecilia]222-cecilia out . [His]202-mr. wilson first glance at [her]222-cecilia face shows [him]202-mr. wilson that [she]222-cecilia has no good news , either to warm [his]202-mr. wilson own heart , or for [him]202-mr. wilson to carry down as a solace to [the poor old man below]4515-the poor old man below . "[0-i] Oh , it is [you]0-i , is it ? " says [she]222-cecilia , shutting the door behind [her]222-cecilia with a clumsy carefulness that makes it creak . "[0-i] No , [I]0-i do not think [she]222-cecilia is any better ; but it is so difficult to tell , [I]0-i am [no judge]1979-no judge . [She]222-cecilia does not complain of anything particular ; but [she]222-cecilia looks so odd . " It is the same adjective that [Cecilia]222-cecilia had applied earlier in the day to [[her]222-cecilia sick sister]4516-her sick sister , and it fills [Jim]181-jim with an impotent terror . "[222-cecilia] If [she]222-cecilia is asleep , might not [I]0-i just look in at [her]222-cecilia ? " [he]181-jim asks . "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know what [you]0-i mean when [you]0-i say [she]222-cecilia looks odd . " "[0-i] [She]222-cecilia is not asleep , " replies [Cecilia]222-cecilia , in a noisy whisper , much more likely to pierce sick ears than a voice pitched in its normal key ; "[222-cecilia] at least , [I]0-i think not . But [I]0-i am sure [you]0-i ought not to see [her]222-cecilia ; [Dr. Coldstream]297-dr. coldstream said [she]222-cecilia was to be kept very quiet , and nothing would upset [her]222-cecilia so much as seeing [you]0-i . " "[297-dr. coldstream] [She]222-cecilia need not see [me]0-i ; [I]0-i would only take just one look at [her]222-cecilia from behind the door , " persists [Jim]181-jim who feels a desire , whose gnawing intensity surprises [himself]181-jim , to be assured by the evidence of [his]181-jim own eyes that [[his]181-jim poor love]782-his poor love 's face has not undergone some strange and gruesome change , such as is suggested by [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's disquieting epithet . "[0-i] Do [you]0-i think [she]222-cecilia would not know [you]0-i were [there]455-there ? " asks [she]222-cecilia scornfully , "[222-cecilia] Why , [she]222-cecilia hears [your]0-i step three streets off ! " So that night [Jim]181-jim does not see [Amelia]201-amelia . After all , as [Cecilia]222-cecilia says , it is better to be on the safe side , and to - morrow [she]222-cecilia will be brighter , and [he]181-jim can sit by [her]222-cecilia , and tell [her]222-cecilia lovingly — oh very lovingly!—what a fright [she]222-cecilia has given [him]181-jim . Yes , to - morrow [she]222-cecilia will be brighter . The adjective is [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's ; but , apparently , [he]181-jim can not improve upon it , for [he]181-jim not only keeps repeating it to [himself]181-jim as [he]181-jim runs [downstairs]4518-downstairs , but employs it for the reassurance of [[Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson 's anxious relatives]4519-miss wilson 's anxious relatives . "[222-cecilia] [She]222-cecilia will be brighter to - morrow ; [sick people]3489-sick people are always worse at night , are not [they?"—rather]315-they?"—rather vaguely , with again that oppressive sense of [his]181-jim own inexperience in illness . "[222-cecilia] Not that [she]222-cecilia is worse"—this is hastily subjoined , as [he]181-jim sees [[her]222-cecilia father]3214-her father 's face fall—"Cecilia[222-cecilia] never said [she]222-cecilia was worse — oh , no , not worse , only not distinctly better ; and , after all , it would have been irrational to expect that . [She]222-cecilia will be brighter to - morrow — oh , yes , of course [she]222-cecilia will be brighter to - morrow !
