" [He]181-jim leaves [the hotel]1144-the hotel with the phrase , which sounds cut and dried and unreal , still upon [his]181-jim lips , after bidding a kinder good - night than usual to [Mr. Wilson]202-mr. wilson , after having offered to supply [[Amelia]201-amelia 's place]4522-amelia 's place by reading aloud to [him]181-jim , a feat [he]181-jim has not performed since the evening of [his]181-jim disastrous experience of [the Provident Women of [Oxford]2-oxford]4523-the provident women of oxford ; and lastly , having even — as a reward to [Sybilla]221-sybilla , who has been understood to murmur something tearful about letting [[her]221-sybilla maid]4356-her maid look in upon [Amelia]201-amelia at intervals through the night — tucked in [her]221-sybilla Austrian blanket , and picked up [her]221-sybilla smelling - bottle . [He]181-jim has expected to rejoin [Byng]251-byng outside , as [he]251-byng had promised to wait for [him]251-byng with such patience as a cigar could lend , and on the condition that [his]251-byng absence should not exceed a stipulated period . But either the promise has been broken , or the period exceeded , for [Byng]251-byng is gone . The fact does not greatly surprise [Burgoyne]181-jim , though it causes [him]181-jim a slight uneasiness , which is , perhaps , rather a blessing for [him]181-jim , distracting [his]181-jim mind in some slight measure from the heaviness of [his]181-jim own trouble . [He]181-jim walks fast to [the Piazza d'Azeglio]3491-the piazza d'azeglio ; but [he]181-jim neither overtakes [him]251-byng of whom [he]181-jim is in pursuit , nor finds [him]251-byng at 12 bis . [He]181-jim has been [there]455-there , has inquired with agitation for the telegrams , which have naturally not been received , and has then gone away again immediately . [Whither]316-whither ? [The Padrona]4527-the padrona , who has answered the door - bell [herself]4527-the padrona and , with Italian suavity , is doing [her]4527-the padrona best to conceal that [she]4527-the padrona is beginning to think [she]4527-the padrona has heard nearly enough of the subject , does not know . For a few moments [Jim]181-jim stands irresolute , then [he]181-jim turns [his]181-jim steps towards [the Arno]45-arno . It is not yet too late for [the charming riverside promenade]4528-the charming riverside promenade , [the gay Lung'Arno]106-the gay lung'arno , to be still alive with flâneurs ; the stars have lit [their]4529-their lamps above , and [the hotels below]4530-the hotels below . [The pale planets]4531-the pale planets , and the yellow lights from [the opposite bank of [the river]449-the river]4532-the opposite bank of the river , lie together , sweet and peaceful upon [her]4527-the padrona breast . In both cases the counterfeits are as clear and bright as [the real luminaries]4534-the real luminaries ; and it seems as if [one]501-one had only to plunge in an arm to pick up stars and candles out of [the stream]1704-the stream 's depths . Leaning over the parapet near [the Ponte Vecchio]107-the ponte vecchio , [Burgoyne]181-jim soon discovers [a familiar figure]4537-a familiar figure , a figure which starts when [he]181-jim touches its arm . "[0-i] [I]0-i thought [I]0-i would wait about [here]637-here for an hour or so , " says [Byng]251-byng , with a rather guilty air of apology , "[0-i] until [I]0-i could go back and inquire again . The telegram has not arrived yet — [I]0-i suppose it is too early . Of course [they]2014-they would not telegraph until [they]2014-they get in to - night . [You]2015-you do not think"—with a look of almost terror—"that[2015-you] [they]2014-they are going through to [England]11-england , and that [they]2014-they will not telegraph till [they]2014-they get [there]455-there ? " "[2015-you] How can [I]0-i tell ? " "[0-i] There is nothing in [the world]3184-the world less likely , " cries [Byng]251-byng feverishly , irritated at not having drawn forth the reassurance [he]251-byng had hoped for . "[0-i] [I]0-i do not for a moment believe that [they]2014-they have gone [home]401-home ; [I]0-i feel convinced that [they]2014-they are still in [Italy]18-italy ! Why should [they]2014-they leave it , when [they]2014-they — when [she]2019-she is so fond of it ? " [Jim]181-jim looks down sadly at [the calm , strong stream]4538-the calm , strong stream . "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know , [I]0-i can not give an opinion — [I]0-i have no clue . " "[0-i] [I]0-i will ask again in about an hour , " says [Byng]251-byng , lifting [his]251-byng arms from the parapet , "[0-i] in an hour it is pretty certain to have arrived ; and meanwhile , [I]0-i thought [I]0-i would just stroll about [the town]407-the town , but there is no reason — none at all — why [I]0-i should keep [you]2021-you ! [You]2021-you — [you]2021-you must be wanting to go back to [Amelia]201-amelia . " [He]251-byng glances at [[his]251-byng friend]393-his friend in a nervous , sidelong way , as [he]251-byng makes this suggestion . "[0-i] [I]0-i am not going back again to - night , " replies [Jim]181-jim quietly , without giving any evidence of an intention to acquiesce in [his]181-jim dismissal . "[0-i] There is nothing that [I]0-i can do for [her]201-amelia — there is nothing to be done . " [His]181-jim tone , in making this statement , must be yet more dreary than [he]181-jim is aware , as it arouses even [Byng]251-byng 's self - absorbed attention . "[2022-my dear old chap] Nothing to be done for [her]201-amelia ? " [he]181-jim echoes , with a shocked look . "[0-i] [[My]0-i dear old chap]2022-my dear old chap , [you]2022-my dear old chap do not mean to say — to imply — " "[2022-my dear old chap] [I]0-i mean to imply nothing , " interrupts [Jim]181-jim sharply , in a superstitious panic of hearing some unfavourable augury as to [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed put into words . "[0-i] [I]0-i mean just what [I]0-i say — neither more nor less ; there is nothing to be done for [her]201-amelia to - night , nothing but to let [her]201-amelia sleep — a good sleep will set [her]201-amelia up : of course a good sleep will quite set [her]201-amelia up . " [He]181-jim speaks almost angrily , as if expecting and challenging contradiction . But [Byng]251-byng 's spirit has already flown back to [his]251-byng own woes . [He]251-byng may make what sanguine statements [he]251-byng pleases about [Amelia]201-amelia 's to - morrow , without fearing any demurrer from [[his]251-byng companion]603-his companion . What attention [the latter]423-the latter has to spare is evidently only directed to the solving of the problem , how best , with amicable civility , to be rid of [him]251-byng . Before [he]251-byng can hit upon any expedient for attaining this desired end , [Burgoyne]181-jim speaks again , [his]181-jim eye resting with a compassionate expression upon [[his]181-jim junior]4543-his junior 's face , whose wild pallor is heightened by the disorder of [his]181-jim hair , and the hat crushed down over [his]181-jim brows . "[2023-you] [You]2023-you have not had anything to eat all day — had not [you]2023-you better come back to [the hotel]1144-the hotel and get something to eat ? " "[2023-you] Eat ! " cries [the other]396-the other , with almost a scream ; "[2023-you] [you]2023-you must have very little comprehension of — — " Then , checking [himself]0-i and with a strong and palpable effort for composure : "[2023-you] It would not be worth while , [I]0-i should not have time ; in an hour — less than an hour now , for [I]0-i must have been [here]637-here quite ten minutes at the least — [I]0-i have to return to [the Piazza d'Azeglio]3491-the piazza d'azeglio . " "[109-doney 's] Then go to [Doney 's]109-doney 's ; why not get something to eat at [Doney]109-doney 's 's ? It will not take [you]2023-you five minutes to reach [the Via Tornabuoni]1042-the via tornabuoni . " "[109-doney 's] What should [I]0-i do when [I]0-i got [there]455-there ? " asks [Byng]251-byng impatiently . "[0-i] If [I]0-i tried to swallow food , it would stick in [my]0-i throat ; no food shall pass [my]0-i lips till [I]0-i learn where [she]2029-she is ; after that"—breaking out into a noisy laugh—"you[181-jim] may do what [you]2023-you please with [me]0-i — [we]2030-we will make a night of it with all [my]0-i heart , [we]2030-we will — [Jim]181-jim looks blankly at [him]2031-i . Is [he]2031-i going mad ? " If [you]181-jim think that [you]181-jim will get [me]251-byng to go back to [the hotel]1144-the hotel to - night , [you]181-jim are very much mistaken , "[251-byng] continues [Byng]251-byng recklessly ; " no roof less high than this"—jerking[2031-i] back [his]2031-i head , to throw [his]2031-i fevered look up to the cool stars—"shall shelter [my]2031-i head ; and besides , where would be the use of going to bed when [I]2031-i should have to be up again so early ? [I]2031-i shall be off by [one of the morning expresses]4546-one of the morning expresses : until [I]2031-i have learnt — as , of course , [I]2031-i shall do to - night — where [she]2033-his present companion has gone , [I]2031-i can not tell which ; but neither of them starts much later than seven . "[2031-i] For a moment [Jim]181-jim stands dumb with consternation at the announcement of this intention ; but , reflecting that it would not be a whit more irrational to attempt to reason with [a madman who had reached the padded - room stage of lunacy]2032-a madman who had reached the padded - room stage of lunacy , than with [[his]181-jim present companion]2033-his present companion , [he]181-jim contents [himself]181-jim with saying : " And supposing that [you]2032-a madman who had reached the padded - room stage of lunacy do not learn to - night where [she]2033-his present companion has gone ? "[181-jim] " There is no use in supposing anything so impossible ! "[181-jim] But as the hours go by , the possibility becomes a probability , the probability a certainty ! Midnight comes , and [the closed telegraph - office]2034-the closed telegraph - office puts a final extinguisher upon the expectation , which [no one]819-no one but [the unhappy lover]2036-the unhappy lover had ever entertained , that [Florence]20-florence would be enlightened before the dawn of another day as to the place whither [[her]20-florence two truants]2037-her two truants have fled . [Burgoyne]181-jim has accompanied [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend upon [his]181-jim last importunate visit to [the now - going - to - bed and justly - incensed 12 bis]2039-the now - going - to - bed and justly - incensed 12 bis . [He]181-jim has been ashamed again to present [himself]181-jim at the so - often - attacked door , so has awaited at the bottom of the stairs , has heard [Byng]251-byng 's hoarse query , and the negative — curter and less suave than the last one — that follows it ; has heard the door shut again , and the hopeless footsteps that come staggering down to [him]181-jim . " [You]251-byng will go [home]401-home now ? "[251-byng] replies [Byng]251-byng ; and , though [he]181-jim is compelled to admit that there is no longer any possibility of [his]181-jim to - night obtaining the information for which [he]181-jim so madly hungers , that there can consequently be no question of [his]181-jim setting off by one of [the early trains]2040-the early trains , since [he]181-jim would not know in which direction to go , and might only be fleeing further from [her]20-florence whom [he]181-jim would fain rejoin , yet [he]181-jim still keeps with fevered pertinacity to [his]181-jim project of spending the night à la belle étoile . Finding it impossible to dissuade [him]181-jim , [Jim]181-jim resigns [himself]181-jim to bearing [him]181-jim company . It is with very little reluctance that [he]181-jim does so . There is no truer truism than that all sorrows , however mountainous , are more easily carried under [God]214-god 's high roof than [man]542-man 's low ones , and [he]181-jim who does not sleep has for compensation that at least [he]181-jim can have no dreadful waking . So [the two men]409-the two men wander about all night in the boon southern air , and see — There are not many hours of a summer 's night during which the stir of life has ceased and has not yet reawaked in [an Italian town]2043-an italian town , the talk and the tread and the mule bells , and the flutes of [the voiceful people lasting on till near the small hours]2044-the voiceful people lasting on till near the small hours , and beginning again ere those hours have had strength to grow big . But yet there is a space of time when [Florence]20-florence lies silent , baring [her]20-florence beauty to the constellations alone ; and under this unfamiliar and solemn and lovely aspect the two night - wanderers see [her]20-florence . [They]409-the two men see [her]20-florence Campanile with no distracting human bustle about [her]20-florence feet ; [they]409-the two men see [her]20-florence Perseus battling beneath [[her]20-florence Loggia]2045-her loggia , and [her]20-florence San Giorgio standing wakeful at [his]181-jim post on Or [san Michele]110-san michele . [They]409-the two men see [[her]20-florence scowling palace rows]2046-her scowling palace rows , [[her]20-florence stealing river]2047-her stealing river , and [[her]20-florence spanning bridges]2048-her spanning bridges — palaces out of which no head peeps , [a river on which [no boat]2050-no boat oars]2049-a river on which no boat oars , bridges upon which no horse - hoof rings . [They]409-the two men have all [[her]20-florence churches]2051-her churches — [Santa Croce]49-santa croce , [[Arnolpho]290-arnolpho 's great " Bride]4548-arnolpho 's great " bride , "[290-arnolpho] [that new Maria that is now four hundred years old or more]2052-that new maria that is now four hundred years old or more , [the humbly glorious San Marco]2053-the humbly glorious san marco — to [themselves]409-the two men ; all [[her]20-florence treasure houses]2054-her treasure houses , all [her]20-florence memories , all [her]20-florence flower - embalmed air — for a few hours [they]409-the two men possess them all . [She]20-florence is but [a little city]3855-a little city , [this fair Firenze]2056-this fair firenze , and in these few hours [they]409-the two men traverse [her]20-florence in [her]20-florence length and breadth , rambling aimlessly wherever [Byng]251-byng 's feverishly miserable impulses lead [them]409-the two men . [Burgoyne]181-jim offers no opposition to any of these , but accompanies [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend silently down [slumbrous thoroughfare]2058-slumbrous thoroughfare , or across [sleeping Piazza]241-piazza , by [Arno]45-arno side , under colonnade or [arch]2059-arch . It is all one to [him]181-jim ; nor is [he]181-jim sensible of any fatigue , when at length , at about the hour when [Byng]251-byng had meant to have caught [the early morning train]2060-the early morning train , [they]409-the two men return to [the hotel]1144-the hotel , and [the younger man , happily dead - beat at last , worn out with want of food , tears , and weariness]2062-the younger man , happily dead - beat at last , worn out with want of food , tears , and weariness , flings [himself]2062-the younger man , happily dead - beat at last , worn out with want of food , tears , and weariness down , dressed , upon [his]2062-the younger man , happily dead - beat at last , worn out with want of food , tears , and weariness bed , and instantly falls into a leaden sleep . [Jim]181-jim feels no desire , nor indeed any power of following [his]181-jim example . [He]181-jim is not easily tired , and [his]181-jim former life of travel and hardship has made [him]181-jim always willing to dispense with the — to [him]181-jim — unnecessary luxury of a bed ; and , under ordinary circumstances , a night passed in the open air would have had an effect upon [him]181-jim rather exhilarating than otherwise . [He]181-jim has [his]181-jim bath , dresses , breakfasts , and then jumps into a fiacre , and has [himself]181-jim driven to [the Anglo - Américain]3323-the anglo - américain . The day is so exactly the counterpart of its predecessor , in its even assured splendour , that [Jim]181-jim has a hazy feeling that [they]409-the two men both make only one divided into two parts by the narrow dark blue ribbon of the exquisite brief night . When did yesterday end and to - day begin ? As [he]181-jim is borne along , [his]181-jim memory , made more alert by sleeplessness , reproduces — merely , as it seems to [him]181-jim , the better to fill [him]181-jim with pain and remorse — the different states of mind in which [he]181-jim has passed over [the often trodden ground]2064-the often trodden ground . Here , at [the street corner]2065-the street corner , what a nausea had come over [him]181-jim at the thought of the interest [he]181-jim would have to feign in those humdrum details , so dear to [Amelia]201-amelia 's soul , of [their]409-the two men future ménage , with all its candle - end economies and depressing restrictions . Here , in the church shadow , how [he]181-jim had tried to lash [himself]181-jim up into a more probable semblance of pleasure in [her]201-amelia expected and dreaded caresses . There seems to be scarcely an inch of the way where [he]181-jim has not had some harsh or weary thought of [her]201-amelia ; [he]181-jim is thankful when the brief transit , that has appeared to [him]181-jim so long , is over . And yet the change is only from the sharp sting of recollected unkindness to the dull bruising ache of anticipated ill . A garçon is sweeping out [the salon]3584-the salon , for the hour is not much beyond eight , so [Jim]181-jim goes into [the dreary little dining - room]2067-the dreary little dining - room , where two places are laid with coffee - cups and rolls . Only two . And , though [he]181-jim knows that nothing short of a miracle could have already restored [Amelia]201-amelia so completely as to enable [her]201-amelia to come down to breakfast , yet the ocular demonstration of the fact that [[her]201-amelia place]2068-her place is and will be empty , strikes a chill to [his]181-jim boding heart . [He]181-jim is presently joined by [Cecilia]222-cecilia , whose carelessly - dressed hair , heavy eyelids , and tired puffy face , sufficiently show that not to [her]201-amelia , any more than to [himself]181-jim has night brought " How fresh and cool [you]181-jim are ! "[201-amelia] [she]201-amelia cries , with an almost reproachful intonation . " Do not look at me!"—covering[201-amelia] [her]201-amelia face with [her]201-amelia hot hands—"I am not fit to be seen ; but what does that matter ? What do [I]201-amelia care?"—beginning[201-amelia] to cry—"Oh , [she]201-amelia is so bad ! [We]4549-we have spent such a dreadful night ! As [I]201-amelia tell [you]4550-you , [I]201-amelia am [a shocking sick - nurse]4551-a shocking sick - nurse ; [I]201-amelia never know what to do ; [I]201-amelia lose [my]201-amelia head completely ; and [she]201-amelia has been so odd — [she]201-amelia has been talking such gibberish ! "[201-amelia] " Delirious ? "[201-amelia] " Yes , [I]201-amelia suppose that is what [you]4550-you would call it . [I]201-amelia never saw [anybody delirious]4552-anybody delirious before , so [I]201-amelia do not know . [I]201-amelia have seen [Sybilla]221-sybilla in hysterics , but [I]201-amelia never believed that they were real — [I]201-amelia always thought that a bucket of water would bring [her]221-sybilla round . "[201-amelia] As a general rule , [Jim]181-jim may be counted upon for cordial co - operation in any hit directed against [Sybilla]221-sybilla , but now [he]181-jim is too spiritless even to notice it . " [I]222-cecilia was so frightened , "[222-cecilia] continues [Cecilia]222-cecilia ; " it is not cheerful being all alone at the dead of night with [a person]1281-a person talking such nonsense as [she]201-amelia was . [Amelia]201-amelia , of [all people]4554-all people , to talk nonsense ! [I]222-cecilia could not quite make out what it was about , but it seemed to have more or less reference to [you]4550-you . [She]221-sybilla was begging [you]4550-you to forgive [her]221-sybilla for something [she]221-sybilla had done , as far as [I]222-cecilia could gather ; some treat [she]221-sybilla had prepared for [you]4550-you , and that [you]4550-you had not liked . Have [you]4550-you the least idea what [she]221-sybilla could have meant ? "[222-cecilia] [He]181-jim has every idea ; but it would seem profanation to explain that [her]222-cecilia poor wandering brain is still distressedly labouring with the abortive project [she]222-cecilia had so happily framed for [his]181-jim enjoyment . " [She]221-sybilla is quieter now . [[Sybilla]221-sybilla 's maid]4555-sybilla 's maid is with [her]221-sybilla ; [Sybilla]221-sybilla really has not behaved badly — for [her]221-sybilla ; [she]221-sybilla let [[her]221-sybilla maid]4356-her maid look in several times during the night ; but still , for the most part [I]0-i was alone with [her]221-sybilla ! Oh , [I]0-i do trust"—shuddering—"that[0-i] [I]0-i may never again have to be alone at night with [a person who is not right in [her]222-cecilia head]2069-a person who is not right in her head ! " This aspiration on [the youngest Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson 's part is , for the present occasion , at least , likely to be gratified ; for , by the time that another night settles down on [Florence]20-florence , [Amelia]201-amelia 's illness has been declared by [Dr. Coldstream]297-dr. coldstream to have every symptom of developing into the malarious Florentine fever , which not unfrequently lays low the chilled or over - fatigued , or generally imprudent foreign visitor to [that little Eden]112-that little eden . [Amelia]201-amelia has [Florentine]113-florentine fever ; and the verification of this fact is followed by all the paraphernalia of serious sickness — night and [day nurses]4557-day nurses , disinfectants , physic phials . The announcement of [her]201-amelia being attacked by a definite and recognised disease brings at first a sort of relief to [Burgoyne]181-jim 's mind , which , under [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's frightened and frightening word - pictures , had been beset by terrors great in proportion to their vagueness . Now that [Amelia]201-amelia is confessedly sick of a fever , there is nothing abnormal in [her]201-amelia being "[2069-a person who is not right in her head] odd , " and "[2069-a person who is not right in her head] stupid , " and "[2069-a person who is not right in her head] wandering , " these being only the inevitable stages on a road which will — which must lead to ultimate recovery . [His]181-jim heart is heavy , yet scarcely so heavy as it had been upon [his]181-jim arrival in the morning , when , late in the afternoon — not sooner do the claims upon [him]181-jim of [the disorganized and helpless family of [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed relax]4558-the disorganized and helpless family of his betrothed relax — [he]181-jim returns to [the Minerva]37-the minerva to look after [Byng]251-byng . Having had every reason to fear that [he]181-jim will not find [him]251-byng at [the hotel]1144-the hotel , but will be obliged again to set off in pursuit of [him]251-byng through [the streets]1311-the streets and squares so repeatedly traversed last night , [he]181-jim is relieved to learn from [the hotel]1144-the hotel servants that [the young man]643-the young man is in [[his]181-jim bedroom]799-his bedroom . [He]181-jim finds [him]251-byng there indeed ; no longer stretched in the blessed oblivion of deep sleep upon [his]181-jim bed , but sitting on a hard chair by the open window , [his]181-jim arms resting upon the back , and [his]181-jim face crushed down upon [them]4565-them . By no slightest movement does [he]181-jim show consciousness of [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend 's entrance . "[0-i] [I]0-i am afraid [I]0-i have been a long time away , " says [the latter]423-the latter kindly . "[0-i] Have [you]0-i ? " answers [Byng]251-byng , [his]181-jim voice coming muffled through lips still buried in [his]181-jim own coat - sleeve . "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know ; [I]0-i have done with time ! " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know how [you]0-i have managed that , " rejoins [Jim]181-jim , still indulgently , though a shade dryly . "[0-i] Have [you]0-i been [here]637-here all day ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know where [I]0-i have been . Yes,"—lifting [his]181-jim head—"I[0-i] do ; [I]0-i have been to [the Piazza d'Azeglio]3491-the piazza d'azeglio . " "[2072-them] Well ? " "[2072-them] [They]2072-them know where [she]2073-she is . [They]2072-them were packing [her]2073-she things ; through the door [I]0-i saw [them]2072-them tying the label on the box ; if [I]0-i had tried [I]0-i could have read the address on the label , but [I]0-i did not . [She]2073-she had forbidden [them]2072-them to give it to [me]0-i ; in [her]2073-she telegram [she]2073-she had forbidden [them]2072-them to give it to [anyone]3161-anyone . " [Jim]181-jim refrains from saying how likely this culmination of [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend 's woes has appeared to [him]181-jim , since it would have been the height of the illogical for [the Le Marchants]261-the le marchants to have put [themselves]261-the le marchants to extreme inconvenience in order to escape from [a person to whom [they]261-the le marchants immediately afterwards gave the power of following [them]261-the le marchants]4569-a person to whom they immediately afterwards gave the power of following them . [He]181-jim refrains from saying it , because [he]181-jim knows of how very little consoling power the "[2073-she] told [you]2075-you so " philosophy is possessed . "[2073-she] And what will [you]0-i do now ? " "[0-i] Do ! What is there to do ? What does [a man]386-a man do when [he]386-a man is shot through the heart ? " "[386-a man] [I]0-i believe that in point of fact [he]386-a man jumps [his]386-a man own height in the air . [I]0-i know that [a buffalo]2077-a buffalo does , " replies [Burgoyne]181-jim with a matter - of - fact dryness , which proceeds less from want of sympathy , than from an honest belief that it is the best and kindest method of dealing with [Byng]251-byng 's heroics . "[2077-a buffalo] Shot through the heart ! " murmurs [the latter]423-the latter , repeating [his]423-the latter own phrase as if [he]423-the latter found a dismal pleasure in it . "[0-i] [I]0-i had always been told that it was a painless death ; [I]0-i now know to the contrary . " "[386-a man] Shall [you]0-i stay [here]637-here ? There is no longer any use in [your]0-i staying [here]637-here . " "[386-a man] There is no longer any use in [my]0-i doing anything , or leaving anything undone . So saying , [he]386-a man replaces [his]386-a man head upon [his]386-a man arms , and [his]386-a man arms upon the chair - rail , with the air of [one who , upon mature consideration , has decided to maintain that attitude]2080-one who , upon mature consideration , has decided to maintain that attitude for the remainder of [his]386-a man life . A week has passed ; a week upon which [Burgoyne]181-jim looks back as upon a blur of wretchedness , with distinct points of pain sticking up here and there out of it . It is a blur ; for it is a time - space , without the usual limitations and divisions of time ; a week not cut up into orderly lengths of day and night , but in which each has puzzlingly run into and overlapped each . There have been nights when [he]386-a man has not been in bed at all , and there have been days when [he]386-a man has slept heavily at unaccustomed hours . [He]386-a man has not dined at any particular time ; [he]386-a man has shared forlorn breakfast , dotted about the morning as the less or more anxiety about [Amelia]201-amelia dictated , with [the Wilsons]231-the wilsons . [He]386-a man has drunk more tea than [he]386-a man ever did in [his]386-a man life before , and the result of this whole condition of things is , that [he]386-a man can not for the life of [him]386-a man tell whether the day of the week is Wednesday , or Thursday , or Friday , and that [he]386-a man has lost all sense of proportion . [He]386-a man has not the least idea whether the dreadful moments when [he]386-a man stood on the landing outside [Amelia]201-amelia 's door , and heard [her]201-amelia heartrendingly beg [him]386-a man not to go away from [her]201-amelia for quite so long , to be a little gladder to see [her]201-amelia when [he]386-a man came back ; or again affectingly assure [him]386-a man that [she]201-amelia can do quite well , be quite cheerful without [him]386-a man — whether , [I]0-i say , those dreadful moments were really only moments , or stretched into hours . Besides the agony of remorse that the impotent listening to those pathetic prayers and unselfish assurances causes [him]386-a man , [he]386-a man suffers too from another agony of shame , that [the father and sister]2081-the father and sister , standing like [himself]386-a man with ears stretched at that shut door , should be let into the long secret of [his]386-a man cruelty and coldness , that secret which for eight years [she]201-amelia has so gallantly been hiding . It is an inexpressible relief to [him]386-a man that at least [the old man]2082-the old man 's thickened hearing admits but very imperfectly [[his]2082-the old man daughter]2083-his daughter 's rapid utterances . " [Poor soul]4077-poor soul ! [I]386-a man can not quite make out what it is all about , "[386-a man] [he]386-a man says , with [his]386-a man hand to [his]386-a man ear ; " but [I]386-a man catch [your]386-a man name over and over again , [Jim]181-jim ; [I]386-a man suppose it is all about [you]386-a man . "[386-a man] [Cecilia]222-cecilia , however , naturally hears as well as [he]386-a man [himself]386-a man does , and apparently pitying the drawn misery of [his]386-a man face , whispers to [him]386-a man comfortingly — " [You]386-a man must not mind , [you]386-a man know it is all nonsense . [She]222-cecilia talks very differently when [she]222-cecilia is well . "[222-cecilia] [The Wilson family]686-the wilson family have never hitherto shown any very marked affection for [Burgoyne]181-jim , but now it seems as if [they]686-the wilson family could hardly bear [him]181-jim out of [their]686-the wilson family sight . [They]686-the wilson family cling to [him]181-jim , not because [he]181-jim is [he]181-jim — [Jim]181-jim makes [himself]181-jim no illusion on that head — but because [they]686-the wilson family have got into such a habit of leaning , that it is no longer possible to [them]686-the wilson family to stand upright . [He]181-jim had never realized till now how helpless [they]686-the wilson family are . [He]181-jim had known that [Amelia]201-amelia was the pivot upon which [the whole family]732-the whole family turned ; but [he]181-jim had not brought home to [himself]181-jim how utterly the machine fell to pieces when that pivot was withdrawn . In the course of the past week [each member of [the family]728-the family]2086-each member of the family has confided to [him]181-jim separately how far more [she]2088-she or [he]2089-he misses [Amelia]201-amelia , than can be possible to either of [the others]3469-the others . Upon this head [Sybilla]221-sybilla 's lamentations are the loudest and most frequent . [She]221-sybilla had at first refused to admit that there was anything at all the matter with [[her]221-sybilla sister]720-her sister , but has now fallen into the no less trying opposite extreme of refusing to allow that there is any possibility of [her]221-sybilla recovery , talking of [her]221-sybilla as if [she]221-sybilla were almost beyond the reach of human aid . [Sybilla]221-sybilla 's grief for [[her]221-sybilla sister]720-her sister is perfectly genuine ; none the less so that it is complicated by irritation at [her]221-sybilla own deposition from [her]221-sybilla post of first invalid , at having been compelled to confess the existence in the bosom of [[her]221-sybilla own family]2093-her own family of [a traitor]3560-a traitor , with an indisputably higher temperature and more wavering pulse than [she]221-sybilla . " It is ridiculous to suppose that [a person in such rude health]4572-a person in such rude health as [Cecilia]222-cecilia can miss [her]222-cecilia as [I]221-sybilla do , "[221-sybilla] [she]221-sybilla says querulously ; " [I]221-sybilla was always [her]222-cecilia first object , [she]222-cecilia always knew by instinct when [I]221-sybilla was more suffering than usual ; who cares now"—breaking[221-sybilla] into a deluge of self - compassionating tears—"whether [I]221-sybilla am suffering or not ? "[221-sybilla] Then , when next [he]2095-his happens to be alone with [Cecilia]222-cecilia , it is [her]222-cecilia turn to assert a superiority of woe ; a superiority claimed with still more emphasis the next half hour by [the father]2096-the father . With a patience which would have surprised those persons who had seen [him]2095-his only in [his]2095-his former relations with [the family of [[his]2095-his betrothed]605-his betrothed]2097-the family of his betrothed [he]2095-his tries to soothe the sorrow of [each]2099-each — even that of [Sybilla]221-sybilla — in turn ; but to [his]2095-his own heart [he]2095-his says that not one of [their]2100-they griefs is worthy to be weighed in the balance with [his]2095-his . In the case of none of [theirs]2100-they is the woof crossed by the hideous warp of self - reproach that is woven inextricably into [his]2095-his . [They]2100-they have worked [her]222-cecilia to death , [they]2100-they have torn [her]222-cecilia to pieces by [their]2100-they conflicting claims ; [their]2100-they love has been exacting , selfish , inconsiderate ; but at least it has been love ; [they]2100-they have prized [her]222-cecilia at almost [her]222-cecilia full worth while [they]2100-they had [her]222-cecilia . For [him]2095-his it has been reserved as for the base [Indian]318-indian , to In the intervals — neither long nor many — between [his]2095-his ministrations at [the Anglo - Américain]3323-the anglo - américain , [Burgoyne]181-jim hurries back to [the Minerva]667-the minerva to see that [Byng]251-byng has not blown [his]2095-his brains out . In the present state of mind of [that young gentleman]3680-that young gentleman this catastrophe does not appear to be among the least likely ones . [He]2095-his has refused to leave [Florence]20-florence , always answering the suggestion with the same question , " Where else should [I]2095-his go ? "[2095-his] and if pressed , adding invariably in the same words as those employed by [him]2095-his on the first day of [his]2095-his loss , when [[his]2095-his friend]393-his friend had urged the advisability of [his]2095-his removing [his]2095-his countenance from the beaded stool—"Where shall [I]2095-his find such recent and authentic traces of [her]393-his friend as here ? "[2095-his] [He]2095-his passes [his]2095-his time either on the Lung ' Arno , staring at [the water]3621-the water , or stretched face downwards upon [his]2095-his bed . [He]2095-his walks about [the town]407-the town most of the night , and [Jim]181-jim suspects [him]2095-his of beginning to take chloral . Occasionally [he]2095-his rouses up into a quick and almost passionate sympathy with [[his]2095-his friend]393-his friend 's trouble , asking for nothing better than to be sent on any errand , however trivial , or however tiresome , in [Amelia]201-amelia 's behalf . But no sooner have the immediate effects of the appeal to [his]2095-his kind - heartedness died away , than [he]2095-his sinks back into [his]2095-his lethargy , and [Jim]181-jim is at once too much occupied and too miserable to use any very strenuous endeavours to shake [him]2095-his out of it . But yet the consciousness of the tacit engagement , under which [he]2095-his lies to [[the young man]643-the young man 's mother]4034-the young man 's mother , to look after [him]2095-his , coupled with the absolute impossibility , under [his]2095-his present circumstances , of fulfilling that engagement , and [his]2095-his uneasiness as to what new form the insanity of [Byng]251-byng 's grief may take on , from day to day , add very perceptibly to the weight of [his]2095-his own already sufficiently ponderous burden . It is the ninth day since [Amelia]201-amelia fell sick , that ninth day which , in maladies such as [hers]201-amelia , is , or is at least reckoned to be , the crisis and turning - point of the disease . [Jim]181-jim has been up all night , and has just rushed back to [the Minerva]37-the minerva , for the double purpose of taking a bath , and of casting an uneasy eye upon [his]181-jim charge . [He]181-jim finds [the latter]423-the latter not in [[his]181-jim room]2111-his room , but leaning over [the little spiky balcony]2112-the little spiky balcony , out of [his]181-jim window , hanging over [it]2112-the little spiky balcony so far , and so absorbedly , that [he]181-jim does not hear [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend 's approach , and starts violently when [Jim]181-jim lays a hand on [his]393-his friend shoulder . " What are [you]393-his friend looking at ? "[181-jim] " [I]181-jim ; oh — nothing particular ! What should [I]181-jim be looking at ? What is there to look to ? [I]181-jim was only — only — wondering as a mere matter of curiosity , how many feet it is from here to [the pavement]4573-the pavement ? Sixteen ? eighteen ? twenty ? "[181-jim] [Jim]181-jim 's only answer is to look at [him]393-his friend sadly and sternly ; then [he]181-jim says coldly : " [I]181-jim do not recommend it ; it would be a clumsy way of doing it . "[181-jim] " What matter how clumsy the way , so that one attains the end ? "[251-byng] asks [Byng]251-byng extravagantly , throwing off even the thin pretence [he]251-byng had at first assumed ; " who cares how bad [the road]3320-the road is so that it leads [him]251-byng to the goal ? [Jim]181-jim shudders . Death has been so near to [him]181-jim for the last nine days , that the terrific realism of [Constance]319-constance 's apostrophe seems to be almost more than [he]181-jim can bear . "[181-jim] It is silliness to live when to live is a torment , and then , have [we]2114-we a prescription to die , when death is [[our]2114-we physician]2115-our physician ? " continues [Byng]251-byng loudly and wildly , clasping [his]251-byng hands above [his]251-byng head , and apparently perfectly indifferent as to whether [the other inmates of [the hotel]1144-the hotel , or [passers - by]4577-passers - by on [the piazza]3537-the piazza]4575-the other inmates of the hotel , or passers - by on the piazza , overhear [him]251-byng . "[181-jim] If [you]2116-you stay [here]637-here much longer [you]2116-you will spare [yourself]2116-you the trouble of putting an end to [your]2116-you existence , " replies [Jim]181-jim , glancing at the other 's head , exposed hatless to the scorch of the Tuscan sun , "[2116-you] for [you]2116-you will certainly get a sunstroke . " So saying , [he]251-byng takes [him]2116-you quietly , yet decidedly , by the arm , and leads [him]2116-you within [the room]442-the room . Either [his]251-byng matter - of - fact manner , or the sight of [his]251-byng face , upon which , well - seasoned as it is , vigil and sorrow have begun to write their unavoidable marks , brings [the young madman]4580-the young madman back to some measure of sense and self - control . "[0-i] [I]0-i had no fixed intention , " [he]251-byng says apologetically , still looking white and wild ; "[2116-you] [you]2116-you must not think [I]0-i meant anything ; but , even if [I]0-i had — do [you]2116-you know — have [you]2116-you ever happened to read anything about the statistics of suicide ? Do [you]2116-you know what [an increasing number of people]2118-an increasing number of people every year find life intolerable ? " "[2116-you] [I]0-i know that [you]2116-you are fast making [my]0-i life intolerable , " answers [Jim]181-jim , fixing [his]181-jim tired , sleepless eyes with melancholy severity upon [[his]181-jim companion]603-his companion . "[2116-you] [Amelia]201-amelia is — [you]2116-you are as well aware of it as [I]0-i am — probably dying , and yet even now , thanks to [you]2116-you , into [my]0-i thoughts of [her]201-amelia is continually pushing the fear that [I]0-i may have to tell [[your]2116-you mother]1065-your mother that [you]2116-you have had the colossal selfishness to rush out of [the world]3184-the world , because , for the first time in [your]2116-you pampered life , the toy [you]2116-you cried for has not been put into [your]2116-you hand . " [Burgoyne]181-jim 's hopes have not been high , as to any salutary result of [his]181-jim own philippic while uttering it . But [our]4582-our words , sometimes , to [our]4582-our surprise , turn from wooden swords to steel daggers in [our]4582-our hands . For a moment [Byng]251-byng stands as if stunned ; then [he]251-byng breaks into a tornado of sobs and tears , such tears as have often before angered [[his]251-byng friend]393-his friend , but which now [he]251-byng welcomes the sight of , as perhaps precursors of a saner mood . "[2022-my dear old chap] Oh , [[my]0-i dear old chap]2022-my dear old chap ! " [he]251-byng cries , catching at [Jim]181-jim 's unresponsive hand , and wringing it hard , "[2022-my dear old chap] [she]2122-her is not dying really ? [You]2022-my dear old chap do not mean it ? [You]2022-my dear old chap are only saying it to frighten [me]0-i ? Oh ! dear , kind [Amelia]201-amelia . Not dying ! not dying ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i do not know : to - day is the turning - point , [they]2123-they say ; even now it may have come . " "[2123-they] And why are not [you]0-i with [her]2122-her ? Why do not [you]0-i go back to [her]2122-her ? " cries [Byng]251-byng , in a broken voice of passionate excitement , the tears still racing down [his]251-byng face . "[0-i] And leave [you]0-i to go tomfooling out there again ? " asks [Jim]181-jim , with a nod of [his]181-jim head towards [the balcony]4584-the balcony , seen from where [they]2123-they stand , grilling in the midday blaze . [The verb employed , if closely looked into]4585-the verb employed , if closely looked into , bears a ludicrous disproportion to the intended action indicated , but [neither of the men]4586-neither of the men sees anything ridiculous in it . "[0-i] [I]0-i will not ! " cries [Byng]251-byng , in eager asseveration ; "[0-i] [I]0-i give [you]0-i [my]0-i word of honour [I]0-i will not ; if [you]0-i do not believe [me]0-i , take [me]0-i with [you]0-i ! Keep [me]0-i with [you]0-i all day ! Do [you]0-i think that [I]0-i , too , do not want to know how [Amelia]201-amelia is ? Do [you]0-i think that [I]0-i am indifferent as to whether [she]201-amelia lives or dies ? Poor , good [Amelia]201-amelia ! When [I]0-i think of that drive to [Vallombrosa]95-vallombrosa , only ten days ago ! [They]2124-they two sitting side by side , so happy , laughing and making friends with [each other]607-each other ! " [He]2127-my poor old man covers [his]2127-my poor old man face with [his]2127-my poor old man hands , and through them the scalding drops trickle ; but only for a moment . In the next , [he]2127-my poor old man has dashed them away , and is moving restlessly about [the room]442-the room , looking for [his]2127-my poor old man hat . "[0-i] Let [us]2126-us go this instant , " [he]2127-my poor old man says urgently ; "[0-i] [[my]0-i poor old man]2127-my poor old man , do [you]0-i think [I]0-i would willingly add a feather weight to [your]0-i burden ? [I]0-i should never forgive [myself]0-i if [I]0-i kept [you]0-i a second longer from [her]2127-my poor old man at such a time ; let [us]2126-us go at once . " [Burgoyne]181-jim complies ; but under pretext of making some change in [his]181-jim dress , escapes from [[his]181-jim friend]393-his friend , for just the few minutes necessary to write and despatch a telegram to [[the young man]643-the young man 's mother]4034-the young man 's mother . It runs thus : "[2126-us] No cause for alarm , but come at once . [He]2127-my poor old man is perfectly well , but needs [you]0-i . " If , as is to be hoped , [Mrs. Byng]203-byng is still in [London]1-london , reaping the succession of [the old relative whose death - bed [she]203-byng had quitted [Florence]20-florence to attend]4591-the old relative whose death - bed she had quitted florence to attend , [his]2127-my poor old man message will bring [her]203-byng hither within forty - eight hours , and the burden of responsibility , now grown so insupportable , will be shifted from [his]2127-my poor old man shoulders . Until those forty - eight hours have elapsed , [he]2127-my poor old man must not again let [Byng]203-byng out of [his]2127-my poor old man sight . The day rolls by , the critical ninth day rolls by on its torrid wheels to eventide , and when that eventide comes , it finds [Cecilia Wilson]222-cecilia running down from [[Amelia]201-amelia 's room]4592-amelia 's room , to give the last news of [her]222-cecilia to [the three men]4593-the three men and [one woman waiting below]4594-one woman waiting below . "[2127-my poor old man] [I]0-i think [he]2127-my poor old man seems quite satisfied , " [she]0-i says , in answer to the silent hungry looks of question addressed to [her]0-i , and alluding to [the doctor]1869-the doctor , who is still with [the patient]4596-the patient ; "[2127-my poor old man] the strength is maintained ; the temperature lower . " What a dreadful parrot - sound the two phrases , so familiar to [us]4597-us all in the newspaper bulletins of [distinguished men on [their]4598-distinguished men on their death - beds death - beds]4598-distinguished men on their death - beds , have during the last week assumed in [Burgoyne]181-jim 's ears ; "[2128-you] [you]2128-you can speak to [him]2127-my poor old man [yourself]2128-you when [he]2127-my poor old man comes down , of course , [Jim]181-jim ; but [I]0-i am sure [he]2127-my poor old man is satisfied . " "[2127-my poor old man] [She]0-i is better!—she is saved ! " cries [Byng]203-byng , rushing forward and snatching both [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's hands—"do[0-i] [you]0-i say that [she]0-i is really saved ? " "[0-i] Oh , are [you]0-i here still , [Mr. Byng]251-byng ? how very kind of [you]0-i ! " replies [Cecilia]222-cecilia , a tinge of colour rushing over [her]222-cecilia mealy face — that face , ten days ago , clothed in so many roses—"well[2127-my poor old man] , [I]0-i am afraid [he]2127-my poor old man does not go quite so far as that , but [he]2127-my poor old man says it is as much as [we]2129-we can expect , and even [I]0-i can see that [she]0-i is not nearly so restless . " "[0-i] Thank [God!—thank God]214-god ! " In the ardour of [his]2127-my poor old man thanksgiving [he]2127-my poor old man presses [her]222-cecilia hands closer , instead of dropping them , a fact of which [he]2127-my poor old man is entirely unaware , but so is not [she]222-cecilia ; and who knows , even at that serious moment , what tiny genial hope may slide into [her]222-cecilia plump heart ! Again this night [Burgoyne]181-jim does not go to bed , from a superstitious fear that if [he]181-jim does , if [he]181-jim seems to take for granted an improvement , that very taking for granted may annul it — may bring on a relapse . But when the next morning finds no such backsliding to have taken place , when each hour through the cheerfully broadening day brings falling fever and steadying pulse , then indeed [he]181-jim cautiously opens the door of [his]181-jim heart to let a tiny rose - pinioned hope creep in — then at last , on the third night , [he]181-jim stretches [his]181-jim tired limbs in deep slumber upon [his]181-jim bed . [He]181-jim has received a brief telegram from [Mrs. Byng]203-byng to announce [her]222-cecilia arrival as fast as [boat and train]4599-boat and train can bring [her]222-cecilia ; and seven o'clock on Saturday morning — [he]181-jim having sent [his]181-jim despatch to [her]222-cecilia on the previous Wednesday — finds [him]181-jim pacing [the platform of [the railway - station]4601-the railway - station]4600-the platform of the railway - station , awaiting the incoming of [the morning express]4602-the morning express from [Turin]298-turin . [He]181-jim is pacing it alone , for [he]181-jim has thought it best not to reveal to [[her]222-cecilia son]600-her son the fact of [her]222-cecilia expected return , not being at all sure in what spirit [he]181-jim will receive it , nor whether indeed the news of it might not even drive [him]181-jim , in [his]181-jim present unsound state of mind , to fly from the place at [her]222-cecilia approach . The morning air , in its early clear coolness , blows sweet here , under [the station]661-the station - roof , unconquered even by engine smoke , and on [Jim]181-jim 's face as [he]181-jim walks up and down — careworn as it still is — there comes , now and again , a half - born smile . [He]181-jim is never one to hope very easily , but surely now — now that yet another night has been prosperously tided over , there can , even to [him]181-jim , seem no reasonable ground for doubt that [Amelia]201-amelia has turned the corner . [Amelia]201-amelia , with the corner turned — [Byng]203-byng , in five minutes wholly off [his]181-jim hands ! The only wonder is , that the small smile never comes quite to the birth . [The train]675-the train is punctual , and almost at its due moment draws up in dusty length at [the platform]412-the platform . [Its passengers]4607-its passengers are comparatively few ; for at this latening season [most of [the English]320-the english]4608-most of the english are winging [home]401-home to [their rooky woods]4610-their rooky woods ; and [he]181-jim has no difficulty in at once discovering among [them]4608-most of the english [the tall smart figure — smart even after forty - eight hours of the unluxurious luxury of [a wagon - lit]4612-a wagon - lit — of [the lady [he]181-jim is awaiting]4613-the lady he is awaiting]4611-the tall smart figure — smart even after forty - eight hours of the unluxurious luxury of a wagon - lit — of the lady he is awaiting . As [he]181-jim gives [her]4613-the lady he is awaiting [his]181-jim hand to help [her]4613-the lady he is awaiting down the high step , the admiring thought crosses [his]181-jim mind of what a large quantity of fatigue , dust , and uneasiness of mind [a radically good - looking Englishwoman , in radically good clothes]4614-a radically good - looking englishwoman , in radically good clothes , can undergo without seeming much the worse for [them]4614-a radically good - looking englishwoman , in radically good clothes . Before [her]4613-the lady he is awaiting neat narrow foot has touched [the pavement]4573-the pavement , a brace of eager questions shoots out of [her]4613-the lady he is awaiting mouth . "[214-god] Am [I]0-i in time ? Am [I]0-i too late ? " "[0-i] In time for what ? Too late for what ? " "[2130-he] Has [he]2130-he — has [he]2130-he done anything — anything irrevocable ? Is [he]2130-he — is [he]2130-he ? [I]0-i suppose [that horrid woman]2131-that horrid woman has got hold of [him]2130-he ? [I]0-i suppose that is why [you]2132-you sent for [me]0-i ! " By this time [she]4613-the lady he is awaiting is safely landed at [his]2130-he side , which is possibly the reason why [he]2130-he at once lets fall [her]4613-the lady he is awaiting hand . "[2132-you] [I]0-i am not aware that there is [any ' horrid woman]2133-any ' horrid woman ' in the case . " "[2131-that horrid woman] Oh , what does it matter what [I]0-i call [her]2131-that horrid woman ? " cries [the mother]579-the mother , fast becoming frantic at the delay in answering [her]0-i passionate questions . "[2131-that horrid woman] [I]0-i will call [her]2131-that horrid woman what [you]2132-you please ; [you]2132-you know perfectly whom [I]0-i mean ; [she]2131-that horrid woman has got hold of [him]2130-he , [I]0-i suppose . [I]0-i always knew [she]2131-that horrid woman would ! Did not [I]0-i tell [you]2132-you so ? but is it too late ? is there no way of getting [him]2130-he off ? " Now that [Burgoyne]181-jim has a nearer view of [Mrs. Byng]203-byng , [he]181-jim sees that [she]203-byng has a more fagged and travel - worn air than [he]181-jim had at first supposed , and [her]203-byng dusty eyes are fastened upon [him]181-jim with such a hunger of interrogation , that , angered and jarred as [he]181-jim is by [her]203-byng tone , [he]181-jim has not the heart any longer to keep [her]203-byng in suspense . "[0-i] If [you]2132-you are alluding to [Miss Le Marchant]240-miss le marchant , [I]0-i may as well tell [you]2132-you at once that [she]2131-that horrid woman has left [Florence]20-florence . " "[2131-that horrid woman] Left [Florence]20-florence ! Do [you]2132-you mean to say that [she]2131-that horrid woman has run away with [someone else]4028-someone else ? " [She]203-byng puts the question in all good faith , [her]203-byng lively imagination having easily made the not very wide jump from the fact already established in [her]203-byng own mind of [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth being [an adventuress]4617-an adventuress , to the not much more difficult one to swallow , of [her]203-byng having devoured another fils de famille , as well as [Mrs. Byng]203-byng 's own . For a moment , [Burgoyne]181-jim turns away , voice and countenance alike beyond [his]181-jim control . [He]181-jim has by no means perfectly recovered either , when [he]181-jim answers — "[2131-that horrid woman] Yes , with [someone else]4028-someone else — [she]2131-that horrid woman has reached the pitch of turpitude of leaving [Florence]20-florence with [[her]2131-that horrid woman mother]3300-her mother . " "[2131-that horrid woman] [She]2131-that horrid woman is gone ? " cries [Mrs. Byng]203-byng , with an accent of the highest relief and joy ; "[2137-you] gone away altogether , do [you]2137-you mean?—oh , thank [God!"—then]321-god!"—then , with a sudden lapse into affright , [she]203-byng adds rapidly—"and[2131-that horrid woman] [he]2131-that horrid woman is gone after [her?—he]2131-that horrid woman is not [here]637-here ? " "[2131-that horrid woman] No , [he]2131-that horrid woman is here . " "[2131-that horrid woman] Then why has not [he]2131-that horrid woman come to meet me?"—suspiciously . "[2131-that horrid woman] [He]2131-that horrid woman did not know [you]2137-you were expected . " "[2137-you] [You]2137-you did not tell [him]2131-that horrid woman ? " "[2137-you] No . " "[2137-you] Do [you]2137-you mean to say"—falling from [her]2137-you former rapidity of utterance to a dismayed incredulous slowness—"that[2137-you] [he]2131-that horrid woman will not be glad to see [me?—that]2139-me?—that [Willy]222-cecilia will not be glad to see [me]0-i ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i mean to say that [I]0-i am afraid [you]2137-you will not find [him]2131-that horrid woman very much in sympathy with [you]2137-you ; [I]0-i do not think [he]2131-that horrid woman will find it easy to hear [you]2137-you speak of [Miss Le Marchant]240-miss le marchant in the terms , and make the implication about [her]240-miss le marchant that [you]2137-you did just now , " replies [Jim]181-jim , avenging by this sentence the wrongs done to [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , and doing it so well , that a moment later a feeling of compunction comes over [him]181-jim at the success of [his]181-jim own attempt at retributive justice . [Mrs. Byng]203-byng turns pale . "[2137-you] Then [she]240-miss le marchant has got hold of [him]2131-that horrid woman ? " [she]203-byng says under [her]203-byng breath . "[240-miss le marchant] Got hold of [him]2131-that horrid woman ? " repeats [Jim]181-jim , [his]181-jim ire aroused again , no sooner than allayed , by this mode of expression ; "[2137-you] [you]2137-you certainly have the most extraordinary way of misconceiving the situation ! Got hold of [him]2131-that horrid woman ? when [she]240-miss le marchant had to leave [Florence]20-florence at a moment 's notice to escape [his]2131-that horrid woman importunities ! " But at this , [[Mr. Burgoyne]198-burgoyne 's auditor]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor looks so hopelessly bewildered that [he]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor thinks it the simplest plan at once , in the fewest possible words , to put [her]240-miss le marchant in possession of the tale of [[her]240-miss le marchant son]600-her son 's achievements and disasters . [He]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor does this , partly to stem the torrent of [her]240-miss le marchant questions , the form that [they]4620-they have hitherto taken producing in [him]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor a feeling of frenzied indignation , which [he]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor doubts [his]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor own power much longer to conceal — partly in order to set [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's conduct with the least possible delay in its true light before [her]240-miss le marchant . Surely , when [she]240-miss le marchant has been told of [her]240-miss le marchant magnanimous renunciation , [she]240-miss le marchant will do [her]240-miss le marchant justice , will cease to load [her]240-miss le marchant with those hard names and insulting assertions that have made [him]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor grind [his]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor own teeth to listen to . But in this expectation [he]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor soon finds that [he]4618-mr. burgoyne 's auditor is mistaken . The wrath of [Mrs. Byng]203-byng against [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth for having "[240-miss le marchant] drawn in " [[her]2141-her son]600-her son , as [she]2141-her persists in stating the case , is surpassed only by indignation at [her]2141-her insolence in having "[2141-her] thrown [him]2140-he over . " As to the genuineness of this last action [she]2141-her expresses , it is true , the most complete incredulity . "[2141-her] It was only to enhance [her]2141-her own value . Do [you]2142-you suppose that [she]2141-her expected [him]2140-he to take [her]2141-her at [her]2141-her word ? " "[0-i] [I]0-i would not put it into [his]2140-he head , if [I]0-i were [you]2142-you , " replies [Jim]181-jim , with an anger no less real , and a merriment no less spurious than [her]0-i own . "[0-i] [I]0-i am afraid that there is not much doubt of that . " "[0-i] What do [you]0-i mean?—she is not ill , surely?"—in a tone of lively surprise—"Amelia[0-i] ill?—impossible ! " [He]181-jim looks at [her]2146-the old hen with an irrational stupefaction . It appears to [him]181-jim now , in the distortion of all objects that the last fortnight has brought , as if [Amelia]201-amelia 's illness had spread over the whole of [his]181-jim life , as if there had never been a time when [she]201-amelia had not been ill , and yet of this event , immense as it seems to [him]181-jim in its duration , [the woman before [him]181-jim]1269-the woman before him obviously has never heard . When [he]181-jim comes to think of it , how should [she]201-amelia ? In point of fact it is not a fortnight since [Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson fell sick , and during that fortnight [he]181-jim [himself]181-jim has not written [her]2146-the old hen a line ; neither , [he]181-jim is equally sure , has [[her]2146-the old hen son]600-her son . " In answer [he]181-jim tells [her]2146-the old hen , with as much brevity and compression as [he]181-jim had employed in the tale of [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's disappearance , that of [Amelia]201-amelia 's illness , often interrupted by [her]2146-the old hen expressions of sympathy . " [Her]2146-the old hen adoption of [his]181-jim trouble as [her]2146-the old hen own , an adoption whose sincerity is confirmed by [her]2146-the old hen impulsive seizure of [his]181-jim hand , and the feeling look in [her]2146-the old hen handsome eyes make [him]181-jim forgive the exaggeration of [her]2146-the old hen statement , and go some way towards replacing [her]2146-the old hen in that position in [his]181-jim esteem which [her]2146-the old hen diatribes against [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth had gone near to making [her]2146-the old hen forfeit . "[2147-her] But it will be all right now , " continues [she]2146-the old hen sanguinely ; "[2147-her] there will be nothing to do but to build up [her]2148-she strength again , and [she]2148-she is young — at least"—as the reminiscence of [Amelia]201-amelia 's unyouthful appearance evidently flashes across [her]2146-the old hen mind , of that prematurely middle - aged look which an unequal fortune gives to some plain women—"at[2147-her] least , young enough for all practical purposes . " Whether it be due to the possession of this modified form of juvenility , to an excellent constitution , or to what other reason , certain it is that the next two days go by without any diminution , rather with a sensible and steady increase , in [Miss Wilson]200-miss wilson 's favourable symptoms , and , on the afternoon of the latter of these days , [Cecilia]222-cecilia , in rather impatient answer to [Jim]181-jim 's long daily string of questions about [her]2148-she , says : "[2149-you] [You]2149-you could judge much better if [you]2149-you saw [her]2148-she [yourself]2149-you . [I]0-i do not see why [you]2149-you should not see [her]2148-she to - morrow for a minute , that is to say , if [you]2149-you would promise not to talk or ask [her]2148-she any questions . " "[2149-you] But would it be safe ? " inquires [he]181-jim , with a tremble in [his]181-jim voice . [He]181-jim desires passionately to see [her]2148-she ; until [he]181-jim does [he]181-jim will never believe that [she]2148-she is really going to live ; [he]181-jim has a hunger to assure [himself]181-jim that no terrible metamorphosis has passed over [her]2148-she in these nightmare days ; and yet , coupled with that hunger , is a deep dread , which translates itself into [his]181-jim next halting words . "[0-i] Shall [I]0-i be — shall [I]0-i be very much shocked ? is [she]2148-she — is [she]2148-she very much changed ? " "[2148-she] [She]2148-she does look pretty bad , " replies [Cecilia]222-cecilia half sadly , yet with the sub - lying cheerfulness of assured hope ; "[2148-she] for one thing [she]2148-she is so wasted . [I]0-i suppose that that is what makes [her]2148-she look so much older ; but then [you]2150-you know [Amelia]201-amelia never did look young . " It is the second time within two days that the fact of [[his]181-jim betrothed]605-his betrothed 's maturity has been impressed upon [him]181-jim , and formerly it would have caused [him]181-jim a pang ; but now , of what moment is it to [him]181-jim that [she]2148-she looks a hundred , if only [she]2148-she is living , and going to live ? "[2148-she] Has [she]2148-she — has [she]2148-she asked after [me]0-i ? " "[2148-she] [We]2151-we do not allow [her]2148-she to speak , but if [anyone]3161-anyone mentions [your]2150-you name there comes a sort of smile over [her]2148-she face ; such a ridiculous - sized face as it is now ! " The tears have come into [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's large stupid eyes , and [Jim]181-jim [himself]181-jim is , with regard to [her]222-cecilia , in the position of the great Plantagenet , when [he]181-jim heard the lovely tale of [York]116-york and [Suffolk]322-suffolk 's high death . As [he]181-jim walks away [he]181-jim is filled with a solemn joy , one of those deep serious gladnesses with which not [the stranger]3804-the stranger , no , nor even [the close friend or loving kinsman]4632-the close friend or loving kinsman intermeddleth . [He]181-jim is under an engagement to meet [Mrs. Byng]203-byng at a certain hour , but although that hour has already come and passed , [he]181-jim feels that [he]181-jim can not face all [her]203-byng sincere congratulations without some preparatory toning down of [his]181-jim mood . [The streets]1311-the streets , with [their]1311-the streets gay va - et - vient , [their]1311-the streets cracking whips and shouting drivers , seem all too secular and every - day to match the profundity of [his]181-jim reverent thankfulness . [He]181-jim takes it with [him]181-jim into [the great cool church that stands so nigh at hand to [[his]181-jim hotel]760-his hotel]4634-the great cool church that stands so nigh at hand to his hotel , [Santa Maria Novella]83-santa maria novella . The doors fall behind [him]181-jim noiselessly as [he]181-jim enters , shutting out [the fiery hot piazza]4636-the fiery hot piazza , and the garish noises of [the world]3184-the world . In the great dim interior , cold and tranquil , there is the usual sprinkling of [tourists]1597-tourists peering up at [its]760-his hotel soaring columns , trying to read [themselves]1597-tourists , out of [their]1597-tourists guide - books , into a proper admiration for [Cimabue]323-cimabue 's large - faced Virgin and ugly Bambino , folded , with all its gold and sombre colours , in the dignity of [its]760-his hotel twice two centuries of gloom . There are [the usual three or four blue - trousered soldiers]4639-the usual three or four blue - trousered soldiers strolling leisurely about , there is a curly - tailed little dog trotting hither and thither unforbidden , ringing [his]181-jim bell , and there are [the invariable tanned peasant - women kneeling at the side - altars]4640-the invariable tanned peasant - women kneeling at the side - altars . [He]181-jim does not belong to [the ancient Church]4641-the ancient church , but to - day [he]181-jim kneels beside [them]4640-the invariable tanned peasant - women kneeling at the side - altars , and the tears [he]181-jim had hastened away to hide from [Cecilia]222-cecilia come back to make yet dimmer to [his]181-jim view the details of the dim altar - pieces behind the tall candles . [His]181-jim eye , as [he]181-jim rises to [his]181-jim feet again , falls on [the contadina nearest [him]181-jim]4642-the contadina nearest him . What is [she]4642-the contadina nearest him praying for ?
