"[181-jim] As [he]181-jim leaves [the house]986-the house and [the appeased fair one]2641-the appeased fair one , after luncheon , an hour and a half later , [he]181-jim tells [himself]181-jim that [he]181-jim has got off cheaply in having vaguely sacrificed the whole of [his]181-jim Algerian future , but having preserved to - day and to - morrow . [Jim]181-jim 's first care on returning to [[his]181-jim hotel]760-his hotel is to ascertain that the departure for [Hammam Rhira]144-hammam rhira has really taken place , and , having been reassured on this point , retires to [[his]181-jim own bedroom]1344-his own bedroom to reconnoitre [the terrace]908-the terrace , upon which [it]908-the terrace gives . The sun has long drunk up the rain from the tiles , and the chairs have been set out again . [[The hotel]1144-the hotel guests]2646-the hotel guests , in all the sociability of [their]2646-the hotel guests after - luncheon mood , are standing and sitting about . [The widow Wadman]345-the widow wadman , with great play of eyebrow and lip , is pacing up and down in arch conversation with [[her]345-the widow wadman habitual victim]2647-her habitual victim . Snatches of [her]345-the widow wadman alluring talk reach [Jim]181-jim behind [his]181-jim muslin curtain as [she]345-the widow wadman comes and goes : " [I]181-jim think that caged birds ought to be loved ! "[181-jim] " [The Prophet]4983-the prophet was [a wise man]4984-a wise man , was not [he]4983-the prophet ? [he]4983-the prophet knew a little about [us]4985-us , "[181-jim] etc . In [her]345-the widow wadman usual place , aloof from [the rest of [the company]1638-the company]2648-the rest of the company , [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth is sitting in a clinging white gown of some woolly stuff . With a dainty white kerchief twisted about [her]345-the widow wadman head , and a bundle of many - tinted Eastern stuffs on [her]345-the widow wadman knees , [she]345-the widow wadman looks like [a little Romney]2650-a little romney . Now and again , as fragments of [the widow]2651-the widow 's siren strains reach [her]345-the widow wadman ears , [he]181-jim sees [her]345-the widow wadman lips curl up into delighted laughter ; but , for the most part , [she]345-the widow wadman seems to be looking round rather uneasily , as if seeking something or [someone]529-someone . Can it be [himself]181-jim that [she]345-the widow wadman , in [her]345-the widow wadman innocence of being observed , is on the watch for ? [He]181-jim has no right to be playing the spy on [her]345-the widow wadman in any case . It is clear that , dressed as [she]345-the widow wadman is , [she]345-the widow wadman can not be meditating going out . [He]181-jim must not frighten [her]345-the widow wadman by any too direct or sudden attentions . In a little while [the other occupants of [the terrace]908-the terrace]2653-the other occupants of the terrace will drift away , and [he]181-jim will stroll out and join [her]345-the widow wadman , and together [they]2655-they will watch the shade of the ficus - tree , lengthening over the red flags . But [she]345-the widow wadman presently baffles [his]181-jim calculations by rising , and , with [her]345-the widow wadman rainbow - tinted pile of brocades clasped in [her]345-the widow wadman slender arms , slowly passes into [the house]986-the house . Has [she]345-the widow wadman retreated thither for good ? and will [he]181-jim have to frame some new flimsy excuse for knocking at [her]345-the widow wadman door ? But again [he]181-jim is out of [his]181-jim reckoning , for in about a quarter of an hour [she]345-the widow wadman re - issues , dressed for walking ; and after one more lingering and , as it seems to [him]181-jim , disappointed glance around [her]345-the widow wadman , paces , [a solitary little figure]2657-a solitary little figure , down [the hill]1467-the hill . [He]181-jim lays [his]181-jim watch before [him]181-jim , and , having counted five minutes on its dial - plate , sets off in pursuit . [He]181-jim overtakes [her]345-the widow wadman just as [she]345-the widow wadman reaches the point where [the lane]2659-the lane debouches into [the highroad]2660-the highroad . [She]345-the widow wadman stands , looking rather disconsolately , first up [the hill]1467-the hill , then down [it]1467-the hill , evidently uncertain which direction to choose . " [You]345-the widow wadman can not make up [your]345-the widow wadman mind ? "[181-jim] [he]181-jim says , pausing beside [her]345-the widow wadman , and taking off [his]181-jim hat . [She]345-the widow wadman gives a slight start , and a friendly , pleased smile runs all over [her]345-the widow wadman face and up into [her]345-the widow wadman eyes — a smile that makes [him]181-jim say to [himself]181-jim confidently that it was [he]181-jim whom [her]345-the widow wadman glance had been seeking on [the terrace]908-the terrace . " Which do [you]181-jim advise ? "[181-jim] " [I]181-jim advise [the town]407-the town . "[181-jim] [He]181-jim has long known [her]345-the widow wadman teachableness , so it is no great surprise to [him]181-jim that [she]345-the widow wadman at once turns in the direction counselled . " As [I]181-jim am going [there]455-there [myself]181-jim , will [you]181-jim allow [me]181-jim to walk a little way with [you]181-jim ? "[181-jim] [He]181-jim makes the request with respectful diffidence ; and [she]345-the widow wadman , after one small troubled look , evidently given to the memory of [[her]345-the widow wadman father]3214-her father , assents . [They]2664-they set off down [the hill]1467-the hill together , the air , sharp after the rain — as sharp , at least , as [Algiers]120-algiers ' stingless air ever is — bringing the colour to [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's cheeks , as [she]345-the widow wadman steps along light - heartedly , scarcely refraining from breaking into a run , down the steep incline . [Her]345-the widow wadman spirits are so evidently rising at [every yard]2666-every yard that [he]181-jim hazards [his]181-jim next step . " [I]181-jim am going to see [the Arab town]2399-the arab town ; [Miss Strutt]346-miss strutt says that [I]181-jim ought . "[181-jim] " [She]346-miss strutt meant [you]181-jim to ask [her]346-miss strutt to show it [you]181-jim ! "[193-elizabeth] cries [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , with a laugh ; " but [she]346-miss strutt was quite right — it is delightful ; [I]181-jim am sure [you]181-jim will like it . "[181-jim] " [You]181-jim have been [there]455-there ? "[181-jim] " Yes , once or twice ; not half so often"—regretfully—"as[181-jim] [I]0-i should like to have been . " Dare [he]181-jim speak upon the last innocent hint ? But while [he]181-jim is doubting [she]193-elizabeth goes on : "[181-jim] [You]181-jim must take care not to lose [yourself]181-jim ; it is such [a puzzling place]2667-a puzzling place ; all [the streets]1311-the streets are exactly like each other . " "[181-jim] [You]181-jim do not feel inclined to show [me]0-i the way about it ? " [He]181-jim throws out the suggestion in a semi - bantering voice , so that if it meet with obvious disapproval [he]181-jim may at once withdraw it . [She]193-elizabeth stops suddenly stock - still , and faces [him]181-jim . "[181-jim] Are [you]181-jim speaking seriously ? It would be very delightful ; but do [you]181-jim think [I]0-i might ? do [you]181-jim think [I]0-i ought ? " [She]193-elizabeth lifts [her]193-elizabeth eyes , widely opened , like [a child]3970-a child 's at hearing of some unexpected treat , to [his]181-jim . How astonishingly clear they are ! and how curiously guileless ! [He]181-jim has not the least doubt that [she]193-elizabeth will sweetly acquiesce in [his]181-jim decision , whichever way it tends ; and , for a second , a movement of irritation with [her]193-elizabeth for [her]193-elizabeth pliability crosses [his]181-jim mind . [She]193-elizabeth ought to be able to have an opinion of [her]193-elizabeth own . While [he]181-jim hesitates , [she]193-elizabeth speaks again . "[181-jim] It is just the afternoon to do something pleasant on , " [she]193-elizabeth says wistfully , and yet gaily too . "[181-jim] Oh , how good the air tastes ! and how dearly [I]0-i love the sun!"—lifting [her]193-elizabeth face with sensitive lips , half open , as if to suck in [his]181-jim beams , to the great gold luminary pouring down [his]181-jim warmth through the pepper - trees upon them . "[2669-you] But [I]0-i will take [your]2669-you advice ; [I]0-i know of old"—with a pretty flattering smile—"that[2669-you] [you]2669-you always give good advice . Do [you]2669-you think that [I]0-i ought — do [you]2669-you really think that [I]0-i ought ? " [He]181-jim throws conscience to the winds , and although not two hours ago [he]181-jim had professed to Cecilia [his]181-jim inability to decide upon the propriety or impropriety of any given course of female action , now answers with an almost brutal decisiveness : "[2669-you] [I]0-i do not think that there is the smallest doubt about it . " A relieved look crosses [her]193-elizabeth features . "[2669-you] Then [I]0-i am sure it is all right , " [she]193-elizabeth says , with a joyful surrendering of [her]193-elizabeth judgment into [his]181-jim keeping , and so , once again , steps along with [her]193-elizabeth quick feather - light feet at [his]181-jim side . For the moment [she]193-elizabeth is the happier of [the two]4644-the two , since [he]181-jim is not perfectly pleased either with [himself]181-jim or [her]193-elizabeth . It is in vain that [he]181-jim tells [himself]181-jim that it is [no babe whom [he]181-jim is beguiling]4992-no babe whom he is beguiling ; that , difficult as it is to believe it , those limpid eyes have looked at the sun for seven - and - twenty years . [He]181-jim still has a lingering sense of discomfort at having availed [himself]181-jim , for [his]181-jim own profit , of [her]193-elizabeth ductility . And yet , five minutes later , [he]181-jim takes yet further advantage of that quality in [her]193-elizabeth . [They]2675-we have reached [the Plateau Saulière]2414-the plateau saulière , and the stand of fiacres that "[2669-you] stationnent " there . [Jim]181-jim pauses . "[2669-you] It is a good distance to [the Arab town]2399-the arab town , [I]0-i fancy , and very tiring walking when [you]2671-you get [there]455-there . " "[2671-you] [It]2673-it is as steep as the side of [a house]3171-a house ; [we]2675-we shall be like flies on a wall , " cries [she]193-elizabeth delightedly . "[2671-you] It would be a pity to be too tired to enjoy it before [you]2671-you got [there]455-there , would not it ? " says [he]181-jim doubtfully , and eyeing [her]193-elizabeth bright slenderness with an air of uncertainty as to [her]193-elizabeth powers of endurance . "[2671-you] Had not [we]2675-we better — would [you]2671-you mind — [our]2675-we driving [there]455-there ? " "[2671-you] [I]0-i am not at all tired , " replies [she]193-elizabeth ; "[2671-you] [I]0-i do not feel as if [I]0-i ever should be tired to - day ; but if [you]2671-you think it better — — " Still [he]181-jim looks at [her]193-elizabeth dubiously . To [him]181-jim there appears to be a much greater degree of the compromising in a tête - à - tête drive than in a walk . In the one case the meeting may have been accidental ; in the other there can be no mistake as to the deliberate intention . But either this does not strike [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , or [she]193-elizabeth thinks , "[2671-you] In for a penny , in for a pound " ; or , lastly , and most probably , having given up [her]193-elizabeth judgment into [his]181-jim keeping , [she]193-elizabeth finds it easiest and most natural to acquiesce in whatever [he]181-jim may propose . The ungenerous thought flashes across [him]181-jim that if this is the principle on which [she]193-elizabeth has guided [her]193-elizabeth life , it is small wonder if [she]193-elizabeth have made shipwreck of it . [He]181-jim hails [a fiacre]3420-a fiacre , and silently hands [her]193-elizabeth in , and again [they]4995-they are off . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth has disclaimed fatigue , and yet the restful position is evidently agreeable to [her]193-elizabeth delicate body ; and [she]193-elizabeth thanks [him]181-jim so gratefully for [his]181-jim thought of [her]193-elizabeth that [his]181-jim hard thoughts of [her]193-elizabeth dissolve into remorse , and by - and - by change into an enjoyment almost as entire and uncalculating as [her]193-elizabeth own . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth has astonishing powers of enjoying [herself]193-elizabeth . If [he]181-jim had not known that fact before , the afternoon would have revealed it to [him]181-jim . [She]193-elizabeth must have driven through [the French town]2398-the french town almost every day since [her]193-elizabeth arrival , and yet [[its]2398-the french town cheerful white - shuttered houses]4997-its cheerful white - shuttered houses , [its]2398-the french town boulevards of glossy - leaved ficus - trees , [its]2398-the french town cafés , [[its]2398-the french town arcaded streets with [their]4998-its arcaded streets with their polyglot promenaders polyglot promenaders]4998-its arcaded streets with their polyglot promenaders , seem to fill [her]193-elizabeth with as lively a pleasure as if [she]193-elizabeth had but just landed from the steamboat that brought [her]193-elizabeth . [The three Spahis]4999-the three spahis , eternally sitting in a row on a bench outside [[some general officer]5000-some general officer 's quarters]5001-some general officer 's quarters , robed in [their]4999-the three spahis great red cloaks , with muslin - swathed swart heads and long red - leather boots , dimly descried beneath the stately sweep of [their]4999-the three spahis mantles , sitting there motionless , solemn and silent as [the Fates]5002-the fates ; [a venerable Arab]5003-a venerable arab , only to be distinguished from [Abraham]354-abraham or [Isaac]355-isaac by [his]5003-a venerable arab carrying a vulgar brown umbrella ; [a short Kabyle seen in back view]5004-a short kabyle seen in back view , with [his]5003-a venerable arab rope - bound headdress , [his]5003-a venerable arab brown - and - white striped frock , and [his]5003-a venerable arab bare red legs striding along , looking exactly like [a ludicrous and indelicate old woman]5005-a ludicrous and indelicate old woman ; [a Biskrah water - carrier]5006-a biskrah water - carrier , poising a great burnished copper pot on [his]5003-a venerable arab shoulder ; [two little baggy trousered white ladies waddling along]5007-two little baggy trousered white ladies waddling along ; a dozen of smart blue Turcos . [She]193-elizabeth is enraptured with [them]4999-the three spahis all . [They]4999-the three spahis leave [[their]4999-the three spahis fiacre]844-their fiacre in [the Place de la Cathédrale]5009-the place de la cathédrale , and enter upon [the mysterious recesses of [the Arab town]2399-the arab town]5010-the mysterious recesses of the arab town . Up and down [endless flights of steps]5012-endless flights of steps , up street after [street]5013-street — if [streets]1870-streets [they]1870-streets can be called , that are not wider than [a yard in [their]1870-streets widest part]5015-a yard in their widest part — and above [their]4999-the three spahis heads [the rafter - supported houses]5016-the rafter - supported houses lean together , letting scarce a glint of daylight drip down upon [the dusky path far below]5017-the dusky path far below . [They]4999-the three spahis pass arched doorways , with pretty designs in plaster — doorways whose doors open inwards upon mysterious interiors — [house]772-house or [court]5019-court , or [mosque or Marabé]5020-mosque or marabé . All along stand [tiny shops]5021-tiny shops , like [wild - beast dens]5022-wild - beast dens , as far as light and space go , lit only by the tempered light — in reality , only semi - darkness — that enters in front . How can [they]4999-the three spahis see to work — plait straw , for instance ? as [the three ebon - black negroes]5023-the three ebon - black negroes are doing , upon whom [they]4999-the three spahis stare in , asquat upon the ground . The turbans , and the red sashes , and the burnouses glimmer out of the little dim frontages , where charming pierced - brass Moorish lamps hang and swing aloft ; and tempting piles of dully splendid brocades and bright gold - laminated gauzes gleam from the crowded shelves . [The narrow streetlets]5024-the narrow streetlets are full of [unbusy , un - hurrying Easterns]5025-unbusy , un - hurrying easterns , hideous old negresses grinning like monkeys , idle [Arabs]340-arabs sauntering along in [their]340-arabs lazy grace , draped like Greek statues , sauntering along between the blue - washed walls that look in [their]1870-streets effective variation upon the blinding whitewash as if some of the sky - colour had rubbed off upon [them]1870-streets . [Jim]181-jim and [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth have paused , in [their]4999-the three spahis leisurely strolling and staring , to look from the straight shadowed alley in which [they]4999-the three spahis are standing up [a long flight of steps]5026-a long flight of steps to a low carved doorway , and a bit of starch - blue wall at the top . Down [the steep flight]5027-the steep flight [a veiled , trousered woman]5028-a veiled , trousered woman is waddling , [her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman immense pantaloons waggling awkwardly as [she]5028-a veiled , trousered woman descends . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth stands still , shaking with laughter at the sight . [Jim]181-jim laughs too . "[2671-you] There is no expense spared in material there , is there ? It would not be a bad dress for a fancy ball . Did [you]2678-you ever go to a fancy ball as [a Moorish lady]2679-a moorish lady ? " [Her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman laughter lessens , though [her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman face is still alight with mirth . "[2678-you] [I]0-i never was at a fancy ball . " "[2678-you] Never ? " "[2678-you] Never ; [I]0-i never was at any ball in [my]0-i life . " [Her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman laughter is quite dead now . "[0-i] Never at any ball in [your]2678-you life ! " repeats [he]181-jim , [his]181-jim surprise betraying [him]181-jim into one of those flights back into the past for which [she]5028-a veiled , trousered woman has always showed such repugnance . "[0-i] Why , [you]2678-you used to love dancing madly ! [I]0-i remember [your]2678-you dancing like [a dervish]2680-a dervish . What is more , [I]0-i remember dancing with [you]2678-you . " "[2678-you] Oh , do not remember anything to - day ! " cries [she]5028-a veiled , trousered woman , with a sort of writhe in [her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman voice ; "[2678-you] do not let either of [us]2681-us remember anything ! let [us]2681-us have a whole holiday from remembering ! " So saying , [she]5028-a veiled , trousered woman moves on quickly ; and yet with the dance gone out of [her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman feet . It never quite comes back . [They]2681-us look into [an Arab club]5029-an arab club , where [men]512-men are squatting , playing with odd - looking cards and drinking muddy coffee . Then a loud noise of jabbering young voices makes [them]2681-us peep in upon [an Arab school]5031-an arab school , where a circle of [little Moslems]5032-little moslems is sitting on the ground , scribbling Arabic on slates ; while between the knees of [the turbaned master]5033-the turbaned master [a tiny baby scholar , of three or four]5034-a tiny baby scholar , of three or four , is standing in a lovely dull green coatlet . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth strokes [the baby - learner]5035-the baby - learner 's coppery cheek with [her]193-elizabeth light hand , and says , with a laugh , that it seems odd to see [little street - boys]5036-little street - boys writing Arabic ; but [her]5028-a veiled , trousered woman laughter is no longer the bubbling , irrepressible joy - drunk thing it was before [he]5033-the turbaned master had indulged in [his]5033-the turbaned master tactless reminiscences ; it is the well - bred , civil , grown - up sound that so often has no inside gladness to match it . In [his]5033-the turbaned master vexation with [himself]5033-the turbaned master for the clouding over of [his]5033-the turbaned master little heaven that [he]5033-the turbaned master [himself]5033-the turbaned master has effected , [he]5033-the turbaned master tries to persuade [himself]5033-the turbaned master that it is caused by bodily fatigue . "[2678-you] If [I]0-i were asked , " [he]5033-the turbaned master says , by - and - by , looking down affectionately at [her]2682-her pallid profile , "[2678-you] [I]0-i should say that [you]2682-her had had about enough of this ; [your]2682-her spirit"—smiling—"is so very much too big for [your]2682-her body that [one]501-one has to keep an eye upon [you]2682-her . "[2682-her] " It would not be much of a spirit if it were not , "[2682-her] replies [she]2682-her , with a pretty air of perfectly sincere disparagement of [her]2682-her own slight proportions ; " [I]2682-her know that [I]2682-her look a poor thing , but [I]2682-her am rather [a fraud]5038-a fraud : [I]2682-her do not tire easily ; [I]2682-her am not tired now . "[2682-her] " Bored , then ? "[2682-her] with a slight accent of pique . [She]2682-her lifts [her]2682-her sweet look , with a sort of hurry of denial in it . " Most distinctly not . "[2682-her] " [You]2683-his would like to go on , then ? "[2682-her] " Yes . "[2682-her] " Or back ? "[2682-her] [She]2682-her hesitates , [her]2682-her eye exploring [his]2683-his with , as [he]2683-his feels , a genuine anxiety in it to discover what [his]2683-his own wishes are , so that [her]2682-her decision may jump with [them]2684-them . " Yes — perhaps ; [I]2683-his have really no choice . "[2683-his] [He]2683-his both looks at and speaks to [her]2682-her with a streak of exasperation . " Do [you]2682-her never have a will — a preference of [your]2682-her own ? "[2683-his] It is evidently no unfamiliar thing to [her]2682-her to be addressed with causeless irritability . The recollection of [[her]2682-her father]3214-her father 's tone in speaking to [her]2682-her flashes back remorsefully upon [Jim]181-jim 's memory . Is [he]2683-his [himself]2683-his going to take a leaf out of that book ? It would be a relief to [him]2683-his were [she]2682-her to answer [him]2683-his sharply ; but to do that is apparently not within [her]2682-her capabilities , though the tender red that tinges [her]2682-her cheek shows that [she]2682-her has felt [his]2683-his snub . " In this case [I]2682-her really have not , "[2682-her] [she]2682-her answers gently ; " but [I]2682-her dare say that it was tiresome of [me]2682-her not to speak more decidedly ; let [us]2686-they — let [us"—another]5039-us"—another[2682-her] swift and apparently quite involuntary glance at [him]2683-his to see that [she]2682-her is not , after all , running counter to [his]2683-his inclinations—"let [us]2686-they go [home]401-home ! "[2682-her] So [they]2686-they go [home]401-home . It is near sun - setting as [they]2686-they drive along [the Boulevard de la République]146-the boulevard de la république , the fitting end to so princely a day . At [the quay]2688-the quay [the moored vessels]2689-the moored vessels lie , [their]2689-the moored vessels masts and spars making a dark design against an ineffable evening sky of mother - of - pearl and translucent pink . [The sea]2491-the sea , which to - day has not been of sapphire , but of " watchet - blue , "[193-elizabeth] pierced and shot with white , now copies exactly the heavens . It , too , shades from opal to translucent pink . How many changes of raiment there are in the wardrobe of [the great wet mother]2691-the great wet mother ! " If [I]193-elizabeth had as many gowns as [the Mediterranean]130-the mediterranean , how well - dressed [I]193-elizabeth should be ! "[193-elizabeth] says [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , with a smile . It is the first time [she]193-elizabeth had spoken since [they]2686-they had set off on [their]2686-they return - drive . [She]193-elizabeth is lying back , with [her]193-elizabeth hands carefully shielding in [her]193-elizabeth lap a few little crockery pots that [she]193-elizabeth has bought of a fat Turk for [some children at [[her]193-elizabeth hotel]2693-her hotel]2692-some children at her hotel [Her]193-elizabeth face looks tired ; and yet over its small area is spread an expression of content that makes [his]2694-his heart warm . Is it only the pageant of sky and [ocean]2695-ocean that has called forth that look of real , if passing , happiness on the features of [her]193-elizabeth who is always so tremblingly sensitive an instrument for all influences of beauty and grandeur to play upon ? or has [his]2694-his own neighbourhood anything to say to it ? Before [he]2694-his can give [himself]2694-his an answer to this anxious question , [she]193-elizabeth speaks again . " [You]2694-his do not mind [my]193-elizabeth not talking , do [you]2694-his ? "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth asks , half apologetically , and yet with a confidence in [his]2694-his sympathy that still further quickens the beats of [his]2694-his already not very still heart . " No , [I]193-elizabeth am sure [you]2694-his do not . Somehow — it is a great gift — [you]2694-his always feel in tune with [one]501-one , and [one]501-one does not chatter most when one is most greatly pleased , does one ? Oh , what a treat [you]2694-his have given [me]193-elizabeth ! "[193-elizabeth] As [she]193-elizabeth speaks , [her]193-elizabeth humid eyes travel from [his]2694-his face to where , beyond [the long Atlas range]2696-the long atlas range , delicately toothed and cut out , rises the gold - washed snow of [the Kabyle mountains]2697-the kabyle mountains , that retire majestically invisible on dull days , and only come out , candescent and regal , when the great sun rides in pomp . Above [their]2698-their heads wild plumes of deep rose , that it seems ridiculous to call clouds , tuft the sky . [Jim]181-jim 's look has followed [[his]181-jim companion]603-his companion 's ; the chins of both are in the air ; the cheerful va et vient of [the boulevard]2700-the boulevard is lost upon [them]2698-their . [They]2698-their see neither [the Frenchmen]2701-the frenchmen nor [plump Frenchwomen]2702-plump frenchwomen drinking coffee outside [the cafés]2703-the cafés , nor [the idle indigènes]2704-the idle indigènes leaning draped against the sea - wall . ( Never does [that industrious race]2705-that industrious race seem to attempt any severer exertion . ) But it is brought back to life with a jump . " Arrêtez ! arrêtez ! "[181-jim] cries a female voice . " [Jim]181-jim ! [Jim]181-jim ! do [you]181-jim not see [us]2698-their ? Arrêtez ! arrêtez ! "[181-jim] Obedient to [his]2694-his ears , [Burgoyne]181-jim 's eyes make one bound from the heavenly spectacle down to [earth]754-earth , and alight upon [[the Wilsons]231-the wilsons ' carriage]2707-the wilsons ' carriage , which , going in the same direction as [himself]2694-his , has just been brought to a standstill alongside of [[his]2694-his fiacre]929-his fiacre , by [the solemnly beautiful , yellow - jacketed native coachman]2709-the solemnly beautiful , yellow - jacketed native coachman . It is , of course , [Cecilia]222-cecilia 's voice that has apostrophized [him]2694-his , but oh , portent ! does [his]2694-his vision , so lately recalled from the skyey bowers , play [him]2694-his false ? or is it really [the moribund Sybilla]221-sybilla , stretched beside [her]222-cecilia , with only two instead of three cushions at [her]222-cecilia back , with a bonnet on [her]222-cecilia head — [he]2694-his did not even know that [she]222-cecilia possessed a bonnet — and with a colour in [her]222-cecilia cheek and a lustre in [her]222-cecilia eye that may owe their origin either to the freshness of the evening air , or to the invigorating properties of the conversation of [the very ordinary - looking young man seated opposite to [her]222-cecilia]2710-the very ordinary - looking young man seated opposite to her ? In a second [Jim]181-jim has leapt out of [his]181-jim [own vehicle]2711-own vehicle , and gone to the side of the other . It is a perfectly futile impulse that leads [him]181-jim to do so . Not all the leaping in [the world]3184-the world from [her]222-cecilia side now can alter the fact that [he]181-jim has been driving tête - à - tête with [Elizabeth Le Marchant]193-elizabeth , and that [the Wilson sisters]2713-the wilson sisters have seen [him]181-jim so doing ; but yet it is a dim instinct of preservation towards , and shielding of [her]222-cecilia , that leads [him]181-jim to adopt this useless course of action . It is [Cecilia]222-cecilia who has summoned [him]181-jim , and yet , when [he]181-jim reaches [her]222-cecilia side , [she]222-cecilia does not seem to have anything particular to say to [him]181-jim . [Sybilla]221-sybilla is the one to address [him]181-jim . " A miracle ! a miracle ! [I]221-sybilla know [you]181-jim are saying to [yourself]181-jim ! "[221-sybilla] cries [she]221-sybilla , in a sprightly voice ; " and well [you]181-jim may ! This is [the miracle - monger]5043-the miracle - monger ! "[221-sybilla] indicating with a still sprightlier air [her]221-sybilla vis - à - vis . " [Dr. Crump]336-dr. crump , let [me]221-sybilla present to [you]336-dr. crump [Mr. Burgoyne]198-burgoyne — [Jim]181-jim , [[our]5044-our Jim , whom [I]221-sybilla have so often talked to [you]336-dr. crump about]181-jim . "[221-sybilla] [The person]2714-the person thus apostrophized responds by a florid bow , and an over - gallant asseveration that [any person introduced to [his]2714-the person acquaintance by [Miss Sybilla]356-sybilla]2715-any person introduced to his acquaintance by miss sybilla needs no further recommendation . " It is an experiment , of course ; there is no use in pretending that it is not an experiment , "[221-sybilla] continues [she]221-sybilla , with a slight relapse into languor ; " but"—lowering[221-sybilla] [her]221-sybilla voice a little—"they wished [me]221-sybilla to make the effort . "[221-sybilla] It is a favourite allocation of [Sybilla]356-sybilla 's that any course of action towards which [she]356-sybilla is inclined is adopted solely under the pressure of urgent wishes on the part of [[her]356-sybilla family]645-her family . [Burgoyne]198-burgoyne has long known , and been exasperated by , this peculiarity ; but at present [she]221-sybilla may say what [she]221-sybilla pleases ; [he]198-burgoyne hears no word of it , for [his]198-burgoyne ear is pricked to catch the sentences that [Cecilia]222-cecilia is leaning over the carriage - side to shoot at [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth . " Oh , [Miss Le Marchant]240-miss le marchant ! is it [you]336-dr. crump ? [I]221-sybilla beg [your]336-dr. crump pardon , [I]221-sybilla did not recognise [you]336-dr. crump at the first moment . [One]501-one does not recognise [people]3155-people — does [one?—when one]5047-one?—when one is not expecting to see [them"—is]5048-them"—is[221-sybilla] an intended sting lurking in this implication ? " How are [you]336-dr. crump ? How do [you]336-dr. crump like [Algiers]120-algiers ? [I]221-sybilla hope [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant is well . What a long time it is since [we]5049-we met ! [I]221-sybilla hope [we]5049-we shall see something of [you]336-dr. crump . "[221-sybilla] ( No , evidently no sting was meant . [Cecilia]222-cecilia , with all [her]222-cecilia faults , is really [a good soul]2717-a good soul , and [he]2718-he will take [her]222-cecilia to hear [the band]4974-the band play next Tuesday . ) There seems to [him]2718-he to be a slight falter in the tone with which [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth responds , and [her]193-elizabeth voice sounds curiously small and low ; but that may be merely owing to its flute quality , following upon and contrasting the other 's powerful organ . It is not till [the two parties]3901-the two parties have again separated , and that [he]2718-he is once more seated by [her]193-elizabeth side in the fiacre , that [he]2718-he dares steal a look at [her]193-elizabeth face to see how plainly written on it are the traces of vexation caused by a meeting which has produced in [his]2718-he own breast such acute annoyance . Good heavens ! it is even worse than [he]2718-he had expected . Down the cheek nearest to [him]2718-he two good - sized tears are unmistakably trickling . No doubt the consciousness of the mysterious story attaching to [her]193-elizabeth past makes [her]193-elizabeth smartingly aware of how doubly discreet [her]193-elizabeth own conduct should be — makes [her]193-elizabeth bitterly repent of [her]193-elizabeth present indiscretion . [He]2718-he is [a strait - laced man]2721-a strait - laced man , and it seems to [him]2718-he as if there were something gravely compromising to [her]193-elizabeth in this tête - à - tête drive with [himself]2718-he , in the known absence of [[her]193-elizabeth parents]583-her parents at [Hammam Rhira]144-hammam rhira . Why was [he]2718-he fool enough this morning to admit to [Cecilia]222-cecilia that [they]2723-they had gone thither ? [He]2718-he had no business to have led [her]193-elizabeth into temptation , and [she]193-elizabeth had no business to have fallen into it . Remorse and irritation give a tartness to [his]2718-he tone as [he]2718-he says : " After all , [I]2718-he do not think [you]193-elizabeth need take it so much to heart . "[2718-he] " Take what to heart ? "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth asks , in unaffected surprise , turning [her]193-elizabeth full face , and [her]193-elizabeth eyes , each with one hot raindrop dimming its slate - blue , upon [him]2718-he . " Oh , [I]193-elizabeth see"—a[193-elizabeth] sudden enlightenment coming to [her]193-elizabeth , and changing [her]193-elizabeth with instant spring from a snowdrop to a carnation—"I see what [you]2718-he mean ; but [you]2718-he are mistaken . [I]357-vallombrasa — [I]357-vallombrasa — it had not occurred to [me]357-vallombrasa ; [I]357-vallombrasa was only thinking — only remembering that the last time [I]357-vallombrasa saw [her]193-elizabeth was at — at [Vallombrosa]95-vallombrosa . "[357-vallombrasa] [Vallombrasa]357-vallombrasa ! Is [he]2718-he never to hear the last of [Vallombrosa]95-vallombrosa ? The latest waking impression left on [Jim]181-jim 's fancy is that it is the golden rule of [Elizabeth Le Marchant]193-elizabeth 's life to comply with any and every request that is made to [her]193-elizabeth ; moreover , that in [her]193-elizabeth mind the boundary - line which parts the permitted from the unpermitted is not so clearly defined as , did [she]193-elizabeth belong to [him]2718-he ( the naked hypothesis makes [his]2718-he strait - laced heart give a jump ) , [he]2718-he should wish it to be . If on the morrow , with the sun shining and the leaf - shadows dancing on the fretted balcony - wall , [he]2718-he invite [her]193-elizabeth to some fresh junket , [he]2718-he is sure that [she]193-elizabeth will readily and joyfully acquiesce ; that [her]193-elizabeth spirits will go up like rockets at the prospect ; and that [her]193-elizabeth one anxiety will be that [she]193-elizabeth may be sure to hit in [her]193-elizabeth choice upon the form of dissipation most congenial to [him]2718-he . [He]2718-he will therefore not invite [her]193-elizabeth . [He]2718-he will have a greater care for [her]193-elizabeth reputation than apparently [she]193-elizabeth has for it [herself]193-elizabeth . Not until the return of [[her]193-elizabeth parents]583-her parents , not until the difficulties of intercourse with [her]193-elizabeth are centupled , and the pleasure minimized , will [he]2718-he again seek [her]193-elizabeth . To put [himself]2718-he beyond the reach of temptation , [he]2718-he sets off immediately after breakfast on a long walking expedition , which [he]2718-he means to occupy the whole of the daylight hours . [He]2718-he wanders about [the great plain of [the Metidje]148-the metidje]2725-the great plain of the metidje ; [he]2718-he visits [a Kabyle village]2726-a kabyle village , with [its]2726-a kabyle village hovels cowering among [its]2726-a kabyle village hideous fat - fleshed cactus ; later on in the afternoon [he]2718-he finds [himself]2718-he in [the little French hamlet of [Biermandreis]149-biermandreis]2727-the little french hamlet of biermandreis , and finally drops down upon [the Jardin d'Essai]2728-the jardin d'essai , [that delightful botanic garden]2729-that delightful botanic garden which is one of the many blessings for which [Algerian France]150-algerian france has to thank the much - vilipended [Napoleon III]358-napoleon iii . It is difficult for [even the reddest Republican]2730-even the reddest republican to think hardly of [that dead ruler]2731-that dead ruler as [he]2718-he walks down [the avenue of gigantic palms that lead , straight as a die]2732-the avenue of gigantic palms that lead , straight as a die , to where , like a deep blue gem far away , [the Mediterranean]130-the mediterranean shows [Jim]181-jim walks along beneath the huge date - palms that give [him]181-jim a crick in the neck to gape up at ere [he]181-jim can perceive [their]2733-their towering head of waving plumes far up against the blue . [They]2733-their remind [him]181-jim absurdly of the pictures in the missionary books of [his]181-jim youth — the palm - tree , [the log cabin]2734-the log cabin , [the blackamoors]2735-the blackamoors , and [the missionary in a palm hat]2736-the missionary in a palm hat . Is [he]181-jim [the missionary]2737-the missionary , and is [this inky negress in a black bonnet]2738-this inky negress in a black bonnet , scarcely distinguishable from [her]2738-this inky negress in a black bonnet face , [his]181-jim one catechumen ? Alternating with the date are superb fan - palms , of which it is difficult to realize that it is [[their]2733-their stunted , puny brothers which , anxiously tended , sponged , and cosseted , drag out a languid existence in [London drawing - rooms]2740-london drawing - rooms]2739-their stunted , puny brothers which , anxiously tended , sponged , and cosseted , drag out a languid existence in london drawing - rooms . Among [[their]2733-their Titan fans]2741-their titan fans lies [their]2733-their mighty fruit , like a bunch of grapes , a yard and a half long , strung upon ropes of yellow worsted . Half - way down [its]2742-its length [the main avenue]2743-the main avenue is intersected by [a splendid alley of bamboos]2744-a splendid alley of bamboos , which lean [their]2733-their smooth - jointed stems and [their]2733-their luxuriant narrow leaves towards each other across the dimmed interspace , and unite in a pointed Gothic arch of living green . [Jim]181-jim paces objectlessly down [the long arcade]2745-the long arcade , stooping now and again to pick up a fragment of the peeled bark that looks so strangely like a papyrus roll with a mother - of - pearl glaze upon it . [He]181-jim pulls it idly open , as if expecting to find the secret of some forgotten race written upon its shining surface ; but if [he]181-jim reads any secret there , it is only [his]181-jim own , which , after all , is not much of a secret . [He]181-jim merely sees written there that it is too early to go [home]401-home yet ; that there is no security that [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth may not still be sitting on [the terrace]908-the terrace stitching away with [her]193-elizabeth gold thimble and [her]193-elizabeth coloured silks . The sun , it is true , has left [the garden]3792-the garden , but [he]181-jim departs thence over - early . It will be safer to stay away yet half an hour or so . Thus resolving , [he]181-jim retraces [his]181-jim steps , and explores in a new direction ; saunters down [a rose - alley]2749-a rose - alley , where , climbing immoderately high up tall palms , seeming as if [they]2750-them would strangle [them]2750-them with [their]2750-them long bowery arms , rose - trees wave far above [him]181-jim in the still air ; and upon [them]2750-them , though it is still but the month of January , when [people]3155-people are skating , blue - nosed , in [England]11-england , creamy tea - roses show [their]2750-them pale - yellow hearts , fair and frequent , on the unpruned boughs , rioting in licensed liberty above [his]181-jim head . [The walk]2752-the walk ends in a circle of gigantic magnolias , which take hands round a square fountain - basin . Each huge trunk is , as it were , a little commonwealth of trees rolled into one , instead of a single tree . Beneath [them]2750-them benches stand . Upon one [[his]181-jim negress]2753-his negress sits , chatting with a French bonne ; on a second there is also something female and slender , something with its little white profile — how white it looks in this deceiving light!—lifted , although white , yet smiling , animated , and talking to [a man standing beside it]2754-a man standing beside it . [He]181-jim has dawdled and kicked [his]181-jim heels , and run the chance of contracting a spiteful Southern chill , in order to avoid [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth ; and [he]181-jim has succeeded in running straight into [her]193-elizabeth arms . [He]181-jim does not at the first glance recognise [[her]193-elizabeth companion]540-her companion , but a second look shows [him]181-jim that [he]181-jim is [one of [the inmates of [the hotel]1144-the hotel]2757-the inmates of the hotel]2756-one of the inmates of the hotel — [a French Vicomte]2759-a french vicomte ; and though [Jim]181-jim knows that [he]181-jim is both consumptive and [the father of [a family]4049-a family]2760-the father of a family , that knowledge does not hinder the rising in [his]181-jim breast of the jealous and censorious thought that [he]181-jim has detected [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth in throwing a great deal more than the necessary modicum of amiability into [her]193-elizabeth manner to [him]181-jim . As [Jim]181-jim comes into sight , [the Frenchman]2762-the frenchman clicks [his]2762-the frenchman heels , doubles up [his]2762-the frenchman body , lifts [his]2762-the frenchman hat , and walks away . It is evident , at all events , that [their]2763-their meeting was a casual one ; and the reflection brings with it a sense of relief , coupled with a feeling of shame at [his]181-jim own rooted readiness to suspect [her]193-elizabeth , on any or no evidence , which yet , on the other hand , is not strong enough , when [she]193-elizabeth turns [her]193-elizabeth sweet bright look towards [him]181-jim , to hinder the thought that it is scarcely , if at all , sweeter or brighter than that which [he]181-jim had caught [her]193-elizabeth squandering on the casual table [d'hôte acquaintance who has just quitted [her]193-elizabeth]2764-d'hôte acquaintance who has just quitted her . " [You]181-jim , too ! [The Vicomte]360-the vicomte — — "[193-elizabeth] " Yes , [I]181-jim saw [you]193-elizabeth engaged in animated dialogue with [him]360-the vicomte , "[181-jim] interrupts [Jim]181-jim , with slight acrimony ; " [I]181-jim had no idea that [you]193-elizabeth were [such allies]5053-such allies . "[181-jim] " Had not [you]181-jim ? "[193-elizabeth] rejoins [she]193-elizabeth innocently . " [He]360-the vicomte was telling [me]193-elizabeth about [[his]360-the vicomte English governess]5054-his english governess , what a treasure [she]5054-his english governess is"—her[193-elizabeth] face dimpling mischievously—"and how wonderfully pure [her]5054-his english governess accent . " Have [you]181-jim been on another expedition ? "[193-elizabeth] " No , not an expedition ; only a walk . If"—yielding[193-elizabeth] to the temptation of putting a question which [no one]819-no one would have judged more severely than [he]181-jim , had it been put by anyone else—"if [I]181-jim had invited [you]193-elizabeth to do [me]181-jim the honour of making another excursion with [me]181-jim to - day , do [you]193-elizabeth think that [you]193-elizabeth would have consented ? "[181-jim] As [he]181-jim speaks , [he]181-jim departs yet further from the line of conduct [he]181-jim has marked out for [himself]181-jim by sitting down on the bench at [her]193-elizabeth side . [Her]193-elizabeth eyes are fixed upon the soaring date - palm , which stands , instead of a water - jet , in the middle of the fountain - basin , and on which last year 's dead plumes hang sapless , and ready to fall off , in contrast to this year 's verdant vigour . " Is not that rather a tantalizing question when [you]181-jim did not ask [me]193-elizabeth ? "[193-elizabeth] inquires [she]193-elizabeth , with soft archness . " Yes , [I]193-elizabeth suspect that [I]193-elizabeth should ; [I]193-elizabeth was so very happy yesterday ; and although [you]181-jim told [me]193-elizabeth the other night"—swallowing[193-elizabeth] a sigh—"that [you]181-jim supposed [I]181-jim must love [my]181-jim own society , in point of fact , [I]181-jim do not think [I]181-jim do . "[181-jim] After all , the sun is not quite gone ; there are flashes of light in the verdant gloom , and green reflections in [the water]3621-the water . " And yet , "[181-jim] says [Jim]181-jim thoughtfully , " [you]193-elizabeth seem to have a good deal of it ; [I]181-jim suppose , in [your]193-elizabeth position , it is unavoidable . "[181-jim] [He]181-jim had meant an allusion to [her]193-elizabeth situation as bad third to [[her]193-elizabeth uxorious parents]2767-her uxorious parents ; before [his]181-jim mind 's eye has risen a picture of the little forlorn shawled figure [he]181-jim had seen studying its Italian Grammar with the door shut upon its loneliness ; but almost before the words have left [his]181-jim lips , [he]181-jim sees of how different , of how cruel , a construction they may be capable . [He]181-jim snatches a glance of real terror at [her]193-elizabeth , to see whether [she]193-elizabeth has made that erroneous , yet all too plausible application — a glance which confirms [his]181-jim worst fears . [She]193-elizabeth has turned as white as the pocket - handkerchief which [she]193-elizabeth is passing over [her]193-elizabeth trembling lips . " Yes , "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth says in a hollow whisper ; " [you]181-jim are right . In [my]193-elizabeth position it is unavoidable , and it is cowardly of [me]193-elizabeth not to accept it as such . "[193-elizabeth] " [I]193-elizabeth mean"—he[193-elizabeth] cries desperately—"I only meant — [I]193-elizabeth mean — — "[193-elizabeth] But [she]193-elizabeth does not suffer [him]181-jim to finish [his]181-jim stuttered explanation . " It is cold , "[193-elizabeth] [she]193-elizabeth says , rising . " [I]193-elizabeth will go [home]401-home . "[193-elizabeth] [He]181-jim does not attempt to accompany or follow [her]193-elizabeth . After [she]193-elizabeth is gone , [he]181-jim rages about [the garden]3792-the garden , and passes beyond it to where — still sunlight - smitten — [the blue Mediterranean]130-the mediterranean is breaking in joyous foam . [He]181-jim sits down on [the shelly strand]2769-the shelly strand , and , in futile anger , hurls back the wet pebbles into [the sea]2491-the sea 's azure lap . Away to the left , [the three - cornered town swarms candescent]2771-the three - cornered town swarms candescent up [the hill]1467-the hill , and [the white lighthouse]2773-the white lighthouse stands out against the lapis - coloured air . How sharp - cut and intense it all is!—none of [our]2774-our dear undecided grays . Here , if [you]2775-you are not piercing blue , [you]2775-you are dazzling white or profound green . There is , indeed , something less sharp - cut and uncompromising — a something more of mystery in the glory that — bright , too , but not making its full revelation — envelopes the long hill range that , ending in [Cape Matifou]152-cape matifou , stretches away to the far right . Round the corner , to the right too , [a party of Arabs]2776-a party of arabs , sitting sideways on little donkeys , white draped , with [their]2776-a party of arabs haik - swathed heads , are disappearing on [their]2776-a party of arabs small beasts in the clear air . It is like a page out of the Bible — a flight into [Egypt]153-egypt — and [they]2776-a party of arabs are going towards [Egypt]153-egypt too . [Jim]181-jim 's eye follows [the placid Easterns]2777-the placid easterns , but without catching the infection of [their]2777-the placid easterns tranquillity . " Whenever [I]181-jim see [her]5058-her , [I]181-jim stick a knife into [her]5058-her ! It is impossible ! There is no use trying ! [I]181-jim will give up the attempt . It is out of the question to have any happy relations with [a woman who has a past]5059-a woman who has a past ! "[181-jim] After all , [Mr. Le Marchant]210-mr. le marchant does not like [Hammam Rhira]144-hammam rhira . [He]210-mr. le marchant thinks [the hotel]1144-the hotel cold and the roads bad . [Jim]181-jim overhears [him]210-mr. le marchant telling [someone]529-someone this , and [his]181-jim own heart leaps . It is true that [he]181-jim takes it to task for doing so . Perhaps , after all , [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's removal would have been the best solution of [his]181-jim problem . Had [she]193-elizabeth left [Algiers]120-algiers , [he]181-jim could scarcely have followed [her]193-elizabeth , and [she]193-elizabeth would have been freed from the chance of [his]181-jim clumsy stabs . But all the same [his]181-jim heart leaps . It leaps yet higher a day or two later when [he]181-jim discovers that , though [Hammam Rhira]144-hammam rhira has not met with [Mr. Le Marchant]210-mr. le marchant 's approbation , yet that , by [his]210-mr. le marchant trip to it , [he]210-mr. le marchant has been bitten with a taste for travel , the outcome of which is [his]210-mr. le marchant solitary departure on an expedition to [Constantin]154-constantin , [Tunis]155-tunis , etc . , which must occupy [him]210-mr. le marchant at least a week . [[His]210-mr. le marchant wife]755-his wife accompanies [him]210-mr. le marchant to [the station]661-the station , but [[his]210-mr. le marchant daughter]2083-his daughter is not allowed to go beyond [the hotel steps]2783-the hotel steps . [Jim]181-jim surreptitiously watches [her]2083-his daughter hovering with diffident affection round [[her]2083-his daughter father]3214-her father , unobtrusively and unthanked fetching and carrying for [him]210-mr. le marchant . [He]181-jim sees the cold kiss that just brushes [her]2083-his daughter cheek , and hears the chill parting admonition to look well after [[her]2083-his daughter mother]3300-her mother and see that [she]2083-his daughter does not overtire [herself]2083-his daughter . It is accepted with ready meekness , but leaves [the recipient]2786-the recipient so crestfallen , as [she]2083-his daughter stands looking after [the departing vehicle]2787-the departing vehicle , that [Burgoyne]181-jim can not forbear joining [her]2083-his daughter , with some vague and , as [he]181-jim knows , senseless velleity of championship and consolation . " [He]181-jim is gone for a week , is not [he]181-jim ? "[181-jim] is the form that [his]181-jim sympathy takes , in a tone which [he]181-jim is at but small pains not to render congratulatory . " Yes , quite a week . "[181-jim] " Are [you"—he]181-jim[181-jim] is perfectly conscious while asking it that [he]181-jim has not the slightest right to put the question—"are [you]181-jim glad or sorry ? "[2083-his daughter] [She]2083-his daughter starts perceptibly . " Why should [I]2083-his daughter be glad ? Do [you]181-jim mean"—with[2083-his daughter] an unconquerable streak of satisfaction in [her]2083-his daughter own voice—"because [I]2083-his daughter shall have mammy all to [myself]2083-his daughter ? [You]181-jim must not think"—with[2083-his daughter] an obvious rush of quickly following compunction—"that [I]2083-his daughter am not fond of [him]181-jim , because [he]181-jim sometimes speaks a little roughly to [me]2083-his daughter . "[2083-his daughter] After a pause , in a lowered voice : " [You]181-jim see , when [you]181-jim have broken [a person]1281-a person 's heart , [you]181-jim can scarcely blame [him]181-jim for not having a very high opinion of [you]181-jim . "[2083-his daughter] So saying , [she]2083-his daughter suddenly leaves [him]181-jim as [she]2083-his daughter had left [him]181-jim in [the Jardin d'Essai]2728-the jardin d'essai . [He]181-jim does not again approach [her]2083-his daughter that day , but at dinner - time [he]181-jim has the answer to [his]181-jim question as to [her]2083-his daughter being glad or sorry at [[her]2083-his daughter father]3214-her father 's departure . [She]2083-his daughter is apparently in the best of spirits , sitting nestled close up to [[her]2083-his daughter mother]3300-her mother for the better convenience of firing a series of little jokes and comments into [that parent]1147-that parent 's appreciative ear . " [They]5061-they make fun of [the whole hotel]4916-the whole hotel , "[346-miss strutt] observes [Miss Strutt]346-miss strutt with exasperation . " [I]346-miss strutt do not believe that [one of [us]5064-us]5063-one of us escapes ! When [he]181-jim is not there to check them , there is no holding them ! "[346-miss strutt] No holding [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth ! The phrase recurs to [him]181-jim several times during the next few days , as not without its justness , when [he]181-jim sees its object flitting about [the house]986-the house , gay as a linnet ; when [he]181-jim meets [her]2083-his daughter singing subduedly to [herself]2083-his daughter upon the stairs ; when [he]181-jim watches [her]2083-his daughter romping with [the French children]2793-the french children , and mischievously collecting flowers of [Clapham]156-clapham eloquence from [[their]2794-their governess]2795-their governess , which [she]2795-their governess is good enough to retail for [his]181-jim own and [[her]2083-his daughter mother]3300-her mother 's benefit when evening unites [the three]971-the three in the retirement of [[their]2794-their little salon]2798-their little salon . For , strange and improbably blissful as it seems , [he]181-jim has somehow , ere three days are over , effected an entrance into [that small and fragrant sanctuary]2799-that small and fragrant sanctuary . [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant 's first fears that the meeting with [him]181-jim again would re - open sorrow have disappeared in the light of [[her]189-mrs. le marchant daughter]3525-her daughter 's childish gaiety , and are even exchanged for a compunctious gratitude to [him]181-jim for having been in part the cause of [her]189-mrs. le marchant new light - heartedness . The weather has again broken , a fact which [he]181-jim alone of [the whole hotel]4916-the whole hotel does not deplore , since it was [his]181-jim own ostentatiously displayed wet - day dreariness that was the cause of [his]181-jim first admission within the doors that are closed upon all others . Moreover , had it not been wet weather , could [he]181-jim have held an umbrella over [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth 's head when [he]181-jim met [her]193-elizabeth in the eucalyptus wood , and [they]2794-their walked among the naked trunks , while the long , loose , pale foliage waved like dishevelled hair in the rain , and the pungent asphodels grew thick about [their]2794-their feet in the red earth ? And when , by - and - by , the clouds disperse again , and there comes a fair day , bracketed between [three or four foul ones — the usual Algerian proportion]2802-three or four foul ones — the usual algerian proportion — it has grown quite natural to all three that [he]181-jim should sit opposite to [them]2794-their in [[their]2794-their drives]2803-their drives ; that [he]181-jim should haggle with [Arabs]340-arabs for [them]2794-their , and remonstrate with [the landlord]4203-the landlord , and generally transfer all the smaller roughnesses of life from [their]2794-their shoulders to [his]181-jim own . Brought into more intimate communion with [them]2794-their than [he]181-jim has ever been before , [Burgoyne]181-jim realizes how much [they]2794-their belong to [the kneeling , leaning , spoiling type of womankind]2805-the kneeling , leaning , spoiling type of womankind . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth would be [the easiest woman in [the world]3184-the world]2806-the easiest woman in the world to manage . How is it that in [her]193-elizabeth ten years of womanhood [no man]2808-no man has been found to undertake the lovely facile task ? [He]181-jim [himself]181-jim knows perfectly the treatment that would befit [her]193-elizabeth ; the hinted wishes — [her]193-elizabeth tact is too fine and [her]193-elizabeth spirit too meek to need anything so coarse as commands — the infinitesimal rebukes and the unlimited — oh ! limitless — caresses : Every day [he]181-jim finds [himself]181-jim repeating [Wordsworth]361-wordsworth 's line , and every day , in [his]181-jim fancied guidance of [her]193-elizabeth , [he]181-jim tells [himself]181-jim that the blame should be less and the kisses more . [Mr. Le Marchant]210-mr. le marchant has been gone more than a week , and February has come wetly in , with rain wildly weeping against the easements , and angry - handed rain boxing the unlucky orange - trees ' ears . It has rained for forty - eight hours without a break . [The Grand Hotel]2202-the grand hotel is at the end of [its]2202-the grand hotel resources . [Uncle Toby]359-uncle toby , [his]359-uncle toby struggle ended , lies vanquished in [the widow]2651-the widow 's net ; and there is murder in the lurid eye which [Miss Strutt]346-miss strutt turns on [the votary of [Whiteley]342-whiteley]2811-the votary of whiteley . [Jim]181-jim alone , [outdoor man as [he]181-jim habitually is , looking upon [a house]3171-a house merely in the light of a necessary shelter]2812-outdoor man as he habitually is , looking upon a house merely in the light of a necessary shelter , has no quarrel either with the absent sun or the present deluge ? for are not [they]2814-they the cause of [his]181-jim having spent two whole afternoons in the company of [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth and [[her]193-elizabeth mother]3300-her mother ? To - day has not [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth been singing to [him]181-jim , and cutting [him]181-jim orange - flower bread - and - butter , when [Fritz]349-fritz brought in the afternoon tea , and set the real English kettle fizzing over its spirit - lamp ? And , in return , has not [he]181-jim now , after dinner , been helping [her]193-elizabeth to weed out [her]193-elizabeth own and [[her]193-elizabeth mother]3300-her mother 's photograph - books ? As [he]181-jim does so the idea strikes [him]181-jim of how very meagre [her]193-elizabeth own collection of [acquaintances]822-acquaintances seems to be . From that weeding have [they]2818-they not , by an easy transition , at [her]193-elizabeth suggestion , passed to the more playful and ingenious occupation of amputating the heads of [some of [the rejected friends]2820-the rejected friends]2819-some of the rejected friends and applying them to the bodies of [others]736-others ? Each armed with a pair of scissors , and with [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant for umpire , [they]2818-they have been vying with each other as to who can produce the most startling results by this clever process . The palm has just been awarded to [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth for a combination which presents the head of [an elderly lady]2822-an elderly lady , in [a widow]2823-a widow 's cap , mounted upon the cuirass and long boots of [a Life Guardsman]2824-a life guardsman . [Jim]181-jim 's application of the cornet 's discarded head to the body of [a baby in long clothes]2825-a baby in long clothes , although allowed to be [a pretty conceit]2826-a pretty conceit , commands but little real admiration — an instance of nepotism which [he]181-jim does not allow to pass without protest . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth , elated by [her]193-elizabeth triumph , has flown out of [the room]442-the room to examine [[her]193-elizabeth private stores]2828-her private stores for fresh material , and [Jim]181-jim and [[her]193-elizabeth mother]3300-her mother — for the first time , as it happens , since that early meeting , when [her]193-elizabeth anxious eye had so plainly implored [him]181-jim to leave [Algiers]120-algiers — are tête - à - tête . [Her]193-elizabeth changed aspect towards [him]181-jim as [she]193-elizabeth sits , with a lingering laugh still on [her]193-elizabeth face , beside the wood fire — which , after having twice gone out , as it almost always does , the souches being invariably wet , burns bright and crackly — strikes [him]181-jim with such a feeling of warm pleasure that [he]181-jim says in a voice of undisguised triumph : " What spirits [she]193-elizabeth is in , is not [she]193-elizabeth ? "[181-jim] " Yes ; is not [she]193-elizabeth ? "[579-the mother] assents [the mother]579-the mother eagerly . " Then [I]189-mrs. le marchant do not see , "[189-mrs. le marchant] with a sudden bound upwards into sanguineness which reminds [him]2831-you of [[her]189-mrs. le marchant daughter]3525-her daughter , " why [we]2833-we should not all be very comfortable . "[189-mrs. le marchant] [Jim]181-jim is pondering in [his]181-jim mind upon the significance of this " all , "[210-mr. le marchant] whether it is meant to include only [Mr. Le Marchant]210-mr. le marchant , or whether , under its shelter , [he]181-jim [himself]181-jim may creep into that promised comfort , when [she]189-mrs. le marchant of whom [they]2833-we have been speaking re - enters . [She]189-mrs. le marchant has a packet of photographs , presumably suitable for amputation , in [her]189-mrs. le marchant hand , in which is also held a telegram , which [she]189-mrs. le marchant extends to [Burgoyne]181-jim . " [I]189-mrs. le marchant met [M. Cipriani]330-m. cipriani bringing [you]181-jim this . [He]5066-another gentleman was full of apologies , but [I]189-mrs. le marchant told [him]5066-another gentleman what culpable carelessness it showed . "[189-mrs. le marchant] " It can not be of much consequence , "[181-jim] replies [Jim]181-jim indifferently , while a sort of pang darts through [him]181-jim at the thought of how strangely destitute [he]181-jim is of [people to be uncomfortably anxious about]2834-people to be uncomfortably anxious about , and so tears it open . An English telegram transmitted by [French clerks]2835-french clerks often wears a very different air from that meant to be imparted to it by [the sender]2836-the sender , which is , perhaps , the reason why [Jim]181-jim remains staring so long at [his]181-jim — so long that [the two women]2837-the two women 's good manners prompt [them]2837-the two women to remove [their]2837-the two women sympathetic eyes from [him]181-jim , and to attempt a little talk with [each other]607-each other . " [I]659-the elder one hope [you]181-jim have no bad news ? "[181-jim] So saying , [he]181-jim places the paper in [her]659-the elder one hand , and , walking away to the little square window — open , despite the wildness of the weather — looks out upon the indigo - coloured night . [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth is dead silent . " If this had not been delayed — if it had not been too late , would [you]181-jim have wished , would [you]181-jim have decided to stop [him]181-jim ? But besides the ire and irritation , there is another quality in it which goads [him]181-jim to snatch a reluctant glance at [her]193-elizabeth . [She]193-elizabeth is extremely agitated , but underlying the distress and disturbance of [her]193-elizabeth face there is an undoubted light shining like a lamp through a pale pink shade — a light that , with all [her]193-elizabeth laughter and [her]193-elizabeth jokes , was not there half an hour ago . [He]181-jim had often reproached [himself]181-jim that , by [his]181-jim clumsiness , [he]181-jim had stuck a knife into [her]193-elizabeth tender heart . [She]193-elizabeth is even with [him]181-jim to - night . To - night the tables are turned . It is [she]193-elizabeth that has stuck a knife into [him]181-jim . " After all , "[189-mrs. le marchant] says [Mrs. Le Marchant]189-mrs. le marchant presently , rallying a little , [her]189-mrs. le marchant naturally buoyant temperament — that temperament which [she]189-mrs. le marchant has transmitted with such curious fidelity to [[her]189-mrs. le marchant child]3527-her child , coming to [her]189-mrs. le marchant rescue ; " after all , there is no reason why [you]3527-her child should see [him]181-jim , [Elizabeth]193-elizabeth . "[189-mrs. le marchant] [The mother]579-the mother turns as [she]579-the mother speaks eagerly from one to the other , addressing [each]2099-each in turn ; but from neither does [she]579-the mother obtain any answer .
